text:
Propjeta' li ilha snin ikkapparrata mill-Partit Laburista 

Propjeta' kbira fil-Bajja s-Sabiħa f'Birżebbuġa ilha għal kważi erbgħin sena ikkapparratha mill-Partit Laburista, u dan għal kirja miżera ta' €1,164 fis-sena. 

Fil-Prim Awla tal-Qorti Ċivili kienet ippreżentata ittra ġudizzjarja fejn l-Avukat Franco Grima u l-familja Ellul Sullivan qed iżommu responsabbli ta' dan in-nuqqas lil Avukat Ġenerali, lil Gvern u lil Partit Laburista. 

Erbgħin sena ilu, din id-dar, li kienet tintuża bħala lukanda fiċ-ċentru tal-bajja, ittieħdet b'rekwiżizzjoni mill-Awtorita' tad-Djar bl-iskuża li dan il-bini kien se jinbidel f'telephone exchange u berġa tas-saħħa. Minflok iżda dan il-bini, flimkien ma' dar oħra kantuniera magħha, ġew trasformati fil-Każin Laburista tal-lokal. 

Is-sidien qed jgħidu li l-kirja miżera żgur ma tirriflettix il-valur ta' din il-propjeta', kirja li minħabba klawsola f'kapitlu 69 tal-liġijiet ta' Malta, ma tistax togħla. Is-sidien qed isostnu li dan it-taparsi ftehim qed jikser id-drittijiet tagħhom, fejn mhux biss ilhom dawn is-snin kollha jiġu misruqa mill-użu ta' propjeta' li hi tagħhom bi dritt, iżda ukoll għall-fatt li hemm diskrepanza kbira bejn id-drittijiet tagħhom bħala sidien u dawk tal-okkupant, li f'dan il-kas hu l-Partit Laburista. 

Fil-ġranet li ġejjin mistennija tkun ippreżentata ukoll ittra ġudizzjarja fil-qorti kostituzzjonali bil-għan li l-propjeta' terġa' tgħaddi għand is-sidien u jiġu mħallsa l-flus dovuti lil familja tul dawn is-snin.
translation:
Property that has been tuning from the Labor Party for years

A large property in the Bay in Birżebbuga has been around for almost forty years by the Labor Party, for a meager lease of € 1,164 per year.

A judicial letter was filed in the First Chamber of the Civil Court where Attorney Franco Grima and the family Ellul Sullivan are holding accountable for this failure to Attorney General, Government and Labor Party.

Forty years ago, this house, which was used as a hotel in the center of the beach, was taken with a requirement by the Housing Authority under the pretext that this building would be transformed into a telephone exchange and a jar.the health.Instead, however, this building, along with another corner home, were transformed into the local Labor Club.

Owners are saying that the miserable lease certainly does not reflect the value of this property, a lease that, due to a clause in Chapter 69 of the laws of Malta, cannot rise.The owners claim that this reminder is violating their rights, where not only have they been stolen from the use of property that is theirs, but also for the fact that there is a discrepancyGreat between their rights as owners and those of the occupant, which in this case is the Labor Party.

A judicial letter in the Constitutional Court is also expected to be presented in the coming days with the aim of restoring the property to the owners and paying the money owed to a family over the years.

text:
Document 62009CJ0162 

Judgment of the Court (Third Chamber) of 7 October 2010.#Secretary of State for Work and Pensions v Taous Lassal.#Reference for a preliminary ruling: Court of Appeal (England & Wales) (Civil Division) - United Kingdom.#Reference for preliminary ruling - Freedom of movement for persons - Directive 2004/38/EC - Article 16 - Right of permanent residence - Temporal application - Periods completed before the date of transposition.#Case C-162/09. 

Sentenza tal-Qorti tal-Ġustizzja (it-Tielet Awla) tas-7 ta' Ottubru 2010. Secretary of State for Work and Pensions vs Taous Lassal. Talba għal deċiżjoni preliminari: Court of Appeal (England & Wales) (Civil Division) - ir-Renju Unit. Rinviju preliminari - Moviment liberu tal-persuni - Direttiva 2004/38/KE - Artikolu 16 - Dritt ta' residenza permanenti - Applikazzjoni fiż-żmien - Perijodi li ġew fi tmiemhom qabel id-data ta' traspożizzjoni. Kawża C-162/09. 

mill-Court of Appeal (England & Wales) (Civil Division)) 

“Rinviju għal deċiżjoni preliminari – Moviment liberu tal-persuni – Direttiva 2004/38/KE – Artikolu 16 – Dritt ta' residenza permanenti – Applikazzjoni ratione temporis – Perijodi li ntemmu qabel id-data ta' traspożizzjoni” 

Sommarju tas-sentenza 

– il-perijodi ta' residenza kontinwa ta' ħames snin, li ġew fi tmiemhom qabel id-data ta' traspożizzjoni tad-Direttiva 2004/38, jiġifieri t-30 ta' April 2006, skont l-istrumenti tad-dritt tal-Unjoni qabel din id-data, għandhom jittieħdu inkunsiderazzjoni għall-finijiet tal-kisba tad-dritt ta' residenza permanenti skont l-Artikolu 16(1) ta' din id-direttiva, u 

– l-assenzi mill-Istat Membru ospitanti, li huma inqas minn sentejn konsekuttivi, li seħħew qabel it-30 ta' April 2006 u wara residenza legali kontinwa ta' ħames snin li ġiet fi tmiemha qabel din id-data, ma humiex ta' natura li jaffettwaw il-kisba tad-dritt ta' residenza permanenti skont l-Artikolu 16(1). 

Ċertament, il-kisba ta' dritt ta' residenza permanenti minħabba residenza legali għal perijodu kontinwu ta' ħames snin fit-territorju tal-Istat Membru ospitanti, previst fl-Artikolu 16(1) tad-Direttiva 2004/38, ma kinitx imniżżla fl-istrumenti tad-dritt tal-Unjoni, adottati għall-applikazzjoni tal-Artikolu 18 KE, qabel ma seħħet din id-direttiva. Madankollu, interpretazzjoni li tgħid li huma biss il-perijodi ta' residenza legali kontinwa ta' ħames snin li jibdew jiddekorru mit-30 ta' April 2006 li għandhom jittieħdu inkunsiderazzjoni għall-għanijiet tal-kisba ta' dan id-dritt ta' residenza permanenti twassal sabiex tali dritt jista' jingħata biss mit-30 ta' April 2011. Tali interpretazzjoni twassal sabiex jiċċaħħdu r-residenzi li ntemmu miċ-ċittadini tal-Unjoni Ewropea skont l-istrumenti tad-dritt tal-Unjoni Ewropea qabel it-30 ta' April 2006 minn kull effett għall-finijiet tal-kisba tal-imsemmi dritt ta' residenza permanenti, li jmur kontra l-għan tad-Direttiva 2004/38 u jċaħħad lil din tal-aħħar mill-effett utli tagħha. Minbarra dan, l-interpretazzjoni li tgħid li huma biss il-perijodi ta' residenza legali kontinwa ta' ħames snin li ġew fi tmiemhom fit-30 ta' April 2006 jew wara din id-data li għandhom jittieħdu inkunsiderazzjoni, għall-finijiet tal-kisba tad-dritt ta' residenza permanenti previst fl-Artikolu 16 tad-Direttiva 2004/38, hija wkoll kuntrarja għall-għan u għall-effett utli ta' din id-direttiva. Fil-fatt, il-leġiżlatur tal-Unjoni Ewropea ssuġġetta l-kisba ta' dritt ta' residenza permanenti skont l-Artikolu 16(1) tad-Direttiva 2004/38 għall-integrazzjoni taċ-ċittadin tal-Unjoni fl-Istat Membru ospitanti. Issa, għandu jiġi kkonstatat li jkun inkompatibbli mal-idea ta' integrazzjoni, li hija l-bażi tal-Artikolu 16 ta' din id-direttiva, li jitqies li l-grad miksub ta' integrazzjoni fl-Istat Membru ospitanti jiddependi mill-punt dwar jekk ir-residenza kontinwa ta' ħames snin intemmitx
translation:
Document 62009CJ0162

Judgment of the Court (Third Chamber) of 7 October 2010.#Secretary of State for Work and Pensions v Taou Lassal.#Reference for a Preliminary Ruling: Court of Appeal (England & Amp; Wales) (Civil Division) - United Kingdom.#Reference for Preliminary Ruling - Freedom of Movement for Persons - Directive 2004/38/EC - Article 16 - Right of Permanent Residence - Temporal Application - Periods Completed Before the date of Transposition.#Case C -162/09.

Judgment of the Court of Justice (Third Chamber) of 7 October 2010. Secretary of State for Work and Pensions vs Taou Lassal.Reference for a preliminary ruling: Court of Appeal (England & Amp; Wales) (Civil Division) - United Kingdom.Preliminary reference - Free movement of persons - Directive 2004/38/EC - Article 16 - Permanent right of residence - application in time - periods that came to an end before the date of transposition.Case C-162/09.

from the Court of Appeal (England & Amp; Wales) (Civil Division))

"Reference to a preliminary ruling-Free movement of persons-Directive 2004/38/EC-Article 16-Permanent Right of Residence-Application Ratione temporis-periods ended before the transposition date"

Summary of the sentence

-the periods of continuous residence of five years, which came to an end before the date of transposition of Directive 2004/38, ie 30 April 2006, according to the instruments of Union lawPrior to this date, account shall be taken for the purposes of obtaining the right of permanent residence in accordance with Article 16 (1) of this Directive, and

-absences from the host Member State, which are less than two consecutive years, which occurred before 30 April 2006 and after a continuous legal residence of five years that came to an end before that date, are not ofa nature affecting the acquisition of the right of permanent residence in accordance with Article 16 (1).

Certainly, obtaining a permanent right of residence due to a legal residence for a continuous period of five years in the territory of the host Member State, provided for in Article 16 (1) of Directive 2004/38, was not listed in-instruments of Union law, adopted for the application of Article 18 EC, before this Directive took place.However, an interpretation that only the periods of continuous legal residence of five years start to run from April 30, 2006 that should be taken into account for the purposes of obtaining this right of permanent residenceIt leads to such a right can only be granted from 30 April 2011. Such an interpretation will lead to the depriving of the residences ending by the citizens of the European Union in accordance with the instruments of European Union law before 30April 2006 from any effect for the purposes of achieving the said permanent right of residence, which is contrary to the purpose of Directive 2004/38 and deprives the latter of its useful effect.In addition, the interpretation stating that only the periods of continuous legal residence of five years have come to an end on April 30, 2006 or after that date to be taken into account, for the purposes of theAchieving the right of permanent residence provided for in Article 16 of Directive 2004/38, is also contrary to the purpose and useful effect of this Directive.In fact, the European Union legislature has subjected the acquisition of a permanent right of residence under Article 16 (1) of Directive 2004/38 for the integration of the citizen of the Union into the host Member State.However, it must be stated that it is incompatible with the idea of integration, which is the basis of Article 16 of this directive, which is considered that the obtained degree of integration in the host Member State depends on the pointabout whether the continuous five-year residence ended

text:
Prim Cit Ribell Grilled 

L-immarinar b'togħma oranġjo f'din ir-riċetta mhux biss iqajjem it-taħlita tal-kaboċċa ewlenija iżda wkoll iżżid ħafna togħma delikata. Aqbadha mill-immarinar u poġġih fuq il-grill biex tixgħel bil-mod b'togħma ta 'affumikat biex tagħmel dan l-aħjar qoxra ewlenija li qatt kellek. 

Preheat grill għal sħana medja baxxa. Neħħi l-laħam mill-borża tal-plastik u tibgħat l-immarinar Żid laqx tal-injam skont ir-rakkomandazzjonijiet tal-manifattur. Qiegħed ix-xewk kustilja fuq il-grill rack. 

Kun żgur li jkollok pan dripp mimli bi pulzier ta 'ilma tahtha. Cook għal 2 1/2 sa 3 sigħat, billi żżid laqx ta 'injam frisk kull 30 minuta, u billi tneħħi l-immarinar riservat għall-ewwel 1 sa 1 1/2 siegħa ta' ħin tat-tisjir. Fittex temperatura interna ta'135 grad F / 60 grad C għal medju rari jew 145 grad F / 65 grad C għal medju. Meta jsir, neħħi mixwi mill-grill u ħalli joqgħod għal 10-15-il minuta qabel it-tinqix.
translation:
Prime Cit rebelled grilled

Orange-flavored marinade in this recipe not only raises the main cabbage mix but also adds a lot of delicate taste.Pick it up from the marinade and place it on the grill to slowly light up with a smoky taste to make this the best major shell you've ever had.

Preheat grill for low medium heat.Remove the meat from the plastic bag and send the marinade add wood chips according to the manufacturer's recommendations.Place the thorns on the grill rack.

Make sure you have a drip pan filled with an inch of water under it.Cook for 2 1/2 to 3 hours, adding fresh wood chips every 30 minutes, and by removing the reserved marinade for the first 1 to 1 1/2 hour of cooking time.Look for an internal temperature of 135 degrees F / 60 degrees C for rare medium or 145 degrees F / 65 degrees C for medium.When done, remove roast from the grill and leave for 10-15 minutes before carving.

text:
Lejl sogħla aċċessjonijiet ma jagħtux l-tarbija torqod, burdata ħażina, inaqqsu difiżi tal-ġisem. Ma 'sorsi virali mard ġlieda għandha tkun tabib, iżda jista' jkun hemm allerġen mewġ, li jeħtieġu wkoll li jiġu identifikati. 

Kawżi ta 'aċċessjonijiet fil-tarbija 

Jekk it-tfal sogħla bil-lejl u matul il-jum hemm, dawn il-komplikazzjonijiet jistgħu jwasslu għal konsegwenzi serji. Hija tista 'tkun allerġiku għal xi sustanzi introdotti fis-sistema pulmonari tal-ġurnata. Fil-għaxija kien hemm nefħa u mukus tkun mifruda mill-movimenti tar-rifless tal-isternum. Spiss, madankollu, il-bidu tat-attakk iseħħ mingħajr l-apparenza ta 'inklużjonijiet likwidi. 

sogħla xotta hija produttivi u perikolużi lit-tarbija. Bugħawwieġ u nuqqas ta 'ossiġnu iseħħ fgar. U jekk il-wild ikun sogħla bil-lejl u matul il-jum hemm, tfittex l-kawża fl-ambjent. Dan jista 'jkun allerġeni: trab, kimiċi, polline, ikel jittieħdu. Ukoll, l-attakki huma minħabba kuntatt ma 'oġġetti tad-dar: bjankerija tas-sodda, xugamani. 

Meta wild ikun sogħla bil-lejl u matul il-jum hemm, ikun ġej ġuħ ossiġnu. Minn dalgħodu, huwa ma jiksbu biżżejjed irqad, hemm żieda irritabilità, nuqqas t'aptit. Għalhekk, għandu jiġi mfittex l-kawża ta 'dan il-marda stramba u l-eliminazzjoni perikli. 

allerġeni 

Tifel żgħir huwa sogħla bil-lejl u matul il-jum ma hemm ebda raġuni għal reazzjoni allerġika severa. Spiss f'dawn il-każijiet huwa meħtieġ li iċċempel ambulanza sabiex tittaffa l-kundizzjoni-tarbija. Jiddeterminaw il-kawża ta 'l-attakk huwa diffiċli, u sogħla xotta jistgħu jindikaw għall-allerġen, jew infezzjoni. 

Biex jiġu ddeterminati l devjazzjonijiet saħħa għandhom jgħaddu testijiet fil-laboratorju, fejn it-tobba huma aktar probabbli għall-punt li l-kawża tal-marda. Jekk tifel sogħla matul il-jum u bil-lejl hemm, KOMOROWSKI jirrakkomanda tiftakar avvenimenti tal-ġurnata ta 'qabel u l-għada filgħodu biex tara tabib b'deskrizzjoni azzjoni tfal. Kull dettall huwa importanti, minħabba li jista 'jkun infettat fil-bitħa, ġnien jew skola. 

Se jkun ċar għaliex it-tfal sogħla bil-lejl u matul il-jum hemm, meta eżaminat il trabi kollha esposti għall-morda. sigurtà infettiv fuq kollox, għaliex li ttejjeb is-saħħa tat-tarbija jistgħu jiġu infettati mill-ġdid mill-pari tagħhom. Wara l-isptar il-wild tonfoq il-perijodu dar stabbilit minn tabib sabiex tiġi eskluża l rikorrenza tal-marda. 

mard fiżiku 

It-tweġiba għall-mistoqsija għala tfal sogħla matul il-lejl aktar minn matul il-ġurnata, jista 'jkun patoloġija fl-istruttura tal-pulmuni. Li jeskludi każijiet avvanzati tal-marda għal eżami annwali tas-sider - l-fluworoskopija familjari. Fl-istampa tista 'avviż fil tibdil riversibbli ħin u jieħdu miżuri sabiex lokalizzazzjoni tagħhom. 

F'ħafna każijiet, inti tista tgħin tfal tiegħek wieħed biss antibijotiku, imma għandhom ukoll effetti sekondarji. Tali miżuri huma permissibbli meta jkun hemm konsistenza: il-wild sogħla bil-lejl u matul il-jum hemmhekk. X'għandi nagħmel meta dan jiġri rarament u kaotika randomness? 

Ikun aħjar li l-avviż l-istess avvenimenti jew kondizzjonijiet qabel l-attakk. Tista 'tkun ġiet użata l-istess ikel inti ma tieħu fil-jiem oħra biex din il-ġurnata. Jew konsegwenza tal-marda saret kampanja biex iżuru, żu jew istituzzjoni oħra. 

Jista 'jgħaddi attakk mingħajr għajnuna medika? 

Jekk it-tifel ma jkunx sogħla matul il-jum u l-sogħla bil-lejl, allura kollox tista 'tmur mingħajr traċċa. skonfort temporanja hija kkawżata minn ammont żgħir tal-allerġen jew infezzjoni. Filwaqt li ttejjeb l-istat tat-tarbija tas-saħħa huwa rakkomandat li tinżamm l-immunità u josservaw nutriment xieraq. Iżda it-tobba xorta jkollhom biex iżuru u jeżamina b'mod sħiħ għall-infezzjonijiet. 

Appoġġa s-sistema immunitarja tat-tfal, ma ninsewx dwar il proċeduri mediċi. Tkun l-inalazzjoni utli mingħajr sħana, fejn il-bexx likwidi sseħħ permezz ta 'ultrasound. mard staġjonali

text:
Jista' l-Ministru jagħti rendikont tal-aħħar Konvenzjoni għall-Maltin li jgħixu barra minn Malta li organizza l-Ministeru tiegħu f'April li għadda? X'kienu s-suġġetti li ġew diskussi? 

Tweġiba: 

Fil-Konvenzjoni għall-Maltin li Jgħixu Barra li saret f'April tas-sena l-oħra ħadu sehem madwar 120 parteċipant u osservatur mid-Diaspora Maltija fl-Awstralja, il-Belġju, l-Emirati Għarab Magħquda, il-Lussemburgu, l-Istati Uniti tal-Amerika, ir-Renju Unit u pajjiżi oħra. Il-parteċipanti kellhom l-okkażjoni jiltaqgħu mal-President ta' Malta l-E.T. Marie Louise Coleiro Preca fil-Palazz ta' Sant' Anton. 

Il-Konvenzjoni nfetħet uffiċjalment mill-Prim Ministru, l-Onor. Dott. Joseph Muscat fil-21 ta' April 2015 f'Dar il-Mediterran għall-Konferenzi, fil-Belt Valletta. Saru ukoll diskorsi minni u mill-Kap tal-Oppożizzjoni. Fil-Konvenzjoni saru żewġ plenarji u sitt workshops li matulhom tressqu preżentazzjonijiet dwar l-identità, il-kultura u l-lingwa Maltija, l-istorja tal-emigrazzjoni u l-futur tad-Diaspora Maltija. L-ewwel plenarja kienet tittrata ‘Il-Kommunitajiet Maltin Barra minn Malta – l-Qagħda Attwali u l-Futur' u kien hemm preżentazzjonijiet dwar il-qagħda tal-Maltin fl-Awstralja, fi Brussell, l-emigrazzjoni mill-lenti tal-Kummissjoni Emigranti kif ukoll sterjotipi u żviluppi interkulturali fl-Awstralja u f'Malta meta l-emigranti Maltin jirritornaw Malta. Wara l-ewwel plenarja sar l-ewwel workshop b'diskussjoni fuq l-istess tema fejn ingħataw l-esperjenzi reġjonali tal-parteċipanti. Kienu ippreżentati wkoll studji oħra, din id-darba fuq il-qagħda tal-Maltin fil-Kanada, ir-Renju Unit, u l-Maltin tal-Eġittu u ta' Tripoli ġewwa l-Awstralja, l-anzjani fl-Awstralja, l-importanza tal-għaqdiet fil-komunitajiet Maltin u xi aspetti taċ-ċittadinanza. It-Tieni workshop beda bi preżentazzjoni mill-Aġenzija Żgħażagħ dwar ix-xogħol li jsir minn din l-entita' u kompla bi preżentazzjonijiet dwar l-identita' Maltija fiż-żgħażagħ Maltin fl-istati ta' Victoria u New South Wales fl-Awstralja, perspettiva minn Għawdex kif ukoll ix-xogħol li qiegħed isir miż-żgħażagħ Maltin fir-Renju Unit. Fit-Tieni Plenarja li ttrattat it-tema ‘Il-Kunsill u l-Maltin li Jgħixu Barra minn Malta', kienu diskussi l-miri li ntlaħqu sa issa mill-Kunsill tal-Maltin li Jgħixu Barra minn Malta, id-diffikulatjiet u xi proċeduri li jistgħu jittejbu. Fl-aħħarnett saret preżentazzjoni dwar ix-xogħol li jwettaq id-Direttorat għall-Maltin li Jgħixu Barra minn Malta. Ingħatat ukoll prezentazzjoni dwar il-Valletta 18. Wara din il-plenarja saru t-tielet u r-raba' workshops. It-tielet workshop kien jittratta ‘Il-kommunikazzjoni mad-Diaspora Maltija' u r-raba' wieħed kien dwar ‘Il-Kommunitaijiet Ġodda Maltin.' Fit-tielet workshop saru preżentazzjonijiet dwar modi differenti b'użu tat-teknoloġija kif tista' titjieb il-kommunikazzjoni mal-membri tad-Diaspora Maltija madwar id-dinja u fil-kontinenti diversi. Fir-raba' workshop saru preżentazzjonijiet minn membri tad-diaspora fil-pajjiżi tal-Benelux u l-Emirati Għarab Magħquda, li taw l-esperjenza tagħhom bħala komunitajiet riċenti. Fl-aħħar ġurnata saru żewġ workshops oħra, il-ħames wieħed dwar ‘L-Identita', il-Kultura u l-Manteniment tal-Lingwa Maltija' u s-sitt wieħed dwar ‘L-Awturi Maltin fid-Diaspora.' Fil-ħames workshop ġew ittrattati l-iżviluppi u l-problemi relatati mat-trasformazzjoni tal-identita' Maltija, il-kultura, ir-rwol tar-reliġjon, l-iżviluppi liberali fid-Diaspora kif ukoll it-tagħlim tal-lingwa Maltija fid-diversi pajjiżi fejn hemm skejjel u klassijiet iwettqu dan ix-xogħol. Waqt is-sitt workshop, grupp ta' kittieba Maltin fid-Diaspora iddiskutew l-esperjenzi tagħhom fit-trasformazzjoni tal-identità tagħhom bħala persuni li jgħixu barra u l-identita' Maltija li ħadu mill-ġenituri. Ix-xogħol kollu li jinkludi l-istudji li ġew ippreżentati, kif ukoll ir-rapporti tar-Rapporteurs, ser ikunu ppublikat fi ktieb li mistenni jiġi ppubblikat dalwaqt. Il-Konvenzjoni kienet eżerċizzju importanti u ta' suċċess. Innotajt b'mod partikolari l-parteċipazzjoni entużjasta ta' ħafna żagħażagħ Maltin li jgħixu barra. Dan jawgura tajjeb ferm biex fis-snin li ġejjin ix-xogħol mibdi jitkompla b'ħeġġa u determinazzjoni. Matul il-ġranet tal-Konvenzjoni saret ukoll wirja
translation:
Can the Minister give an account of the last convention for Maltese living abroad organized by his Ministry last April?What were the topics discussed?

Answer:

In the convention for the Maltese abroad held in April last year, around 120 participants and observers from the Maltese diaspora in Australia, Belgium, the United Arab Emirates, Luxembourg, theThe United States of America, the United Kingdom and other countries.Participants had the occasion to meet with the President of Malta the E.T.Marie Louise Coleiro Preca at St. Anthony's Palace.

The Convention was officially opened by the Prime Minister, the Hon.Dr.Joseph Muscat on April 21, 2015 at the Mediterranean Conference House, Valletta.Speeches were also made by me and the Leader of the Opposition.Two plenary and six workshops were held at the convention during which presentations on the Maltese identity, culture and language, the history of emigration and the future of the Maltese diaspora were presented.The first plenary was with the Maltese communities abroad-the current situation and the future 'and there were presentations on the situation of the Maltese in Australia, Brussels, the emigration from the lens of the lensEmigrant Commission as well as intercultural stereotypes and developments in Australia and Malta when Maltese emigrants return to Malta.After the first plenary the first workshop was held with a discussion on the same topic where the participants' regional experiences were given.Other studies were also presented, this time on the situation of the Maltese in Canada, the United Kingdom, and the Maltese of Egypt and Tripoli in Australia, the elderly in Australia, thethe importance of unions in the Maltese communities and some aspects of citizenship.The second workshop began with a presentation by the Youth Agency on the work done by this entity and continued with presentations on Maltese identity in Maltese youth in the states of Victoria and New South Wales in Australia, a perspective from Gozo as well as the work being done by Maltese youth in the United Kingdom.In the second plenary dealing with the theme 'The Council and the Maltese living abroad', the goals reached so far by the Council of Maltese living abroad, the difficulties and someImproved procedures.Finally, a presentation was made on the work carried out by the Directorate for Maltese living abroad.A presentation on Valletta 18 was also given after this plenary were the third and fourth workshops.The third workshop dealt with 'Communication with the Maltese Diaspora' and the fourth was about 'the new Maltese communities.'In the third workshop presentations were made on different ways with technology use how to improve communication with members of the Maltese diaspora around the world and on the various continents.In the fourth workshop presentations were made by members of the Diaspora in the Benelux countries and the United Arab Emirates, who have given their experience as recent communities.On the last day two other workshops were held, the fifth on 'identity', culture and maintenance of the Maltese language 'and the sixth on' the Maltese authors in the Diaspora. 'In the fifth workshop developments and problems related to the transformation of Maltese identity, culture, the role of religion, liberal developments in the diaspora as well as the teaching of the Maltese language were dealt with.In the various countries where there are schools and classes they carry out this work.During the sixth workshop, a group of Maltese writers in Diaspora discussed their experiences in transforming their identity as people living abroad and the Maltese identity they took from parents.All the work that includes the studies presented, as well as the rapporteurs reports, will be published in a book that is expected to be published soon.The convention was an important and successful exercise.I noticed in particular the enthusiastic participation of many Maltese young people living abroad.This augurs very well to continue the work started in the coming years with zeal and determination.During the days of the convention an exhibition was also held

text:
Kif diġà tafu, il-librerija tal-SpLD toffri varjetà ta' kotba fuq suġġetti varji għal studenti ta' etajiet differenti. 

Għaldaqstant, qed nehmżu informazzjoni bil-Malti kif ukoll bl-Ingliż dwar l-attivitajiet li se jsiru fil-librerija tal-SpLD. 

Żewġt irġiel marru jistadu. Wieħed minnhom kien espert fis-sajd u l-ieħor ma kienx. Kull darba li l-espert kien jaqbad ħuta, kien ipoġġiha fil-basket bis-silġ biex tibqa' friska. Kull meta l-ieħor kien jaqbad ħuta, kien jerġa' jarmiha lura fil-baħar. L-espert kien ilu josserva din il-biċċa xogħol għal ġurnata sħiħa. Fl-aħħar ma felaħx aktar jarah jaħli dak il-ħut kollu. “Għaliex qed terġa' twaddab dak il-ħut tajjeb kollu fil-baħar?” staqsa lil sieħbu. 

“Għax jien kull m'għandi hu taġen żgħir,” wieġbu l-ieħor. 

Xi kultant aħna wkoll nagħmlu hekk. Flok naddattaw ruħna għall-ħajja nippretendu li l-ħajja tadatta ruħha għalina. U, jaħasra, nitilfu opportunitajiet kbar u sbieħ sempliċiment għax nibqgħu imwaħħlin mal-ideat, il-biżgħat, il-qtigħ il-qalb u n-nuqqas ta' kuraġġ tagħna. 

Meta se tibda temmen fik innifsek? Meta se tibda tafda l-ħajja? Meta se tkun lest tirriskja? 

Ftit eżempji: 

Le...Dak għalxejn tkellmu. Anqas biss lest jisimgħek! 

Le...Min jitwieled tond ma jmutx kwadru. Jien hekk magħmul u għalxejn noħlom li xi darba se ninbidel. 

Le...Dik żġur ma nsajjarhiex. Anqas qatt ma ppruvajtha! 

Mela flok tarmi dak li tagħtik il-ħajja, mhux aħjar tiftaħ u tkabbar qalbek biex tilqgħu. L-itjeb platti tal-ħajja mhux fit-taġen isiru, imma fis-sħana ta' qalb taħraq! 

Data: 30 ta' Ottubru 2013 

Bħala ħarġa għall-ewwel term ser immorru sal-Limestone Heritage. Ser niltaqgħu ħdejn l-iskola (in-naħa tas segretarja fi Triq Dr N Zammit) u nagħmlu passiġġata flimkien sal-Limestone Heritage fejn ser ikollna quddiesa u dawra mal-post li hu verament interessanti. 

Wara jkollna coffee morning. Għal min jixtieq ser ikollna wkoll il-logħob tat-tombla. 

Il-Fondazzjoni għal Servizzi Edukattivi (FES) bil-kollaborazzjoni mal-Kunsill Nazzjonali tal-Ktieb ser torganizza Esperjenza ta' Kitba għall-familji. Għal iżjed informazzjoni dwar din l-attivita' tistgħu tidħlu hawn. 

L-aħħar sejħa għall-ġita tas-Sibt 26 ta' Ottubru 2013. Ingħaqad grupp gmielu ta' madwar ħamsin ruħ. Fadal għalhekk ftit postijiet u l-booking jagħlaq nhar l-Erbgħa 16 ta' Ottubru 2013. 

We will have three separate meetings for parents about Mathematics during the first term. These will help parents understand better the method used when teaching Maths, thus empowering them to help their children better in their homework. 

Fuq talba tal-ġenituri ser nagħmlu tliet laqgħat separati dwar il-Matematika matul l-ewwel term. L-għan hu li l-ġenituri jifhmu aħjar is-sistema li biha jiġi mgħallem il-matematika u b'hekk huma jkunu jistgħu jgħinu lil uliedhom aħjar. 

Il-laqgħat idumu madwar siegħa u kwart. Nisperaw li tattendu.

Ġenituri tal-Kinder: Il-Ħamis 28 ta' Novembru fid-9am 

Ġenituri tal-Yr 1,2,3: Il-Ħamis 28 ta' Novembru fis-1pm.
translation:
As you already know, the SPLD library offers a variety of books on various topics for students of different ages.

Accordingly, we are attaching information in Maltese as well as in English on the activities to be held in the SPLD library.

Two men went fishing.One of them was an expert in fishing and the other was not.Each time the expert was catching a fish, he would put it in the ice basket to stay fresh.Whenever the other caught a fish, he would throw it back into the sea.The expert had been observing this task for a whole day.In the end he did not see him see him waste all that fish."Why are you getting back all that good fish at sea?"asked his teammates.

"Because I am a small saucepan," the other replied.

Sometimes we also do so.Instead of adapting to life we expect life to adapt to us.And, unfortunate, we lose great and beautiful opportunities simply because we remain attached to our ideas, fears, heartbreak and lack of courage.

When will you start believing in yourself?When will you begin to trust life?When will you be ready to risk?

A few examples:

No ... that's to no avail.Less just ready to listen to you!

No ... the rounder does not die in a square.I'm so done and I dream that one day I will change.

No ... that's sure I don't cook it.At least I never tried it!

So instead of throwing away what gives you life, it is no better to open and grow your heart to welcome.The best dishes of life not in the pan are made, but in the heat of a hot heart!

After getting Coffee Morning.For those who wish we will also have bingo games.

The last call for the tour of Saturday, October 26, 2013. Joined a group of about fifty people.There are therefore a few places and the booking closes on Wednesday, October 16, 2013.

Meetings last about an hour and a quarter.We hope to attend.

text:
Wara Herrera...Evarist Bartolo jagħżel li ma jiddefendix lil Keith Schembri 

Wara l-Ministru Jose Herrera ilbieraħ, issa Ministru ieħor jirrifjuta li jiddefendi lil Keith Schembri. 

Fl-aħħar sigħat, Jose Herrera wera biċ-ċar li mhux se jiddefendi lill-ħabib tal-Prim Ministru, wara li beża' jixhed fl-appell li fetaħ hu stess kontra l-eks Kap tal-Partit Nazzjonalista Simon Busuttil. 

Issa kien imiss lill-Ministru tal-Edukazzjoni Evarist Bartolo li jagħmel l-istess. 

Bartolo għalhekk huwa t-tieni Ministru f'temp ta' jumejn li ħa pożizzjoni kontra dik ta' Joseph Muscat u ta' għadd ta' Ministri oħra, li baqgħu jagħmlu minn kollox biex jiddefendu liċ-Chief of staff tal-Prim Ministru. 

Hekk kif il-Ministru għamel minn kollox biex ma nwaqqfuhx b'mistoqsijiet dwar Schembri, Bartolo wieġeb biss li dak li kellu xi jgħid ilu li qalu, u għalkemm aħna bqajna nimxu mal-Ministru biex nieħdu l-kummenti tiegħu dwar dan, hu baqa' jirrepeti t-tweġiba tiegħu. 

Il-Ministru tal-Edukazzjoni kien qed jirreferi għal dak li kien qal lura fl-2016 meta kien ħareġ fil-beraħ l-iskandlu tal-kumpaniji fil-Panama tal-Ministru Konrad Mizzi u ta' Keith Schembri. Dakinhar hu kien ċar ħafna dwar il-fatt li mhux aċċettabbli li persuni f'dawn il-karigi jkollhom kumpaniji sigrieti f'pajjiżi bħall-Panama. Dakinhar hu kien qal ċar u tond li kieku kien hu kien jirriżenja. 

Iktar minn hekk dakinhar kien wiegħed li se jagħmel pressjoni fuq il-Parlament biex isir tibdil fil-liġijiet sabiex ċittadini Maltin jitwaqqfu milli jkollhom dat-tip ta' kumpaniji. 

Dak iż-żmien Evarist Bartolo kien fost ftit mill-membri tal-Kabinett ta' Muscat li kellu l-kuraġġ jikkritika lill-Prim Ministru għall-fatt li ma talabx lill-Ministru Mizzi u liċ-Chief of Staff tiegħu, Keith Schembri jirriżenjaw. 

Bartolo jibqa' jissemma' għad-dikjarazzjoni tiegħu li hawn liġi għall-Allat u liġi għall-annimali. 

Issa wara l-aġir ta' Schembri nhar it-Tnejn kompliet tikber il-qasma fil-grupp Parlamentari Laburista hekk kif uħud baqgħu jiddefendu liċ-Chief of Staff filwaqt li numru ta' deputati oħra ma huma qed jaqblu xejn mal-mod kif il-Prim Ministru qed jibqa' jiddefendi lil sieħbu akkost ta' kollox.
translation:
After Herrera ... Evarist Bartolo chooses not to defend Keith Schembri

Following Minister Jose Herrera yesterday, another minister now refuses to defend Keith Schembri.

In recent hours, Jose Herrera clearly showed that he would not defend the Prime Minister's friend, after he was scared of his own appeal against former Nationalist Party Leader Simon Busuttil.

It was now time for Education Minister Evarist Bartolo to do the same.

Bartolo is therefore the second minister in two days to take a stand against that of Joseph Muscat and a number of other ministers, who have continued to do their best to defend the Prime Minister's Chief of Staff.

As the Minister did everything we could not stop with questions about Schembri, Bartolo only replied that what he had said long ago, and although we kept moving with the Minister to take his comments on this, he remainedrepeats his answer.

The Minister of Education was referring to what was said back in 2016 when the company scandal in Panama of Minister Konrad Mizzi and Keith Schembri was released.At that time he was very clear about the fact that it is unacceptable for people in these posts to have secret companies in countries such as Panama.At that time he was clear and round that if he were he would resign.

Moreover, he had promised that he would put pressure on Parliament to make changes to the laws to stop Maltese citizens from having a type of companies.

At that time Evarist Bartolo was among some of the members of the Muscat Cabinet who had the courage to criticize the Prime Minister for not asking Minister Mizzi and his Chief of Staff, Keith Schembri to resign.

Bartolo continues to be mentioned for his statement that there is a law for the gods and law for animals.

Now after Schembri's behavior on Monday the split in the Labor Parliamentary Group continued to grow as some continued to defend the Chief of Staff while a number of other MPs are not agreeing with the way the wayPrime Minister continues to defend his teammates at all.

text:
Press Release 

Whilst referring to the introduction of gay marriage which was pledged by both major political parties in their respective electoral manifestos, the Cana Movement affirms the following. 

1. Every person, regardless of his sexual orientation or life preferences should be treated with utmost dignity. 

2. Equality before the law should not be a pretext to deny differentiation. Whereas it is the legislator's duty to regulate different forms of relationships, this is not a justification to redefine marriage or attempt to alter the nature of marriage. Marriage was, is and remains a life- long union between one man and one woman which by its nature is intended towards the procreation of children and the well-being of spouses. Neither should the proposed law promote deletion of references to man and woman, husband and wife, both of which have important and complementary roles in the procreation and bringing up of children. 

3. Laws which distinguish between different forms of relationships such as co-habitation, civil unions and marriage are not discriminatory. On the contrary they acknowledge and respect differences, particularly in a society which celebrates pluralism and diversity. 

4. The State is duty bound to consider the best interests of children. Gay marriage discriminates against children, as it deprives them of having both a father and a mother. 

5. Members of Parliament are duty bound to consider whether the proposed law exceeds the electoral mandate. In fact besides introducing gay marriage, it appears that the draft law is the precursor to practices such as gamete donation and surrogacy which consider children as a right of parents rather than a gift of life. 

6. The Cana Movement would like to appeal to politicians to continue introducing measures to strengthen families. In so doing, legislators should seek to enact just laws, which respect the truth, promote human dignity and the good of society as a whole. 

Stqarrija għall-Istampa 

Il-Moviment Kana, filwaqt li jinnota illi ser titressaq liġi dwar iż-żwieġ bejn persuni tal-istess sess kif kien imwiegħed fil-programm elettorali taż-żewġ partiti kbar, jemmen illi: 

1. Kull persuna kemm eterosesswali kif ukoll omosesswali jew ta' xi orjentament sesswali ieħor, għandha tiġi trattata b'rispett u b'dinjita'; 

2. Filwaqt li huwa d-dmir ta' kull leġislatur li jirregola d-drittijiet u l-obbligi bejn persuni f'forom differenti ta' relazzjonjiet, dan m'għandux jagħti lok għat-tibdil fid-definizzjoni jew fin-natura taż-żwieġ li hija għotja sħiħa u dejjiema, bejn raġel wieħed u mara waħda, li minn natura tagħha tfittex il-ġid tal-miżżewġin kif ukoll it-tnissil u l-edukazzjoni tal-ulied. Lanqas m'għandu jwassal għat-tneħħija għal kull referenza għar-“raġel” u “mara”, “missier” u “omm” li t-tnejn għandhom rwoli importanti u kumplementarji fit-tnissil u t-trobbija tal-ulied; 

3. L-Ugwaljanza quddiem il-liġi m'għandhiex tkun pretest biex niċħdu d-differenzi u l-kumplimentarjeta'. Liġijiet li jiddistingwu bejn forom diversi ta' relazzjonijiet bħal m'huma il-koabitazzjoni, l-unjoni ċivili u ż-żwieġ m'humiex diskriminatorji, imma jirrikkonixxu u jirrispettaw id-differenzi, l-aktar fi żmien fejn niċċelebraw il-pluraliżmu u d-diversita; 

4. Fir-regolamentazzjoni tar-relazzjonijiet personali, l-istat għandu l-obbligu illi jqis l-aħjar interessi tat-tfal. Żwieġ bejn koppja tal-istess sess jiddiskrimina kontra l-ulied il-għaliex iċaħħadhom milli jkollhom kemm omm kif ukoll missier; 

5. Id-deputati parlamentari għandhom id-dover
translation:
Press release

Whilst Referring to the introduction of Gay Marriage which was pledged by both political parties in their respectoral manifestos, the Cana Movement Affirms the following.

1. Every person, regardless of his sexual orientation or life preferences should be treated with Utmost Dignity.

2. equality before the law should not be a pretext to deny differentiation.Where it is the legislator's duty to regulate different forms of relationships, this is not a justification to redefine marriage or attempt to alter the nature of marriage.Marriage was, is and remains a life- long Union between one man and one woman which by its nature is intended towards the procreation of child and the well-being of spouses.Neither should the proposed law promote deletion of references to man and woman, husband and woman, both of which have important and complementary roles in the procreation and bringing up of child.

3. Laws which distinguish between different forms of relationships such as co-habitation, civil unions and marriage are not discriminatory.On the contrary they acknowledgment and respect differences, particularly in a society which celebrates pluralism and diversity.

4. The state is duty bound to consider the best interests of children.Gay marriage discriminates against children, as it deprives them of having both a father and a mother.

5. Members of parliament are duty bound to consider whether the proposed law exceeds the electoral mandate.In fact besides introducing gay marriage, it appears that the draft law is the precursor to practices such as gamete donation and surrogacy which considering children as a right of parents rater than a gift of life.

6. The Cana Movement Would Like To Appeal To Politicians To Continue Introducing Measures To Strengthen Families.In so doing, legislators should seek to enact just laws, which respect the truth, promote human dignity and the good of society as a whole.

Press

The Cana Movement, noting that a law on same-sex marriage will be tabled as promised in the election program of the two major parties, believes that:

1. Any person both heterosexual and gay or other sexual orientation shall be treated with respect and dignity;

2. While it is the duty of each legislator to regulate the rights and obligations between people in different forms of relations, this should not give rise to changes in the definition or nature of the marriagewhich is a full and lasting grant, between one man and one woman, who from her nature seeks the good of the spouses as well as the breeding and education of the children.Nor should it lead to the removal of every reference to the "man" and "woman", "father" and "mother" who both play important and complementary roles in the breeding and upbringing of children;

3. Equality before the law shall not be a pretext for denying differences and complementarity.Laws that distinguish between various forms of relationships such as cohabitation, civil union and marriage are not discriminatory, but recate and respect differences, especially at a time where we celebrate pluralism and dthe diversity;

4. In regulating personal relations, the State has an obligation to take into account the best interests of the child.A same-sex marriage discriminates against the children because they deprive them of having both a mother and a father;

5. MPs have a duty

text:
We confirm that candidates can now book again for their tests. If you already booked in another city/country, you can reschedule the appointment following the instructions. 

Please don't hesitate to contact Prometric for help. 

Wara l-għeluq tal-ewwel fażi tal-applikazzjoni tal-kompetizzjoni, u kif stabbilit fl-Avviż ta' kompetizzjoni (ara l-punt 2), l-EPSO, bi ftehim mal-istituzzjonijiet tal-UE, eżamina bir-reqqa d-dikjarazzjonijiet tal-kandidati rigward l-għarfien tagħhom tal-24 lingwa uffiċjali tal-UE. 

Baqa' biss ġimgħa u għalhekk wasal il-ħin biex tiddeċiedi x'tip ta' applikant tixtieq tkun. Li tħalli għall-aħħar mument bir-riskju ta' komplikazzjonijiet jew li tuża dan il-ftit żmien li baqa' billi tqatta' ftit minuti biex tlesti r-reġistrazzjoni tiegħek. 

Mill-1 ta' April, 2018 hu importanti li tiżgura li s-sistema operattiva u/jew il-brawżer tiegħek jissodisfaw ir-rekwiżiti ġodda tas-sigurtà għat-testijiet kampjun. 

Ittestja l-brawżer tiegħek u jekk tirċievi messaġġ ta' approvazzjoni aħdar “passed” m'hemm xejn aktar x'tagħmel. 

Please note that there will be a demonstration and strike of the Brussels taxi drivers on 27/03/2018. 

Traffic disruption and alterations are to be expected on the Belgian transport network, including on the roads. 

If you have an assessment centre or test appointment in Brussels on this day, we recommend that you check with your travel agency or operator and take the necessary precautions to ensure that you arrive on time.
translation:
We confirm that candidates can now book again for their tests.If you already booked in another city/country, you can reschedule the appointment following the instructions.

Please don't hesitate to contact prometric for help.

Following the closing of the first phase of the competition application, and as set out in the competition notice (see point 2), EPSO, in agreement with the EU institutions, carefully examined D-Candidate statements regarding their knowledge of the 24 official EU languages.

It only remained a week so it's time to decide what kind of applicant you want to be.Leaving for the last moment with the risk of complications or using this little time left by spending a few minutes to complete your registration.

As of April 1, 2018 it is important to ensure that your operating system and/or browser meet the new security requirements for sample tests.

Test your browser and if you receive a "passed" green approval message there is nothing more to do.

Please note that there will be a demontration and strike of the Brussels taxi drivers on 03/27/2018.

Traffic disrupting and alterations are to be expected on the Belgian Transport Network, including on the roads.

If you have an assessment center or test appointment in brussels on this day, we recommend that you check with your travel agency or operator and take the necessary precautions to ensure that you arrive on time.

text:
Plaintiff 

Defendant 

Keywords 

Unfair Contract Terms Directive, Article 2 Unfair Contract Terms Directive, Article 3, 1. Unfair Contract Terms Directive, Article 4, 1. 

Headnote 

Refusal of tribunal to take cognizance of submission that conditions of carriage are irregular. 

Facts 

Plaintiff company made a lawsuit after being surrogated in the rights of various consumers insured with it, claiming damages suffered by the said consumers following non-delivery and /or damage to luggage after flying with defendant company. Plaintiff company after undertaking its investigations had duly paid the various consumers for the damages incurred as a result of the loss/damage suffered and subsequently undertook action to recover damages it paid to the insured parties from defendant company. Defendant company made pleas opposing the claims of plaintiff, notably that none of the plaintiffs notified defendant company within the time limits established in its terms of carriage of defendant company . 

Legal issue 

The Tribunal noted that according to the International Convention of Montreal on the unification of certain rules relating to international carriage by air which regulates such matters – and which also applies to defendant company - consumers had seven days in which to file their claim for the lost/damaged luggage. Consumers immediately filed their claims using what is known Property Irregularity Report [‘PIR'] which report was immediately transmitted to defendant company. However defendant company, unlike other major airlines which use Malta's airport does not accept PIR as a valid means of filing such claims in writing. According to the terms and conditions of defendant company such claims must be made within seven days in writing directly to it and that this was done. Plaintiff company argued that the terms of carriage of defendant company were much more onerous than those of other airlines and than the norms under the Montreal Convention. Tribunal noted that whilst it results that defendant company according to its own norms makes it much more difficult for passengers to be paid damages – the role of the Tribunal is to decide the validity of such money claims on the basis of the applicable terms and conditions noting that if plaintiff company considered that the conditions imposed by defendant company when the consumers made their booking as irregular, then its complaint should be addressed before another forum and not before the Tribunal. The Tribunal therefore decided not to uphold the claims of plaintiff company.

Bl-ispejjez u bl-interessi mid-data tal-prezentata tal-avviz kontra s-socjeta' konvenuta li minn issa hija ngunta ghassubizzjoni. 

Ra r-risposta tas-socjeta' konvenuta fejn intqal illi qed topponi ghat-talba tal-hlas stante li tali talbiet huma nfondati fil-fatt u fid-dritt. 

Ra r-risposta ulterjuri tas-socjeta' konvenuta mhux opposta mis-socjeta' attrici fejn intqal, 1. Illi preliminarjament it-talba tas-socjeta' attrici

Huma rebħu żewġ logħbiet, kisbu dro' wieħed (0-0 kontra l-Inter ġewwa l-Ukrajna) u tilfu tlett logħbiet. Shakhtar skurjaw erba' gowls u sofrew tlettax. Huma ġejjin minn telfa ta' 0-6 għand Borussia Moenchengladbach u rebħa ta' 2-0 fuq Shakhtar 

INFORMAZZJONI FUQ L-UFFIĊJAL TAL-LUM

Infakkarom li llejla fi tmiem il-logħba joħroġ, il-video t' Analiżi fuq l-istazzjon uffiċjali tagħna fuq YouTube, kif ukoll li l-kollaboraturi tagħna ejjaBET.com qed jikkwotaw ir-rebħa Neroazzurra bil-kwota ta' 1.28 għaldaqstant, jekk tridu tilgħabu b' mod responsabbli żuru s-sit tagħħom mil-link mogħti mal-kwota li qed intukom.

text:
Sostituzzjoni ta 'antivirus: kif tneħħi McAfee minn laptop 

Kważi dejjem tixtri laptop b'sistema operattiva diġà installata fuqha u softwer kontra l-virus. Spiss din hija verżjoni bi prova ta 'McAfee. Meta tispiċċa d-data ta 'skadenza, għandek tneħħi l-antivirus u tinstalla l-favorit tiegħek. Il-problema tidher: kif tneħħi McAfee minn laptop? Il-punt kollu huwa li l-verżjoni bi prova mhix imneħħija b'mod standard - mill -pannell tal-kontroll. 

Kwalunkwe programm antivirus qabel l-installazzjoni jeħtieġ tneħħija kompleta tal-installat qabel, anki jekk ma jinsabx fit-taqsima "Żid jew Neħħi". U mingħajr ma twettaq din l-operazzjoni, aktar azzjonijiet huma impossibbli. 

Imma m'hemm xejn terribbli u kkumplikat f'dan. Is-soluzzjoni għall-problema ta 'kif tneħħi McAfee minn laptop hija pjuttost sempliċi. Biex tagħmel dan, tniżżel l-utilità McAfee Removal Tool mill-websajt tal-programm uffiċjali u ssalva l-fajl fi kwalunkwe post konvenjenti, per eżempju, fuq id-desktop. Issa aħna qrib l-antivirus tagħna. L-utilità hija lesta biex tmur! Mexxih. Fil-Windows 7, 8 u Vista, trid tagħmel dan f'isem l-amministratur. Wara li tlesti l-proċess, inti taqbel neċessarjament mas-sistema fil-pront biex terġa 'tibda l-kompjuter. Kollha - il-mistoqsija dwar kif tneħħi McAfee mill-laptop, hija solvuta. 

Kultant superfluwa huwa l-użu tal-programm CCleaner, iddisinjat biex jitnaddaf is-sistema ta'"żibel" akkumulat, mill-fdalijiet ta' softwer remot. Jista 'jintuża jekk, wara li terġa' tibda l-kompjuter, xorta joħroġ komponenti McAfee fuq is-sistema. 

Tista 'wkoll tuża Uninstall Tool - l-aktar qawwija, f'termini ta' ħafna professjonisti tal-kompjuter, utilità għat-tneħħija tal-programmi. Wara l-proċess tat-tneħħija, huwa jiskopri s-sistema għall-bqija tal-oġġetti, inkluż ir-reġistru, u jeqredhom. Iżda l-aktar mod korrett biex issolvi l-problema ta 'kif tneħħi McAfee minn laptop hu li tuża McAfee Removal Tool. 

Tinsiex immedjatament tinstalla programm antivirus ġdid li jipproteġi b'mod affidabbli l-apparat minn effetti ta 'ħsara u jipprevjeni lill-kompjuter mill-ħsara kkawżata mill-infezzjoni bil-virus. 

Bħalissa, hemm ħafna għodda differenti biex jiżguraw it-tħaddim sikur tat-tagħmir tiegħek. Dan l-artikolu bl-ebda mod ma jirreklama xi wieħed minnhom. Biss per eżempju, aħna niżżel liema programmi antivirus huma l-aktar komuni. Dawn huma: 

Kaspersky Internet Security; 

Dr Web; 

Norton Antivirus; 

Kull wieħed minn dawn il-programmi jista 'jitniżżel fl-intier tiegħu u jintuża mingħajr ħlas għal mill-inqas xahar. Wara dan, jekk tħobb, tħallasha u tużah. Fuq il-websajts uffiċjali tal-antiviruses kollha hemm, bħal McAfee, għodda speċjali għat-tneħħija tagħhom. 

Hemm ħafna antiviruses oħra, inkluż b'xejn. Iżda l-ideal ma jeżistix. Kollha kemm huma jittrattaw biss dawk il-vajrusis li għandhom fid-databases tagħhom. Għalhekk, huwa neċessarju li l-programmi stabbiliti jiġu aġġornati regolarment u jsegwu ċerti regoli, inkluż meta jużaw l-Internet. L-ewwelnett, ftakar li l-infezzjoni tal-kompjuter isseħħ biss meta l-fajls jinfetħu u meta tikklikkja fuq il-links. Għalhekk, ma tiftaħx fajls suspettużi ta 'sorsi mhux magħrufa u ma ssegwix rabtiet minn barranin. U - twieġeb b'mod xieraq għat- twissijiet tas-sistemi tas-sigurtà.
translation:
Antivirus Replacement: How to remove McAfee from a laptop

Almost always buy a laptop with an operating system already installed on it and anti-virus software.Often this is a trial version of McAfee.When you finish the expiry date, you should remove the antivirus and install your favorite.The problem appears: How to remove McAfee from a laptop?The whole point is that the trial version is not standard removed-from the control panel.

Any antivirus program before installation requires complete installation removal before, even if it is not in the "Add or Remove" section.And without performing this operation, more actions are impossible.

But there is nothing terrible and complicated in this.The solution to the problem of removing McAfee from a laptop is quite simple.To do this, download the McAfee Removal Tool utility from the official program website and save the file at any convenient location, for example, on the desktop.We are now close to our antivirus.The utility is ready to go!Run it.In Windows 7, 8 and Vista, you must do so on behalf of the administrator.After completing the process, you necessarily agree with the system promptly to restart the computer.All-the question of how to remove McAfee from the laptop, is resolved.

Sometimes superfluous is the use of the CCLEANer program, designed to clean the "garbage" system accumulated, from the remote software remnants.It can be used if, after restarting the computer, McAfee components will still be issued on the system.

You can also use Uninstall Tool-the most powerful, in terms of many computer professionals, utility for removing programs.Following the removal process, he discovers the system for the rest of the items, including the registry, and destroys them.But the most correct way to solve the problem of removing McAfee from a laptop is to use McAfee Removal Tool.

Do not forget to immediately install a new antivirus program that reliably protects the device from harmful effects and prevents the computer from the damage caused by virus infection.

Currently, there are many different tools to ensure the safe operation of your device.This article does not in any way advertise any of them.Only for example, we download which antivirus programs are the most common.These are:

Kaspersky Internet Security;

Dr. Web;

Norton Antivirus;

Each of these programs can be downloaded in its entirety and used free of charge for at least one month.After that, if you love, pay it and use it.On all official antiviruses websites there, such as McAfee, a special tool for removing them.

There are many other antiviruses, including for free.But the ideal does not exist.All of them only deal with those viruses they have in their databases.Therefore, it is necessary to regularly update the programs and follow certain rules, including when using the internet.First of all, remember that computer infection occurs only when the files open and when you click on the links.Therefore, do not open suspicious files of unknown sources and do not follow links from foreigners.And- respond appropriately to security system warnings.

text:
Qiegħed tqila? 

Kif tafu, kull mara għandha l-ġisem tagħha stess. Wieħed jista 'jħoss il-bidu tat-tqala mill-ewwel jum, u l-ieħor mhux se jkun jaf il-pożizzjoni interessanti tiegħu qabel ma l-fetu jiċċaqlaq. Mara li tistenna tifel tista 'tħoss xi sinjali indiretti, u forsi, b'mod ġenerali, ma tħossx xi ħaġa mhux tas-soltu. Għalhekk, kull wieħed u għomna, llum jew għada, tqum il-mistoqsija: kif inkun naf jekk jiena tqila? 

Sinjali tat-Tqala 

L-ewwel sinjal tat-tqala huwa t-tmiem tal-mestrwazzjoni. Madankollu, il-mestrwazzjoni tista 'tkun nieqsa għal raġunijiet oħra, per eżempju, b'disfunzjoni ta' l-ovarji . 

Tkabbir tas-sider, pigmentazzjoni tal-bżieżel jista 'jiġi osservat diġà fit-tieni ġimgħa tat-tqala. Ir-raġuni għal dan hija bidla fl-isfond ormonali fil-ġisem tal-mara. 

Fit-tqala, mara jista 'jkollha, l-hekk imsejħa, xhur foloz: matul it-twaħħil ta' l-embriju f'eta futura jista 'jġib uġigħ fl-addome t'isfel u l-perikli. L-istess kondizzjonijiet jistgħu jseħħu f'nisa tqal u fil-ġranet tal-mestrwazzjoni mistennija fir-raba ', fit-tmien, fit-tnax-il ġimgħa. 

Żieda fl-awrina hija sinjal ieħor ta 'tqala wara dewmien fil-menstruwazzjoni. It-twaħħil tal-bajd tal-fetu mal-ħajt ta 'l-utru huwa sinjal għall-produzzjoni tal-ġisem ta' ormon hCG speċifiku. Matul dan il-perjodu, it-test tat-tqala se juri żewġ strixxi. Dan l-avveniment iseħħ, għal darb'oħra, f'kull wieħed minna, fi żminijiet differenti. 

Toxikosi bikrija tista 'tidher biss jumejn wara l-konċepiment. U tista 'timrad mhux biss filgħodu, iżda fi kwalunkwe ħin ieħor tal-ġurnata. Dan id-dardir normalment idum sat-tieni trimestru. U xi nisa jistgħu ma jħossux din il-marda spjaċevoli. 

Sinjali indiretti tat-tqala huma tibdil fil-burdati f'daqqa f'mara, għeja, ngħas eċċessiv, bidla fit-togħma. 

Kif tistgħu taraw, hemm ħafna sinjali ta 'tqala, imma jekk kollox ikunx għalik, u wara kemm dawn jidhru - kollox huwa ferm individwali. Wieħed mill-modi l-aktar sempliċi, imma pjuttost affidabbli biex jiddetermina l-bidu tat-tqala huwa test dijanjostiku ta 'spiżerija. Barra minn hekk, tista 'tuża l-metodu ta' kejl tat -temperatura bażi . Fil-laboratorju, huwa possibbli li jiġi ddeterminat il-bidu tat-tqala bl-użu ta 'test tad-demm speċjali meħud mill-vina. Ukoll, l-iktar preċiż, kull wieħed minna jista 'jiddetermina jekk hux tqila, bħala regola, biss meta żżur ġinekologu. 

Sinjali ta 'tqala falza fin-nisa 

Illum, każijiet ta 'tqala falza fin-nisa mhumiex komuni. U dan l-istat psikofiżjoloġiku jista 'jiġi osservat fi tfajliet, kif ukoll f'nisa maturi. Mara tista 'verament tħoss tqila. 

Is-sinjali foloz tat-tqala li din il-mara tħoss jinkludu n-nuqqas ta 'menstruwazzjoni, u nawżea, żieda fl-addome u l-glandoli mammarji. Kultant din il- "mara tqila falza" tista 'wkoll tħoss il-movimenti tal-fetu. 

Mara li għamlet it-test tat-tqala f'dan l-istat probabbilment tagħti riżultat falz. Madankollu, fl-ewwel akkoljenza fil-ġinekologu bl-għajnuna ta 'modern il-fatt tan-nuqqas ta 'tqala huwa faċilment stabbilit. 

Fil-grupp ta 'riskju għal tqala falza, in-nisa x'aktarx ikunu suxxettibbli u ipokondriċi, li kellhom xokk qawwi mentali jew emozzjonali. Jistgħu jkunu bniet, paniku jibżgħu minn tqala mhux mixtieqa, jew onorevoli maturi li għal żmien twil ma jistgħux jikkonċepixxu tifel. Forsi din il-mara fl-imgħoddi kellha trabi mejta jew korrimenti. 

Jekk it-tobba tal-mara stabbilixxew tqala falza, hi teħtieġ, minbarra li żżur il-ġinekologu, ukoll is-superviżjoni tat-terapista.
translation:
Are you pregnant?

As you know, every woman has her own body.One may feel the beginning of pregnancy from the first day, and the other will not know its interesting position before the fetus moves.A woman waiting for a child may feel some indirect signs, and perhaps, in general, she does not feel something unusual.Therefore, each and every one, sooner or later, the question arises: how do I know if I am pregnant?

Signs of pregnancy

The first sign of pregnancy is the end of menstruation.However, menstruation may be lacking for other reasons, for example, with ovarian dysfunction.

Breast growth, nipple pigmentation can already be observed in the second week of pregnancy.The reason for this is a hormonal background change in a woman's body.

In pregnancy, a woman may have, the so-called, fake months: during the embryo attachment at a future age can bring pain in the lower abdomen and dangers.The same conditions can occur in pregnant women and on the days of menstruation expected on the fourth, eighth, twelve weeks.

An increase in urine is another sign of pregnancy after menstruation delays.Fetal egg attachment to the uterine wall is a signal for the body's production of a specific HCG hormone.During this period, the pregnancy test will show two strips.This event takes place, again, in each of us, at different times.

Early toxikosis can only be seen two days after conception.And you can get sick not only in the morning, but at any other time of the day.This nausea usually lasts until the second quarter.And some women may not feel this unpleasant disease.

Indirect signs of pregnancy are sudden mood changes in a woman, fatigue, excessive drowsiness, a change in taste.

As you can see, there are many signs of pregnancy, but if everything is for you, and afterwards they appear - everything is very individual.One of the simplest, but quite reliable ways to determine the onset of pregnancy is a pharmacy diagnostic test.In addition, you can use the base temperature measurement method.In the lab, it is possible to determine the onset of pregnancy using a special blood test taken from the vein.Also, most accurate, each of us can determine whether it is pregnant, as a rule, only when you visit a gynecologist.

Signs of false pregnancy in women

Today, cases of false pregnancy in women are not uncommon.And this psychophysiological state can be observed in girls, as well as mature women.A woman can really feel pregnant.

The fake pregnancy signs that this woman feels include the lack of menstruation, and nausea, increased abdomen and mammary glands.Sometimes this "false pregnant woman" may also feel the movements of the fetus.

A woman who performed the pregnancy test in this state probably gives a false result.However, in the first reception in the gynecologist with the help of a modern the fact of the lack of pregnancy is easily established.

In the risk group for false pregnancy, women are likely to be prone and hypochondric, which had a strong mental or emotional shock.They can be girls, panic afraid of unwanted pregnancy, or mature ladies who may not conceive a child for a long time.Maybe this woman in the past had dead babies or injuries.

If the woman's doctors have established a false pregnancy, she needs, in addition to visiting the gynecologist, also the supervision of the therapist.

text:
Regola tal-Medda għal Devjazzjoni Standard 

Id-devjazzjoni standard u l-medda huma t-tnejn miżuri tat-tixrid ta 'sett tad-dejta. Kull numru jgħidilna fil-mod kif id-dejta hija spazjata, peress li t-tnejn huma miżura ta 'varjazzjoni. Għalkemm m'hemmx relazzjoni espliċita bejn il-firxa u d-devjazzjoni standard, hemm regola ġenerali li tista 'tkun utli biex tirrelata dawn iż-żewġ statistiċi. Din ir-relazzjoni kultant tissejjaħ ir-regola tal-firxa għad-devjazzjoni standard. 

Ir-regola tal-firxa tgħidilna li d-devjazzjoni standard ta 'kampjun hija bejn wieħed u ieħor ugwali għal kwart tal-firxa tad-dejta. Fi kliem ieħor s = (Massimu - Minimu) / 4. Din hija formula sempliċi ħafna biex tintuża, u għandha tintuża biss bħala stima approssimattiva tad-devjazzjoni standard. 

Eżempju 

Biex tara eżempju ta 'kif taħdem ir-regola tal-firxa, se nħarsu lejn l-eżempju li ġej. Ejja ngħidu li nibdew bil-valuri tad-dejta ta'12, 12, 14, 15, 16, 18, 18, 20, 20, 25. Dawn il-valuri għandhom medja ta' 17 u devjazzjoni standard ta 'madwar 4.1. Jekk minflok aħna l-ewwel ikkalkolaw il-firxa tad-dejta tagħna bħala 25- 12 = 13, u mbagħad naqsam dan in-numru b'erba għandna l-istima tagħna tad-devjazzjoni standard bħala 13/4 = 3.25. Dan in-numru huwa relattivament qrib id-devjazzjoni standard vera u tajba għal stima approssimattiva. 

Għaliex Taħdem? 

Jista 'jidher li r-regola tal-firxa hija kemmxejn stramba. Għaliex taħdem? Ma jidhirx kompletament arbitrarju li sempliċement iddividi l-firxa b'erba? 

Għaliex ma nqassmux b'numru differenti? Fil-fatt hemm xi ġustifikazzjoni matematika għaddejja wara xeni. 

Ifakkar il-proprjetajiet tal- kurva tal- qanpiena u l-probabbiltajiet minn distribuzzjoni standard normali . Karatteristika waħda għandha x'taqsam ma 'l-ammont ta' data li taqa 'f'ċertu numru ta' devjazzjonijiet standard: 

Madwar 68% tad-data hija fi ħdan devjazzjoni standard waħda (ogħla jew inqas) mill-medja. 

Madwar 95% tad-data hija f'żewġ devjazzjonijiet standard (ogħla jew inqas) mill-medja. 

Madwar 99% huwa fi tliet devjazzjonijiet standard (ogħla jew inqas) mill-medja. 

In-numru li se nużaw għandu x'jaqsam ma'95%. Nistgħu ngħidu li 95% minn żewġ devjazzjonijiet standard taħt il-medja għal żewġ devjazzjonijiet standard 'il fuq mill-medja, għandna 95% tad-data tagħna. Għalhekk kważi d-distribuzzjoni normali tagħna għandha tinfirex fuq segment tal-linja li huwa totali ta 'erba' devjazzjonijiet standard twal. 

Mhux id-data kollha hija normalment imqassma u forma tal- qanpiena tal-qanpiena Iżda l-biċċa l-kbira tad-data hija ġġib ruħha biżżejjed li tmur żewġ devjazzjonijiet standard 'il bogħod mill-medja tal-qabdiet kważi d-dejta kollha. Nistmaw u ngħidu li erba 'devjazzjonijiet standard huma bejn wieħed u ieħor id-daqs tal-firxa, u għalhekk il-firxa diviża b'erba' hija approssimazzjoni approssimattiva tad-devjazzjoni standard. 

Użi għar-Regola tal-Medda 

Ir-regola tal-firxa hija ta 'għajnuna f'għadd ta' settings. L-ewwel, hija stima ta 'malajr ħafna tad-devjazzjoni standard. Id-devjazzjoni standard teħtieġ li l-ewwel issib il-medja, imbagħad naqqas dan il-medju minn kull punt tad-data, ikkwadra d-differenzi, żidhom, naqsam b'inqas min-numru ta 'punti tad-dejta, imbagħad (finalment) 

Min-naħa l-oħra, ir-regola tal-firxa teħtieġ biss tnaqqis wieħed u diviżjoni waħda. 

Postijiet oħra fejn ir-regola tal-firxa hija ta 'għajnuna hija meta jkollna informazzjoni mhux kompluta. Formuli bħal dak biex jiddeterminaw id-daqs tal-kampjun jeħtieġu tliet biċċiet ta 'informazzjoni: il- marġini ta' żball mixtieq, il- livell ta 'kunfidenza u d-devjazzjoni standard tal-popolazzjoni li qed nistgħu nistigraw. Ħafna drabi huwa impossibbli li tkun taf x'inhi d-devjazzjoni standard tal-popolazzjoni. Bir-regola tal-firxa, nistgħu nistmaw din l-istatistika, u mbagħad nafu kemm hu kbir għandna nagħmlu l-kampjun tagħna.
translation:
Rule rule for standard deviation

Standard deviation and range are both measures to disseminate a data set.Each number tells us in the way data is spaced, as both are a measure of variation.Although there is no explicit relationship between the range and standard deviation, there is a general rule that may be useful for relating these two statistics.This relationship is sometimes referred to as the range of the range for standard deviation.

The range of the range tells us that the standard sample deviation is approximately equal to a quarter of the data range.In other words S = (maximum - minimum) / 4. This is a very simple formula for use, and should only be used as a rough estimate of standard deviation.

Example

To see an example of how the rule of the range works, we will look at the following example.Suppose we start with the data values of 12, 12, 14, 15, 16, 18, 18, 20, 20, 25. These values have an average of 17 and a standard deviation of about 4.1.If instead we first calculate our data range as 25-12 = 13, and then share this number with four we have our standard deviation estimate as 13/4 = 3.25.This number is relatively close to the true standard deviation and good for a rough estimate.

Why work?

It may seem that the rule of range is slightly strange.Why work?Does it seem completely arbitrary to simply divide the range with four?

Why not distribute with a different number?In fact there is some math justification going on behind scenes.

It recalls the properties of the bell curve and the probabilities from a normal standard distribution.One feature has to do with the amount of data that falls within a certain number of standard deviations:

About 68% of the data is within one standard deviation (higher or less) than the average.

About 95% of the data is in two standard (higher or lower) deviations than the average.

About 99% is in three standard (higher or lower) deviations than average.

The number we will use has to do with 95%.We can say that 95% of two standard under average deviations for two standard deviations above average, we have 95% of our data.Therefore almost our normal distribution should spread to a line segment that is a total of four long standard deviations.

Not all data are usually broken down and bell bell shaped but most data are enough to go two standard deviations away from the average catches almost all data.We estimate and say that four standard deviations are approximately the size of the range, so the four-range divided is a approximate approximation of the standard deviation.

Uses for the Rule Rule

The range of the range is helpful in a number of settings.First, it is a very quick estimate of the standard deviation.The standard deviation requires you to first find the average, then reduce this medium from each data point, square the differences, add them, share with less than the number of data points, then (finally)

On the other hand, the range of the range requires only one reduction and one division.

Other places where the range of range is helpful is when we have incomplete information.Formulas like the one to determine the size of the sample require three pieces of information: the desired error margin, the level of confidence and the standard deviation of the population we are able to style.It is often impossible to know what the standard population deviation is.With the range of range, we can estimate these statistics, and then we know how great we should make our sample.

text:
Ricetta ta 'l-Insalata tal-Bean Green Marinat bi Dill 

Din l-insalata Ġermaniża tal-fażola ħadra b'xib frisk hija żieda kbira għal pjanċa tal-insalata b'porzjonijiet żgħar differenti ta 'insalata tal-karrotta, tar-ravanell u tal-ħjar. Speċjalment iġjeniċi fis-sajf, meta l-fażola ħadra friska tkun abbundanti, agħmlu darba u sservi f'ħafna insalati. Savory ħafna drabi jintuża fl-ilma tat-tisjir għall-fażola ħadra, iżda hawn, l-anella hija użata għal effett tajjeb fil-viniġreta nnifisha. 

Ħallat u Marinate l-Insalata tal-Bean Paper 

Żid fażola biex tilbes, tossing bil-mod biex tirdebba. 

Żmalt fil-friġġ għal sagħtejn u sa 3 ijiem qabel ma sservi. Huma żieda tajba għall-insalati. L-itwal li jbidu, aktar togħma l-fażola telgħet mill-ilbies.
translation:
Bean Green Marinat salad recipe with Dill

This German green bean salad with a fresh mib is a large addition to a salad plate with different portions of carrot, radish and cucumber salad.Especially refreshing in the summer, when the fresh green beans are abundant, do it once and serve in many salads.Savory is often used in cooking water for green beans, but here, the ring is used for a good effect in the virgin itself.

Mix and marinate the bean paper salad

Add beans to wear, tossing slowly to get it.

Glaze in the fridge for two hours and up to 3 days before serving.They are a good addition to salads.The longer the laying, the more taste the beans picked up from the clothing.

text:
Wara l-istaġun tax-xitwa, it-tajn jibqa 'fit-toroq, li naraw kmieni fir-rebbiegħa. Imma mhux biss il-ħmieġ jibqa 'fit-triq, fil-ġisem tagħna jiġri l-istess ħaġa - ix-xagħar jitlef shine tiegħu, il-ġilda tgħaddasha, filgħodu kultant m'hemmx saħħa biex toħroġ mis-sodda. U kollha għax matul ix-xitwa l-ġisem tagħna qed jakkumula b'mod intensiv xaħam, li huwa meħtieġ biex jipproteġi kontra l-irjiħat, u aħna nikkunsmaw ukoll ikel ta 'kaloriji ta' ħsara. U bil-bidu tal-perjodu tar-Rebbiegħa, meta l-jum ħafif isir itwal, nibdew nibnu mill-ġdid f'daqqa fir-rebbiegħa - it-tkabbir taċ-ċelloli, il-livell ta 'ormoni, il-metaboliżmu. Biex dawn il-proċessi jiffunzjonaw bis-saħħa sħiħa, hemm bżonn enerġija, u minħabba l-imblokkar ta 'tossini u tossini, l-estrazzjoni tagħha hija diffiċli. U, jibdew jiġġieldu għas-saħħa tiegħek, ibda bit-tindif ġenerali tal-ġisem tiegħek. Kif tnaddaf l-intestini, il-fwied u l-kliewi wara x-xitwa, ejja nitkellmu f'dan l-artikolu. 

Hemm tliet regoli tat-tindif: 

Żur lit-tabib biex jiddetermina l-kontra-indikazzjonijiet. 

Kull tindif jibda bl-intestini, imbagħad iwettaq tindif tal-fwied, u mbagħad inaddfu l-kliewi. Tbiddilx is-sekwenza - tista 'tagħmel ħsara lill-ġisem tiegħek. 

Tibda t-tindif immedjatament wara l-qamar sħiħ, allura tgħaddi aktar faċli. Din id-darba huwa meqjus l-aħjar li tibda kwalunkwe negozju li jinvolvi li jwarrbu xi ħaġa, b'mod partikolari, minn gagazza wara x-xitwa u mard. 

Kif nodfa l-intestini? 

L-iktar mod inokuż li teħles mill-ħmieġ huwa enema. Għal enema nużaw ilma mgħolli, żid miegħu meraq tal-lumi jew ħall tat-tuffieħ tas-sidru għal 2 litri ta 'ilma 1 tablespoon. Dawn is-sustanzi jistgħu jżommu l-ambjent meħtieġ fl-imsaren. Barra minn hekk, l-aċidu ċitriku huwa antiossidant qawwi, u l-ħall tas-sidru tat-tuffieħ huwa antisettiku. 

L-ilma fl-enema għandu jkun f'temperatura tal-kamra. Ma tistax tieħu ilma sħun għall-enema, peress li l-ilma sħun malajr jinħall ippurgar staġnat fih innifsu u għalhekk ma jitneħħiex, iżda jiġi assorbit mill-membrana mukuża u jidħol fid-demm u jikkawża avvelenament. 

L-aħjar ħin għall-proċedura huwa l-perjodu minn 5 sa 7 am, minħabba li matul dan iż-żmien l-intestin jiffunzjona b'mod aktar attiv. L-iktar attiva effettiva hija l-irkoppa. Wara li l-enema jiġi injettat fl-imsaren, imdendel għal 3-4 minuti fuq in-naħa tal-lemin sabiex l-ilma jkun jista 'jgħaddi ġo parti axxendenti tal-musrana l-kbira, imbagħad żid fuq naħa waħda, filwaqt li qiegħed fuq il-lemin - aħna jdum għal ftit minuti sabiex l-ilma jkun jista' dipartiment - għall-kaċċun. Imbagħad għandek bżonn toqgħod fil-joħolqu "Birch" u "nifs" fiż-żaqq. It-tul ta 'żmien tal-proċedura sħiħa jkun ta' 10 minuti, imbagħad erħal u jwettaq defecation. 

Il-kors kollu tat-trattament ta 'l-enema huwa ta' 14-il jum. L-ewwel ġimgħa ta 'enema nagħmlu kuljum, li jibdew mit-tieni ġimgħa, nagħmluha kuljum. Gradwalment, ir-riżultat għandu jinkiseb - l-introduzzjoni ta 'żewġ litri fl-imsaren kull darba. Jekk ma taħdimx, allura l-intestini għadhom ma ġewx approvati kompletament. Fil-futur, aħna nodfa l-imsaren darba fil-ġimgħa għal sena. 

Il-fwied jibda jitnaddaf wara 2-3 ġimgħat ta 'tindif intestinali. Barra minn hekk, qabel ma tibda t-tindif tal-fwied, ta 'min jinnota ikel xaħmi u laħam. U tlett ijiem qabel il-bidu tal-purifikazzjoni, wieħed għandu joqgħod ġuħ. F'dawn it-tlett ijiem nixorbu 2-3 litri kuljum ta 'meraq tat-tuffieħ ippreparat frisk. Il-proċedura nnifisha ssir filgħaxija minn 19-il siegħa. 

Biex nibdew, nieħdu banju sħun: se jirrilassaw il-muskoli lixxi tal-kanali tal-bili. Ahna nippreparaw flixkun tal-ilma sħun u ndaqsu mal-lemin ma 'xugaman: fuq il-kustilja u ż-żona subkostali (dan huwa s-sit tal-projezzjoni tal-marrara). U huwa saħansitra aħjar li tissewwa

text:
Aħmar Stag Lemonade Cocktail Recipe 

Il-Lemonade Stag Aħmar, flimkien mal- Punch tal-Frott Jim Beam , huma żewġ għażliet sbieħ għall- puntelli tal -whisky biex iservu fil-partijiet tar-rebbiegħa u tas-sajf. Din hija waħda sempliċi ħafna u għadha pjuttost Delicious fl-istess ħin, li dejjem hija ħaġa tajba għall-ospitanti tal-parti okkupata. 

F'dan il-każ, il-bourbon b'togħma taċ-ċirasa, Red Stag, huwa mqabbad mal-frawli u l-luminata, u bil-finitura tas-soda jinħoloq punch iqarmeċ, flavorful u iġjeniku. Ukoll, tista 'faċilment tibni dan f'ħġieġ twil għal servizz wieħed jekk tixtieq.
translation:
Red Stag Lemonade Cocktail Recipe

The red lemonade stag, along with the fruit punch Jim Beam, are two beautiful options for the whiskey punches to serve in the spring and summer parts.This is a very simple one and still quite delicious at the same time, which is always a good thing for the host of the busy party.

In this case, the cherry-flavored bourbon, Red Stag, is connected to the strawberries and lemonade, and with the soda finish creates a crisp, flavorful and hygienic punch.Also, you can easily build this in a long glass for one service if you wish.

text:
X'inhi spermatogenesis? Definizzjoni, perjodi 

Fil-ġisem tan-nisa u l-irġiel, il-proċess ta 'maturazzjoni taċ-ċelloli sesswali qiegħed isir b'mod kontinwu. U jekk ma 'l-onorevoli kollox f'dan ir-rigward huwa pjuttost jinftiehem, allura l-irġiel jibqgħu misteru. Mhux probabbli li xi ħadd bogħod mill-mediċina jaħseb serjament dwar x'inhu l-ispermatoġenesi. Iżda biex ikun hemm idea ġenerali jkun tajjeb għat-twessigħ ta 'l-għarfien ġenerali u fehim aħjar tal-fiżjoloġija proprja. 

Definizzjoni 

Biex tibda din id-digressjoni improvizzata fil-bijoloġija u l-istoloġija hija aħjar mill-bażi teoretika. Allura, x'inhi spermatogenesis? Dan huwa l-proċess, li l-prodott finali tiegħu huwa spermatozoa. L-istadji kollha tiegħu huma kkontrollati mill-ormoni u s-sistema nervuża. 

Kull ċiklu jdum madwar disgħin jum. Dan huwa tliet darbiet aktar minn dak tan-nisa, iżda n-numru ta 'ċelloli sesswali wkoll jogħla bosta ordnijiet ta' kobor aktar. F'kull siegħa ta 'dawn id-90 jum fid-testikoli, mitt miljun sperma attiva jimmaturaw. It-temperatura l-aktar komda għal dan il-proċess hija ta'34-35 grad Celsius. 

L-ispermaġenesi tista 'tiġi kondizzjonalment maqsuma fi tliet fażijiet, jew perjodu: 

- proliferazzjoni; - meiosis; - spermiogenesis. 

Perjodi 

X'inhi spermatogenesis? Huwa proċess sekwenzjali li għandu stadji u stadji. Bijoloġisti jiddistingwu erba 'tipi ta' bidliet fit-tessuti: 

Dan kollu jiġri fit-tubi seminiferous li jinsabu ġewwa l-testikoli. Is-saff ta 'barra taċ-ċelloli li jiffurmaw il-ħitan tat-tubuli huwa spermogonja. Huma kontinwament jiddividu mitotikament. Dan il-proċess jibda qabel it-twelid tat-tarbija u jdum sa ħamsa u għoxrin sena. Iċ-ċelloli huma maqsuma b'mod tant intensiv li dan il-perjodu ta 'żmien jissejjaħ il-perjodu ta' riproduzzjoni. 

Wara l-bidu tal-pubertà, l-ispermatogonja hija maqsuma f'żewġ gruppi: 

- dawk li jkomplu jaqsmu; - dawk li jiċċaqalqu lejn iċ-ċentru tat-tubu, fiż-żona tat-tkabbir. 

F'post ġdid, iċ-ċelloli jikbru fid-daqs, għandhom ċitoplasma b'ħafna nutrijenti. Mill-ispermatogonja jgħaddu għal spermatocytes tal-ewwel ordni. F'dan il-perjodu ta 'spermatogenesis, minn kull spermatocyte, żewġ ċelloli bniet huma ffurmati, u spermidi huma diġà miksuba minnhom. 

Imbagħad l-ispermidi huma distribwiti b'mod uniformi tul it-testikolu, inforrah minn ġewwa. U maż-żmien huma jimmaturaw gradwalment għall-isperma, li jaqgħu fil-vas deferens, u mbagħad fil-uretra. 

Proliferazzjoni 

Fuq il-membrana prinċipali tat-tubi seminiferous hemm spermatogonja, li n-numru tiegħu fil-ħin tal-pubertà jista 'jilħaq biljun. Skond il-karatteristiċi morfoloġiċi tagħhom, huma maqsuma: 

L-ispermatogonja skura hija riserva, huma fi stat inert sal-mument meta għandhom bżonn (wara marda serja jew radjazzjoni). Iċ-ċelloli ħfief jinqasmu kontinwament mitotikament, u joħolqu kemm ċelloli ta 'tip A u B. 

Bħala riżultat ta 'spermatogenesis fil-perjodu embrijoniku u mill-mument tat-twelid sa 14-il sena, ġabra sinifikanti ta' ċelluli li jakkumulaw fl-isperma akkumulat fl-irġiel. Dan jipprovdilhom tul ta 'żmien itwal tal-fertilità milli għan-nisa (300 bajda biss, u ma jaqsmux). 

Meiosis: spermatogenesis 

Spermatogonia, relatata ma 'ċelloli tat-tip B, hija l-ewwel diviża diversi drabi bil-mitosi u trasformata f'permatocyte ta' l-ewwel ordni. Din iċ-ċellola, min-naħa tagħha, hija wkoll maqsuma, imma mhux indaqs, iżda meiosis. Fl-aħħar tal-ewwel stadju, żewġ ċelloli bint huma ffurmati - spermatocytes tat-tieni ordni, li kull wieħed minnhom fih sett ta 'kromosomi. It-tieni stadju jitlesta billi jinkisbu żewġ espermidi minn kull spermatocyte. 

B'kollox, erba 'ċelloli ġodda jinkisbu minn wieħed. Kull wieħed minnhom għandu sett haploid ta 'kromożomi u fil-futur jista' jipparteċipa fil-fertilizzazzjoni tal-bajd. 

Spermiogenesis 

Id-differenza bejn l-ispermaġenesi u l-oġenesi hi li fil-fażi finali għandu jkun hemm kemm ċelloli żgħar li fihom informazzjoni ġenetika kemm jista 'jkun, mhux biss waħda, iżda kbira u sħiħa ta' nutrijenti.
