What is spermatogenesis?Definition, periods

In the body of women and men, the process of ripening sexual cells is continuous.And if with the ladies everything in this regard is quite understandable, then men remain a mystery.It is unlikely that someone away from medicine is seriously thinking about what spermatogenesis is.But to have a general idea to be good for broadening the general knowledge and a better understanding of own physiology.

Definition

To start this improvised digression in biology and stology is better than the theoretical base.So, what is spermatogenesis?This is the process, the final product of which is spermatozoa.All its stages are controlled by hormones and nervous system.

Each cycle lasts about ninety days.This is three times more than that of women, but the number of sex cells also rises many more orders.In each hour of these 90 days in the testes, one hundred million active sperm ripen.The most comfortable temperature for this process is 34-35 degrees Celsius.

Spermagenesis can be conditionally divided into three phases, or period:

- proliferation;- Meiosis;- spermiogenesis.

Period

What is spermatogenesis?It is a sequential process that has stages and stages.Biologists distinguish four types of tissue changes:

All this happens in the seminiferous tubes located inside the testicles.The outer layer of the cells that make up the walls of the tubes is spermogonia.They constantly divide mitotically.This process begins before the birth of the baby and lasts up to twenty-five years.Cells are divided so intensely that this time period is called the reproduction period.

After the beginning of puberty, spermatogonia is divided into two groups:

- those who continue to share;-those moving to the center of the tube, in the growing area.

In a new place, the cells grow in size, have a nutrient-rich cytoplasm.From spermatogonia they move on to first-order spermatocytes.In this period of spermatogenesis, from each spermatocyte, two girls cells are formed, and spermids are already obtained from them.

Then the spermids are uniformly distributed during the testicle, Inforrah from the inside.And over time they gradually ripen for sperm, falling into the vas deferens, and then in the urethra.

Proliferation

On the main membrane of seminiferous tubes is spermatogonia, the number of which at the time of puberty can reach a billion.According to their morphological characteristics, they are divided:

Dark spermatogon is a reserve, they are in an inert state until they need (after a serious illness or radiation).The lightweight cells are continuously divided, creating both type A and B cells.

As a result of spermatogenesis in the embryonic period and from the moment of birth to 14 years, a significant collection of cells accumulating in sperm accumulated in men.This provides them with a longer period of fertility than for women (only 300 eggs, and do not share).

Meiosis: spermatogenesis

Spermatogonia, related to type B cells, is first divided several times by mitosis and transformed into first-order permatocyte.This cell, in turn, is also divided, but not equal, but meiosis.At the end of the first stage, two daughter cells are formed-second-order spermatocytes, each containing a set of chromosomes.The second stage is completed by obtaining two expert from each spermatocyte.

In total, four new cells are obtained from one.Each of them has a haploid set of chromosomes and in the future can participate in egg fertilization.

Spermiogenesis

The difference between spermagenesis and ogenesis is that in the final phase there should be as many small cells containing genetic information as much as possible, not only one, but a large and full of nutrients.

Spazjużi u komdu "Hotel Viking" (it-Turkija), li jinsabu tul il-tarf nett tal-Baħar Mediterran. Il kumpless tal-lukanda, li jkopru żona ta 13,000 metru kwadru, ikkaratterizzat minn stil arkitettoniku mhux tas-soltu u d-disinn oriġinali. servizz ta 'kwalità, programm ta' divertiment varjat, seascape charming u ż-żona xeniċi se tissodisfa vjaġġaturi ta 'kull età. 

deskrizzjoni 

"Viking Hotel" (it-Turkija) inbniet fl-2009. Il-kumpless jikkonsisti l-oriġinali mfassla mill sitt sulari bini prinċipali u 3 sulari bini. Il-kumpless tinsab 30 km mill-ċentru resort ta Alanya u 15 km mill-villaġġ ta 'Manavgat. L-ajruport internazzjonali fil-qrib huwa ta'90 km 'il bogħod. 

kmamar

ikel

Fuq is-sit fih ukoll seba bars ma 'firxa wiesgħa ta' xorb. 

Servizzi u Divertiment 

servizz impekkabbli minn sena għal sena tattira vjaġġaturi Turkija. Lukanda "Viking", ritratt minnhom huma murija fuq din il-paġna għandu l-kumditajiet għal żjara komda għall-mistednin tiegħu. Fil-lukanda hemm ipparkjar, taksi, kiri tal-karozzi, fotokopjar, kunsinna ikel, faks, l-uffiċċju tat-tabib, kamra tal-konferenzi, kamra tal-ħażna bagalji, ċinema, ħwienet, karaoke, kafetterija internet, parrukkier, kambju tal-munita, beauty salon, disco, sawna, laundry, dry cleaning u banjijiet Torok. It-turisti jistgħu jżuru varjetà ta 'klassijiet fitness u aerobics akkwa, basketball logħob, billiards, darts, volleyball bajja, tennis tabella, isports l-ilma. fil-lukanda fil-programm ta 'divertiment filgħaxija, ħajjin mużika. Fil-lukanda topera slot machines, hemm lok massaġġi. Hija toffri viżitaturi erba pools. Hemm ilma park żgħir ma pjastri. 

bajja 

"Viking Hotel" (it-Turkija) huwa biss 50 metru mill-baħar. Hija għandha bajja privata tagħha stess (ramel u ċagħaq). Log fil-baħar - fuq il-catwalk. Saqqijiet, sodod tax-xemx u umbrelel huma pprovduti mingħajr ħlas. 

tfal

Kif tagħmel mejl tat-tadam mill-ġenbejn 

It-tkabbir tat-tadam ta 'isfel ma jkunx għal kulħadd. Mdendlin, b'ħamrija umda, barmil tat-tadam rasu 'l isfel li jista' faċilment jiżen 50 lira, mhijiex l-aktar ħaġa faċli. Metodu wieħed huwa li ż-żewġ ganċijiet tar-rgħajja jiġu mwaħħla ma 'biċċa ta' rebar, saqajn mitluqa fl-art għal tisħiħ. 

Hemm ftit modi oħra biex jaqbad rasu t-tadam. Xi nies iwaqqfu l-bramel tagħhom minn strutturi kwadri magħmula minn raġġi ta 'erba' sa erba '- li jixbħu l-għan tal-hockey mingħajr ix-xibka - li hija soluzzjoni tajba jekk għandek kamra fit-tarzna tiegħek u tista' tbatti l-erba ' l-art. 

Jekk għandek ħajt f'żona full-sun, tista 'tehmeż sunnara lejn id-dar tiegħek, jew porch, imma kun żgur li l-ganċ u l-viti huma iebsa biżżejjed biex iżommu l-piż tal-barmil tiegħek. 

It-tadam huwa min iħobb ix-xemx u jeħtieġ mill-inqas 6 sigħat ta 'dawl tax-xemx kuljum, sabiex kun żgur li tħalli l-impjant tat-tadam tiegħek fejn se tikseb ħafna dawl tax-xemx. Huwa faċli li jiġi stmat iżżejjed kemm ix-xemx tilħaq żona, għalhekk mhux biss tassumi jew tirbaħ xi żona li qed tikkunsidra. Kun ċert li jkollok biżżejjed xemx billi timpedixxi l-ħin kemm ix-xemx qed tolqot iż-żona billi tuża għassa jew tuża kalkolatur tax - xemx. 

Il-varjetà tat-tadam hija partikolarment importanti jekk qed tikberha 'l isfel. Inti tista 'tixtieq li twaħħal ma' tadam taċ-ċirasa minħabba li xi tadam akbar huwa tqil wisq meta jkun misjur u l-piż tal-frott jista 'jkisser l-impjant tat-tadam li jaqa' taħt. 

Bramel: Tista 'tikseb barmil abjad ta' 5 gallun mill-biċċa l-kbira tal-ħwienet tal-ħardwer. Tista 'wkoll tkun tista' tikseb bramel b'xejn minn fran jew ristoranti. 

Bil-sikkina ta 'l-utilità tiegħek, aqta' b'attenzjoni toqba tad-drenaġġ fil-barmil li huwa ta 'madwar 2 pulzieri fid-dijametru. Ma għandux għalfejn ikun pulit jew eżatt. Tista 'tuża ċ-ċirku fuq il-qiegħ tal-barmil tiegħek bħala gwida biex tagħmel it-tqattigħ aktar faċli u tista' tagħżel li tnaqqas erba 'toqob żgħar fil-qiegħ tal-barmil għal drenaġġ żejjed. 

Tista 'wkoll tnaqqas ftit toqob żgħar fil-livell tal-barmil biex tgħin fiċ-ċirkolazzjoni ta' l-arja. 

Jekk qed tagħmel Cover dekorattiv, Miżura Bucket tiegħek 

Jekk inti se tagħmel kopertura dekorattiva, kejjelha issa. Kejjel minn taħt ix-xoffa tal-barmil sax-xifer ta 'isfel, kif ukoll iċ-ċirkonferenza tal-barmil tiegħek. 

Nagħmlu Qoxra Dekorattiva għall-Mħawla tat-Tadam 'l barra 

Aqta 'drapp tiegħek biex jitwaħħal mal-barmil, imma ħalli mill-inqas doċċa ta' 2 pulzieri f'wisa '. Skont it-tip ta 'drapp li qed tuża, jista' jkollok timtedd it-truf biex tikseb ħarsa nadifa li ma tiħux fraġli, iżda bi drapp taż-żejt tista 'tħalli t-tarf mhux maħdum. L-użu ta 'sikkina tal-utilità b'rigal straight-edge tal-metall huwa mod tajjeb biex tikseb tarf iqarmeċ. 

Iġbed it-tarf il-qasir tad-drapp tiegħek fuq in-naħa tal-barmil billi tuża tejp li ma jgħaddix ilma minnha, imbagħad wrap drapp sewwa madwar il-barmil. 

Agħmel ċirku ta 'tejp bil-ġenb li jwaħħal iħares' il barra biex iwaqaf il-flap tal-bizzilla fuq il-biċċa li int qabel taped. 

Imsaħ Tape tal-Plastik Madwar Upside Down Tikketta tat-tadam 

Biex tkompli ssegwi l-għata fuq il-barmil, tista 'tie żigarella tal-plastik sewwa madwar l-impjant. Tista 'tie jew tejp it-truf taċ-ċinturin. 

Uża l-Iskrining tal-plastik biex iżommu 'l barra mit-tadam fit-Tarzna 

Biex tgħin biex iżżomm l-impjant u l-ħamrija tiegħek fil-barmil, imma ħalli l-ilma barra, aqta 'biċċa skrin tal-plastik biex tiffittja l-qiegħ tal-barmil.

How to make tomato table from the hips

The growth of lower tomatoes is not for everyone.Hanging, with moist soil, a down tomato barrel that can easily weigh 50 pounds, is not the easiest thing.One method is to attach the two hooks of the shepherds to a piece of rebar, feet loose in the ground for reinforcement.

There are a few other ways to catch tomatoes.Some people stop their buckets from square structures made of four to four rays-resembling the hockey goal without the net-which is a good solution if you have a room in your yard and you can drain thethe four ground.

If you have a wall in a full-sun area, you can attach a hook to your home, or porch, but be sure that the hook and screws are tough enough to keep the weight of your bucket.

Tomatoes are sun lovers and need at least 6 hours of sunlight a day, so be sure to leave your tomato plant where you will get a lot of sunlight.It is easy to overestimate how much the sun reaches an area, so not just assume or win an area you are considering.Make sure you have enough sun by preventing the time as the sun is hit by using a watch or using a sun calculator.

The variety of tomatoes is particularly important if you grow it down.You may want to stick to cherry tomatoes because some larger tomatoes are too heavy when ripe and the weight of the fruit can break down the tomato plant that falls underneath.

Buckets: You can get a 5 gallon white barrel from most hardware stores.You may also be able to get free buckets from frames or restaurants.

With your utility knife, carefully cut a drainage hole in the bucket which is about 2 inches in diameter.It does not have to be neat or accurate.You can use the ring on the bottom of your bucket as a guide to making cutting easier and you can choose to cut four small holes at the bottom of the bucket for over-drainage.

You can also reduce a few small holes at the bucket level to help with air circulation.

If you are making a decorative cover, measure your bucket

If you are going to make decorative cover, measure it now.Measure from below the lip of the bucket to the lower edge, as well as the circumference of your bucket.

Making a decorative shell for the tomato planters out

Cut your fabric to attach to the bucket, but leave at least a 2-inch shower in width.Depending on the type of fabric you are using, you may have to lie down the edges to get a clean look that does not take fragile, but with an oil cloth you can leave the rough edge.Using a utility knife with a straight-edge gift is a great way to get a crisp edge.

Pull the short end of your fabric on the side of the bucket using a waterproof tape, then wrap a cloth tightly around the bucket.

Make a adhesive side tape ring looking out to stop the lace flap on the piece you have before taped.

Wipe plastic tape around upside down tomato label

To continue tracking the cover on the bucket, you can tighten a plastic ribbon tightly around the plant.You can tie or tape the edges of the belt.

Use plastic screening to keep out of tomatoes in the yard

To help keep your plant and soil in the bucket, but leave the water out, cut a piece of plastic screen to fit the bottom of the bucket.

text:
Document 62019CJ0223 

Judgment of the Court (Third Chamber) of 24 September 2020.#YS v NK.#Request for a preliminary ruling from the Landesgericht Wiener Neustadt.#Reference for a preliminary ruling – Equal treatment in employment and occupation – Directives 2000/78/EC and 2006/54/EC – Scope – Prohibition of indirect discrimination on grounds of age or sex – Justifications – National legislation providing for an amount to be withheld from pensions paid directly to their recipients by undertakings in which the State has a majority participation and for the cancellation of the indexation of the amount of those pensions – Articles 16, 17, 20 and 21 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union – Applicability – Discrimination on grounds of property – Infringement of the freedom of contract – Infringement of the right to property – Article 47 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights – Right to an effective remedy.#Case C-223/19. 

Sentenza tal-Qorti tal-Ġustizzja (It-Tielet Awla) tal-24 ta' Settembru 2020. YS vs NK AG. Talba għal deċiżjoni preliminari, imressqa mil-Landesgericht Wiener Neustadt. Rinviju għal deċiżjoni preliminari – Ugwaljanza fit-trattament fil-qasam tal-impjieg u tax-xogħol – Direttivi 2000/78/KE u 2006/54/KE – Kamp ta' applikazzjoni – Projbizzjoni ta' diskriminazzjoni indiretta bbażata fuq l-età jew fuq is-sess – Ġustifikazzjonijiet – Leġiżlazzjoni nazzjonali li tipprevedi taxxa fuq il-pensjonijiet imħallsa direttament lill-benefiċjarji tagħhom minn impriżi kkontrollati fil-parti l-kbira mill-Istat kif ukoll it-tneħħija tal-indiċjar tal-ammont tal-pensjonijiet – Artikoli 16, 17, 20 u 21 tal-Karta tad-Drittijiet Fundamentali tal-Unjoni Ewropea – Applikabbiltà – Diskriminazzjoni bbażata fuq il-proprjetà – Ksur tal-libertà kuntrattwali – Ksur tad-dritt għall-proprjetà – Artikolu 47 tal-Karta tad-Drittijiet Fundamentali tal-Unjoni Ewropea – Dritt għal rimedju effettiv. Kawża C-223/19.

text:
Filosofija Vapur ... u jekk kien? 

Id-dinja jaf l-ismijiet ta M. Ilyin, Berdyaev, Sorokin, S. Bulgakov. Dawn in-nies Russu, ħassieba u filosofi li saru eżiljati pajjiżhom. Huma u bosta rappreżentanti oħra tal-intelligentsia Russu ħarbu Russja fil-ħarifa ta'1922 taħt pressjoni. Filosofija Vapur - isem kollettiv mogħti liż-żewġ bastimenti baħħru mir-Russja għall-Ġermanja, li fuqu kienu mkeċċija mill-intellettwali tal-pajjiż, li ma jaċċettawx l-ideoloġija Bolshevik. 

Kien hemm pubblikazzjonijiet reċenti u dokumentarji, li juru li Steamer filosofiku - hija invenzjoni ta 'l-Bolsheviks, dan mhuwiex verament tant persuna tkun intbagħtet. Għan ewlieni ta 'l-hype li l-gvernijiet tal-Punent jemmnu li l-avversarji tar-reġim Bolshevik intitolat għall-Ewropa. U fil-fatt, kien hemm Spies, scouts, li kienu hemm preparazzjoni għall-rivoluzzjoni dinja, li mbagħad ħlomt Russu Soċjali-Demokratiċi. 

Ejjew ddur lejn l-fatti. Fil-bidu 20-jiet fir-Russja stabbiliet reġim awtoritarju immexxi minn Lenin. ħajja politika kienet taħt il-kontroll sħiħ, imwettaq każijiet ta 'profil għoli kontra l-Soċjalisti-Revolutionaries u Mensheviks, sistema ideoloġiċi waħda ffurmata. Iżda l-ħajja kulturali u spiritwali huwa bħal hinn minn din il-politika komuni. Età Fidda, li jinnomina żieda fl-arti, ħsieb filosofiku u xjentifiku, kompla l-iżvilupp tagħha billi inerzja. Intellettwali, ħsieb ħielsa, l-abbiltà li jevalwaw b'mod kritiku l-ideoloġija komunista, il-periklu għar-reġim emerġenti. Aqra "Qalb ta 'Kelb", ħafna affarijiet se jsir ċar dwar il-pożizzjoni ta' ħsieb nies ta 'dak iż-żmien. 

F'ċirkustanzi bħal dawn, il-Kumitat Eżekuttiv Ċentrali All-Russu adotta l-liġi "Fuq tkeċċija amministrattiva", li huwa konklużjoni loġika u sar Steamer filosofiċi. 1922 kienet ikkaratterizzata mill-arresti ta 'intellettwali suspettati tendenzi counterrevolutionary, li quddiemha saqajh għażla: jew "volontarja" tluq jew ħabs jew saħansitra eżekuzzjoni. 

Skond il-memoirs Nikolaya Berdyaeva huwa ċar li l-ipproċessar imwettaq "volontarji" immigranti. Wara li qattgħu ġimgħa fil-ħabs, Berdyaev iffirmat irċevuta li kieku ma kienx jirritorna lejn pajjiżhom tiegħu. Inkella nixtieq ġew maqtula. Proċess simili ħa post moons ħafna Nikolai Alexandrovich. 

Matul Russja ffurmaw il-listi ta 'undesirables għall-gvern il-ġdid. Fost dawn kienu tobba, agronomisti, inġiniera, artisti u filosofi. L-aħħar għamel kontribuzzjoni speċjali għad-dinja tal-filosofija, is-soċjoloġija, ix-xjenza politika. 

Steamer filosofiku totali ħa mir-Russja madwar 200 minn rappreżentanti aqwa tagħha. Tracing-mod ta 'ħajja ta' ħafna, niftakru li dawn kienu nies onesti, mhux l-għonja, għal ħafna minnhom, l-emigrazzjoni ma kienx faċli, u sa l-aħħar ta 'jiem li kienu Russu fl-ispirtu. Ordeal li waqgħet fuq is-sehem tar-Russja fil 1941-1945., Mhux se jħallu indifferenti imkeċċi mill-pajjiż. Kemm huma għenu lill-pajjiżu u l-armata Sovjetika fil-ġlieda kontra faxxiżmu. 

Il-bastiment, li mkeċċi immigranti, imsejħa "dgħajsa filosofiku". 1922 kienet l-aħħar għalihom fir-Russja. L-unika eċċezzjoni hija l-filosfu reliġjużi u storiku Lev Karsavin. Fl-aħħar ta 'l-20s huwa mċaqlaq għal-Litwanja, li dalwaqt jiddawru parti mill-Unjoni Sovjetika. Fl-1950, Leo Platonovich kien arrestat fl-età ta'68 sena fuq akkużi ta' konfoffa kontra l-Sovjetika u kkundannat għal 10 snin fil-ħabs. Huwa miet fil-kustodja. 

Dawn huma l-fatti. Forsi dgħajsa filosofiku u saq ftit nies li kellhom ir-rwol ta 'aġent doppja. Madankollu, il-fatt li ma tinbidilx. Huwa importanti li tirrealizza li l-bastiment kien ir-riżultat ta 'ġlieda filosofiċi għall-ġestjoni tal-kumpanija, bħala riżultat ġew eliminati imħuħ aħjar tar-Russja.
translation:
Philosophy ship ... and if it was?

The world knows the names of M. Ilyin, Berdyaev, Sorokin, S. Bulgakov.These Russian people, thinkers and philosophers have become exiled.They and many other representatives of Russian intelligents have fled Russia in the fall of 1922 under pressure.Philosophy Ship-a collective name given to both vessels sailed from Russia to Germany, on which they were expelled from the intellectual of the country, which do not accept the Bolshevik ideology.

There have been recent and documentary publications, showing that a philosophical steamer - is an invention of the Bolsheviks, this is not really so much a person being sent.The main purpose of the hype that Western governments believe that the opponents of the Bolshevik regime entitled to Europe.And in fact, there were spies, scouts, which were preparing for the world revolution, which then dreamed of Russian social-democrats.

Let us turn to the facts.In the early 20s in Russia established an authoritarian regime led by Lenin.Political life was under full control, performed high-profile cases against socialists-revolutionaries and mensheviks, a single ideological system formed.But cultural and spiritual life is like beyond this common policy.Silver age, which nominates an increase in art, philosophical and scientific thinking, continued its development by inertia.Intellectual, free thought, the ability to critically evaluate communist ideology, danger to emerging regime.Read "a dog's heart", many things will become clear about the position of thinking people at the time.

In such circumstances, the All-Russian Central Executive Committee adopted the law "on administrative dismissal", which is a logical conclusion and became a philosophical steamer.1922 was characterized by the arrests of intellectuals suspected countervolutionary trends, in front of a choice: either "voluntary" departure either in prison or even execution.

According to Memoirs Nikolaya Berdyaeva it is clear that the processing performed "volunteers" immigrants.After spending a week in prison, Berdyaev signed a receipt if he would not return to his country.Otherwise I would have been killed.A similar process replaced many moons Nikolai Alexandrovich.

During Russia they formed the lists of undesirables for the new government.Among them were doctors, agronomists, engineers, artists and philosophers.The latter made a special contribution to the world of philosophy, sociology, political science.

Total philosophical steamer has taken from Russia about 200 from its amazing representatives.Tracing the way of life of many, remembering that they were honest people, not the rich, for most of them, emigration was not easy, and by the end of days that were Russian in spirit.An ordeal that fell on Russia's share in 1941-1945., will not leave indifferent expelled from the country.Both have helped their country and the Soviet army in the fight against fascism.

The vessel, which expelled immigrants, called a "philosophical boat".1922 was the last for them in Russia.The only exception is the religious philosopher and historical Lev Korsavin.At the end of the 20s he moved to Lithuania, which will soon be part of the Soviet Union.In 1950, Leo Platonovich was arrested at the age of 68 on charges of conspiracy against Soviet and sentenced to 10 years in prison.He died in custody.

These are the facts.Perhaps a philosophical boat and drove a few people who played the role of a dual agent.However, the fact that it does not change.It is important to realize that the vessel was the result of a philosophical fight for company management, as a result better brains of Russia were eliminated.

text:
Dr Joseph Muscat iwiegħed id-dritt ta' unjoni ċivili lil koppji tal-istess sess 

Il-Kap tal-Oppożizzjoni u Mexxej Laburista Dr Joseph Muscat qal li jekk il-partit immexxi minnu jirbaħ it-tmexxija tal-gvern, ikun qed idaħħal id-dritt ta' unjoni ċivili għall-koppji tal-istess sess. “Qed nitkellmu fuq id-dritt u r-responsabbilta' ta' relazzjoni bejn żewġ persuni tal-istess sess, bħala koppja, bħala familja li jinħabbu”, qal Dr Muscat. Saħaq li l-Moviment huwa kommess li jdaħħal dawn id-drittijiet ċivili, minkejja l-kampanji ta' biża'. 

Waqt seminar organizzat mil-LGBT Labour, Dr Muscat qal li mill-gvern, il-partit laburista jwaqqaf Kunsill Konsultattiv bil-parteċipazzjoni u s-sehem tal-NGOs f'dan il-qasam, li jagħti pariri lill-gvern dwar kwistjonijiet li għandhom impatt fuq il-komunità LGBT. Bhekk qal li l-NGOs f'dan il-qasam, ikunu kkonsultati qabel u mhux wara li jkunu abbozzati l-liġijiet. 

Dr Muscat tkellem ukoll dwar twessiegħ b'mod ċar tal-poteri tal-Kummissjoni tal-Impjiegi biex ikun rifless ħarsien kontra d-diskriminazzjoni minħabba orjentazzjoni sesswali u sess, u anki dwar ħidma lejn l-iffirmar ta' Protokoll 12 li jiżgura li ma jkunx hemm diskriminazzjoni kontra persuni tal-istess sess. Qal li partit laburista jdaħħal ukoll liġi realistika li tirregola l-identifikazzjoni tal-persuni trans-gender, u wiegħed li fit-tmexxija tal-Gvern jassenja politiku b'responsabbiltà mil-libertajiet ċivili u l-ugwaljanza.
translation:
Dr. Joseph Muscat promises the right of civil union to same-sex couples

Leader of the Opposition and Labor Leader Dr Joseph Muscat said that if the party led by him wins the leadership of the Government, he would be introducing the right of civil union for same-sex couples."We are talking about the right and responsibility for a same-sex relationship, as a couple, as a family who loved them," said Dr Muscat.He stressed that the movement is committed to introducing these civil rights, despite the fear campaigns.

At a seminar organized by the LGBT Labor, Dr Muscat said that from the Government, the Labor Party would set up an advisory council with the participation and participation of NGOs in this area, advising the Government on issues they haveImpact on the LGBT community.He said that NGOs in this area would be consulted earlier and not after the laws are drafted.

Dr Muscat also spoke about clearly widening the powers of the Employment Commission to reflect protection against discrimination due to sexual orientation and gender, and even on working towards the signing of Protocol 12 which ensures that it is notThere is discrimination against same-sex people.He said that a Labor Party also introduces a realistic law regulating the identification of trans-gender people, and promised that in the leadership of the Government would assign a politician with responsibility from civil liberties and equality.

text:
Document 62019CJ0219 

Judgment of the Court (Tenth Chamber) of 11 June 2020.#Parsec Fondazione Parco delle Scienze e della Cultura v Ministero delle Infrastrutture e dei Trasporti and Autorità nazionale anticorruzione (ANAC).#Request for a preliminary ruling from the Tribunale Amministrativo Regionale per il Lazio.#Reference for a preliminary ruling – Public works contracts, public supply contracts and public service contracts – Directive 2014/24/EU – Procurement procedure for the award of a service contract – Architectural and engineering services – Article 19(1) and Article 80(2) – National legislation limiting participation solely to economic operators in certain legal forms.#Case C-219/19. 

Sentenza tal-Qorti tal-Ġustizzja (L-Għaxar Awla) tal-11 ta' Ġunju 2020. Parsec Fondazione Parco delle Scienze e della Cultura vs Ministero delle Infrastrutture e dei Trasporti u Autorità nazionale anticorruzione (ANAC). Talba għal deċiżjoni preliminar, imressqa mit-Tribunale Amministrativo Regionale per il Lazio. Rinviju għal deċiżjoni preliminari – Kuntratti pubbliċi għal xogħlijiet, għal provvisti u għal servizzi – Direttiva 2014/24/UE – Proċedura ta' aġġudikazzjoni ta' kuntratt għal servizzi – Servizzi ta' arkitettura u ta' inġinerija – Artikolu 19(1) u Artikolu 80(2) – Leġiżlazzjoni nazzjonali li tillimita l-possibbiltà ta' parteċipazzjoni biss għall-operaturi ekonomiċi li huma kkostitwiti f'ċertu forom legali. Kawża C-219/19. 

Fil-Kawża C-219/19, 

li għandha bħala suġġett talba għal deċiżjoni preliminari skont l-Artikolu 267 TFUE, imressqa mit-Tribunale amministrativo regionale per il Lazio (il-Qorti Amministrattiva Reġjonali ta' Lazio, l-Italja), permezz ta' deċiżjoni tas-16 ta' Jannar 2019, li waslet fil-Qorti tal-Ġustizzja fil-11 ta' Marzu 2019, fil-proċedura 

Din it-talba tressqet fil-kuntest ta' kawża bejn, minn naħa, Parsec Fondazione Parco delle Scienze e della Cultura (iktar 'il quddiem “Parsec”) u, min-naħa l-oħra, il-Ministero delle Infrastrutture e dei Trasporti (il-Ministeru għall-Infrastruttura u għat-Trasport) u l-Autorità nazionale anticorruzione (ANAC) (l-Awtorità Nazzjonali tal-Ġlieda Kontra l-Korruzzjoni, l-Italja) dwar id-deċiżjoni li permezz tagħha din tal-aħħar ċaħdet it-talba għall-iskrizzjoni ta' Parsec fir-reġistru nazzjonali tal-kumpanniji ta' inġinerija u ta' professjonisti awtorizzati jipprovdu servizzi ta' arkitettura u ta' inġinerija. 

Il-kuntest ġuridiku 

Skont il-premessa 14 tad-Direttiva 2014/24: 

Id-dritt Taljan 

7 

Id-decreto legislativo n. 50 – Attuazione delle direttive 2014/23/UE, 2014/24/UE e 2014/25/UE sull'aggiudicazione dei contratti di concessione, sugli appalti pubblici e sulle procedure d'appalto degli enti erogatori nei settori dell'acqua, dell'energia, dei trasporti e dei servizi postali, nonché per il riordino della disciplina vigente in materia di contratti pubblici relativi a lavori, servizi e forniture (id-Digriet Leġiżlattiv Nru 50 li Jimplimenta d-Direttiva 2014/23/UE dwar l-Għoti ta' Kuntratti ta' Konċessjoni, id-Direttiva 2014/24/UE dwar l-Għoti ta' Kuntratti Pubbliċi u d-Direttiva 2014/25/UE dwar l-Għoti ta' Kuntratti minn Entitajiet li Joperaw fis-Setturi tal-Ilma, tal-Enerġija, tat-Trasport, u tas-Servizzi Postali, u li Jirriforma l-Leġiżlazzjoni fis-Seħħ fil-Qasam tal-Kuntratti Pubbliċi għal Xogħlijiet, għal Servizzi u għal Provvisti), tat-18 ta' April 2016 (Suppliment ordinarju għall-GURI Nru 91, tad-19 ta' April 2016), jikkostitwixxi l-Codice dei contratti pubblici (il-Kodiċi tal-Kuntratti Pubbliċi). 

8

text:
Lexus ES 350 - karozzi għas-sewwieqa attivi 

Lexus ES 350 - karozza maħsuba esklussivament għal sewwieqa attivi li jippreferu l-aktar sikur u fl-iqsar ħin biex tintlaħaq id-destinazzjoni. ES għażla dekodifikazzjoni huwa l- "sedan klassi eżekuttiva." 

Lexus UE - karozza li tiffoka fuq l-Istati Uniti. F'dan il-pajjiż, din is-serje hija karozza popolari ħafna. 

Il Lexus ES 350 attwali huwa l-ħames karozzi ġenerazzjoni ta din il-marka. Pjattaforma għal dan il-mudell serva bħala Camry Toyota ma 'armi bir-reqqa sospensjoni elaborati ulterjorment u ġdid, ferm aktar b'saħħitha, bar stabilizzatur riveduta sewwa. Il Lexus ES 350 ġdid jistenna sleeker ħafna u aktar solida predeċessur tiegħu minħabba jintefqu fuq l-isforz modernizzazzjoni tiegħu u l-ħin. Mhux biss esternament, iżda wkoll internament karozza saret aktar perfetta. 

tapizzerija ġewwa disponibbli fi tliet kuluri: iswed, beige u griż. Huwa magħmul minn artab għall-mess, ġilda lixxa. Ukoll, fil-kabina hemm il-inserzjoni ta 'varjetà ta' kwalità għolja ħafna magħmula mill-plastik, filwaqt li l-bord ċentrali huwa magħmul minn speċi injam lussu. kapaċità karozza - ħames persuni. Lexus ES 350 huwa ta 'żvantaġġ partikolari fil-limitu baxx. nies tall jeħtieġ li tkun attenta biex ipoġġu fil tali karozza, u jekk il-passiġġieri tall tixtieq li tieħu ride fil-dahar tas-sedil fil-bokkaporti miftuħa, huma jew se jkollhom għall-istampa fid-dahar, jew qawwa liwja. 

Is-sewwieq tal-karozza f'tali kumdità hija garantita: mhux meħtieġ li taġġusta l-sedil u steering. Ebda problema l-sedili ta 'quddiem ma tingħatax, anki kuntrarju, se tgħin biex jirrilassaw u jbattu. Jiddependi fuq il-kundizzjonijiet tat-temp, inti tista 'ddawar fuq il-heater jew l-arja kondizzjonata. 

Ħafna fl-ES Lexus 350 mislufa ma 'Toyota: kontrolli kważi identiċi u ċentrali console. Jidraw minnhom mhux se jkun diffiċli, għalkemm huma jinsabu ta 'spiss huma skomdi. Abbord kompjuter jista 'juri informazzjoni differenti: id-data tal-GPS, multimedja player u kontroll tal-klima. 

daqs tal-magna Lexus 350-3.5 L, 277 HP taħt il-barnuża tippermetti aċċelerazzjoni sa 100 km / siegħa f'inqas minn 8 sekondi, iżda l-valur massimu mill-magna tagħha jistgħu jinħassu biss wara ċertu żmien. rota Gear tal-karozza iġib ruħu tajjeb fil-modi kollha, u l-konsum tal-fjuwil għal tali mutur huwa ta'12 litru kull 100 km. Tnejn fuq il-suq modifika tal-karozzi verżjonijiet tal Kumdità u lussu -. 

Kumdità u s-sigurtà fil serju ħafna Lexus ES 350 hija pprovduta għad-detriment ta 'awto u l-brejk artab. Il trasmissjoni vettura huwa stabbilit numru kbir ta 'sensors, analizzata l-kundizzjoni triq u ottimizzazzjoni tat-traffiku. 

Fir-rigward tal-verżjoni bażika tal-karozzi Lexus ġdida ġenerazzjoni, dan jinkludi kontroll tal-istabbiltà u s-sistema kontra l-illokkjar, power steering, sistema ta 'allarm, l-aġġustament elettroniċi sedil u steering awto-aġġustament, l-aċċess għat-tqabbid mingħajr ewlieni, fanali ta' quddiem bi-kseno u sensors tad-dawl u x-xita, u awtomatikament imsaħħna mirja.
translation:
Lexus es 350 - cars for active drivers

Lexus ES 350-car intended exclusively for active drivers who prefer the safest and in the shortest time to reach the destination.Es choice decoding is the "Sedan Executive Class."

Lexus EU - a car focusing on the United States.In this country, this series is a very popular car.

The current Lexus ES 350 is the five car generation of this brand.A platform for this model served as Camry Toyota with careful weapons further elaborated and new, much stronger, well-reviewed stabilizer bar.The new Lexus ES 350 looks very sleeker and more solid its predecessor because they spent on its modernization effort and time.Not only externally, but also internally a car has become more perfect.

Inside upholstery available in three colors: black, beige and gray.It is made from soft to touch, smooth skin.Also, in the cabin there is the insertion of a very high quality variety made of plastic, while the central board is made of luxury wood species.Car Capacity - Five people.Lexus ES 350 is a particular disadvantage in the shallow limit.Tall people need to be careful to sit in such a car, and if the tall passengers want to take a ride in the back of the seat in the open hatch, they will either have to press in the back, or bend power.

The car driver in such comfort is guaranteed: it is not necessary to adjust the seat and steering.No problem the front seats is not given, even contrary, will help relax and unwind.Depending on the weather conditions, you can turn on the heater or air conditioner.

Many in the ES Lexus 350 borrowed with Toyota: almost identical controls and central console.Get used to them will not be difficult, although they are often uncomfortable.On board a computer can display different information: GPS data, multimedia player and climate control.

Lexus engine size 350-3.5 l, 277 hp below the hood allows acceleration up to 100 km / h in less than 8 seconds, but the maximum value from its machine can only be felt after a certain time.A car gear wheel behaves well in all ways, and the fuel consumption for such a motor is 12 liters per 100 km.Two on the car modification market versions of comfort and luxury-.

Comfort and safety in very serious Lexus ES 350 is provided at the expense of self and soft brake.The vehicle transmission is established a large number of sensors, analyzed the road condition and traffic optimization.

As for the basic version of the new Lexus car generation, this includes stability control and anti-lock system, power steering, alarm system, electronic seat adjustment and self-adjustment steering, theAccess without major ignition, bi-xeno headlamps and light and rain sensors, and automatically heated mirrors.

text:
"Mafja" - restorant għal dawk li japprezzaw vacation raffinati 

Restaurant "Mafja" f'Moska se tkun għażla eċċellenti għal nies li japprezzaw interior raffinat, ikel tajjeb u atmosfera illaxkar faċli. pizza fragranti magħmula minn għaġina rqiqa, għaġin Taljan eċċellenti, inbid mulled sħun fragranti, steak mmerraq minn laħam frisk, ikkumplimentati minn ħġieġ ta 'alkoħol nobbli - kollha ta' dan ma jistax jkun biss il-muftieħ għal ikla Delicious u mili, iżda wkoll skuża perfett biex jiltaqa 'ma familja jew maħbubin ħbieb. 

Renjanti fl-atmosfera ristorant taġġusta l-pastime aktar pjaċevoli u rikreazzjoni. L-interjuri cosy, flimkien ma 'faċli biex tilgħab mużika u scents promettenti huma fl-arja, li jippermetti viżitaturi biex jirrilassaw kompletament wara ġurnata xogħol iebsa u tinsa dwar il-problemi urġenti u problemi tal-ħajja. persunal edukat u ta 'korteżija - dak li jiddistingwi minn istituzzjonijiet oħra ristorant "Mafja" f'Moska. Reviżjonijiet tal-klijenti grat biss jikkonferma dan. 

Intern u d-disinn 

Hemm, anke l-iżgħar dettal tal-postijiet ġewwa miżgħuda bl-ispirtu ta 'Chicago ħielsa u unforgettable. Dan kollu jagħmel l-atmosfera tal-ristorant fi ensemble armonjuż, tħajjar viżitaturi ma charisma tiegħu. "Mafja" - restorant fejn il-kmamar huma marbuta permezz ta 'kunċett ġenerali waħda, enfasizzat minn bosta trifles komplementari. Fuq il-ħitan tista 'tara kif il-kompożizzjoni supplenti brickwork ta clippings gazzetta, u jleqqu sostituti stampi moderni ma' ritratti fil stil retro. Fuq wieħed mill-bords għall-pittura, dekorazzjoni l-interjuri, miżbugħa Klassifikazzjoni eżawrjenti ta 'laħam, u f'wieħed mill-niċeċ disponibbli fil-ħitan hija attribut unika ta' kull gangster - magna Thompson. 

kċina 

Il-preparazzjoni skillful ta 'ikel għal dawn "live" faħam - l-istituzzjoni karta "mafja". Il-restorant huwa kważi unika fil-tip tiegħu, kif l-chef hawn jipprepara mhux biss Delicious, iżda wkoll platti utli. Kull ingredjent użat għall-preparazzjoni ta 'platti, kemm jekk laħam jew frisk ħxejjex aromatiċi, din tvarja bil freskezza u fwieħa aqwa. Il-restorant menu kulħadd se ssib xi ħaġa xierqa għalik innifsek, aqwa platt tal-laħam, soppa fit-togħma jew sekondarji dixx, deżerta eċċellenti jew tazza nbid nobbli, li jista 'sorpriża anki connoisseur togħma tiegħu. 

"Mafja" --ristorant, ibbażat fuq il-menu huma numerużi kċina Taljana, famuż għall-diversità aqwa tagħha. Hawnhekk inti tista 'kampjun l-għaġin Delicious u lasagna ma zlazi differenti: laħam, krema, faqqiegħ u oħrajn. Parti integrali mill kċina Taljana hija l-pizza. Il-restorant "Mafja" tista 'togħma bħal pizza Taljan tradizzjonali moħmija fuq qoxra rqiqa, u l-imħabba hija fil lush Russja. Il-varjetà ta 'mili għall-preparazzjoni tagħhom se timpressjona kwalunkwe viżitatur. Ukoll, ara istituzzjonijiet "Hot Menu" irrappreżentaw varjetà ta 'platti Russi u kċejjen Ewropej. Speċjalment chef Delicious dawriet borsch ma doughnuts, kif ukoll soppa tal-ħut aħmar mal-ġobon. Attenzjoni speċjali jistħoqqilha l-sezzjoni tal-menu bħala "Barbecue". Hija tippreżenta diversi tipi ta 'kebabs, kebab u vitella mmerraq, skilfully ippreparat għal "live" il-faħam. min iħobb frott tal-baħar se tkun tista 'kura lilek innifsek għal gambli, calamari u ħut grilled, grilled wkoll. 

karatteristiċi 

"Mafja" - restorant fejn inti tista 'mhux biss Delicious li jieklu, iżda wkoll biex jirrilassaw. Għal kulħadd hawnhekk hija miftuħa, moderna u cozy kamra karaoke, li tiftaħar tagħmir tekniku ta 'kwalità għolja, mhumiex inferjuri fil-karatteristiċi tiegħu, l-istituzzjonijiet professjonali ta' dan it-tip. Il-restorant taċċetta wkoll l-ordnijiet għal avvenimenti varji u banquets. Oħloq menu personalizzat għal każijiet bħal dawn biex tgħin lill-chef u l-maniġer se tagħżel l-artisti, preżentaturi u mużiċisti li jinħoloq festa

text:
Ornamenti sbieħ u Santa Claus 

L-istess bħas-sena li għaddiet, id-dar u t-tarzna tal-familja Kardashian faqqgħet id-dwal. Chris u l-bniet tiegħu lestu mhux biss il-bini, iżda s-siġar madwar. Barra minn hekk, kullimkien kien hemm statwi luxurious, li wkoll glowed b'varjetà ta 'dwal. L-istilla tal-lejla, naturalment, kienet is-Sister Kardashian. Huma fuq il-paġni tagħhom fin-netwerks soċjali stazzjonati ħafna ritratti differenti ta 'kif huma qed jieħdu pjaċir. Kim deher waqt il-vaganzi b'qatgħa ta 'quads magħmula fuq xagħar abjad u għamla, b'enfasi fuq l-għajnejn. Fir-ritratti, Kim ta'36 sena qajjem mhux biss it-tifla tiegħu Tramuntana, iżda wkoll ma' l-oħtu żagħżugħa tagħha Chloe, li issa qed tistenna t-twelid ta 'tarbija. 

Fil-microblogging tagħha Chloe kiteb dwar il-festa: 

"I love partijiet u festi. Għalija, meta l-ħbieb u l-qraba tiegħi jiġbru flimkien, waħda mill-passatempi l-aktar pjaċevoli. Mill-mod, l-aktar li nista 'ngħidlek il-partijiet tal-Milied. Jistgħu verament jinqatgħu: chat ma 'Santa Claus, tagħmel ix-xewqa l-aktar sigrieta tiegħu, biex tkun fotografat b'siġar tal-Milied wunderbare u dekorazzjoni luminuża. Din is-sena, madankollu, dan kollu m'huwiex pjaċevoli ħafna, minħabba li nixtieq nibda bl-alkoħol. Tibqa 'tbati pjuttost ftit u jerġa' nkun nista 'nagħmilha. " 

Barra minn hekk, l-istilla prinċipali tal-avveniment Kim Kardashian tkellmet ukoll dwar il-parti: 

"Jiena miġnun dwar dak kollu li qed jiġri. Għalija, il-Milied huwa okkażjoni mill-isbaħ biex igawdi dan il-qawwi, żfin sal-għodu u selfie mal-ħbieb tiegħi. Din is-sena, il-partit ta 'omm kien saħansitra iktar b'rimmijiet milli fl-2016. Grazzi lil kull min jista 'jasal għandu. I really jgawdu din il-btala. " 

Aqra wkoll 

Kien hemm ħafna, iżda Kylie, Rob u Caitlin ma kinux 

Il-parti ta 'Chris Jenner din is-sena hija impressjonanti fil-bandli tagħha, minħabba li s-sena li għaddiet il-vaganzi kienu ħafna aktar modesti. Forsi t-tort għal kulħadd kien is-serq ta 'Kim f'Pariġi u s-seclusion tagħha dwar din il-kwistjoni. Madankollu, meta wieħed iqis l-istampi li ġew imqiegħda fis-sistema soċjali din is-sena, Chris iddeċieda li ma jaħlux ħin fuq trivia u jieħu l-Milied fuq skala kbira. Waqt il-partit, Jenner stieden lill-bint amata ġdida ta 'Courtney Unes Benjim u l-ex-konjuġi Scott Dysik, minn fejn welldet lil tlett itfal, Christina Aguilera u Toni Braxton, iżda tliet membri tal-familja: Kylie, Rob u Caitlin ma dehrux fil-parti. Forsi huma biss ma għamlux lilhom infushom flimkien ma 'Kim, u forsi ma kinux mistiedna fiċ-ċelebrazzjoni.
translation:
Nice ornaments and Santa Claus

Just like last year, the home and the Kardashian family yard broke out the lights.Chris and his daughters finished not only the building, but the trees around.In addition, everywhere there were luxurious statues, which also glowed with a variety of lights.The star of the evening, of course, was the sister Kardashian.They are on their pages in social networks posted many different photos of how they are having fun.Kim appeared during the holidays with a cut of quads made on white hair and makeup, with an emphasis on the eyes.In the photos, 36-year-old Kim raised not only his daughter north, but also with her young sister Chloe, who is now waiting for the birth of a baby.

In her microblogging Chloe wrote about the holiday:

"I love parties and holidays. For me, when my friends and relatives gather together, one of the most enjoyable hobbies. By the way, the more I can tell you the Christmas parts. They can reallyCut: Chat with Santa Claus, make his most secretive desire, to be photographed with wonderful Christmas trees and luminous decoration. This year, however, all this is not very pleasant, because I would like toI start with alcohol. It will suffer quite a bit and I will be able to do it again. "

In addition, the main star of the Kim Kardashian event also spoke about the part:

"I am crazy about everything that is happening. For me, Christmas is a wonderful occasion to enjoy this strong, dance to the morning and selfie with my friends. This year, the mother's party waseven more luxurious than in 2016. Thanks to anyone who can come to it. I really enjoy this holiday. "

Also read

There were many, but Kylie, Rob and Caitlin were not

Chris Jenner's part this year is impressive in her swings, because last year the holidays were much more modest.Perhaps the fault for everyone was Kim's theft in Paris and her seclusion on this issue.However, considering the pictures that were placed in the social system this year, Chris decided not to waste time on Trivia and take on a large scale Christmas.During the party, Jenner invited the new beloved daughter of Courtney UNES Benjim and former spouses Scott Dysik, where she gave birth to three children, Christina Aguilera and Toni Braxton, but three family members: Kylie, Rob andCaitlin did not appear at the party.Maybe they just didn't do themselves along with Kim, and maybe they weren't invited to the celebration.

text:
Ix-xemx tas-sajf hija sabiħa u kollha, iżda bħala mom tiegħek x'aktarx qallek għadd ta 'drabi, trid tkun qed tipproteġi lilek innifsek b'saff ġeneruż ta' ħarsien mix-xemx! B'xorti tajba, ngħixu f'dinja fejn hemm aġġeġġi biex tavżak meta għandek bżonn tapplika saff ġdid ta 'SPF. Aqra biex titgħallem aktar dwar xi oġġetti li jintlibsu li jistgħu jagħmlu l-ġilda tiegħek favur (u tiffranka minn ħruq mix-xemx bl-uġigħ). 

Xi wħud minn dawn il-mezzi anki jgħinuk tikseb biżżejjed dawl biex tiżgura li l-livelli ta 'vitamina D tiegħek huma l-aħjar. Filwaqt li dawn l-aġġeġġi jistgħu jidhru bħala riċetta għal ħruq mix-xemx, huma jiddifferenzjaw bejn tipi differenti ta 'dawl. 

ĠUNJU 

Imsejjaħ wara xahar tas-sajf u ċċarġjat bħala "il-kowċ tas-sbuħija ġdid tiegħek", dan il-prodott huwa l-aktar stylish tal-mazz. Hija tiswa $ 129 u tidħol fi tliet għażliet ta 'kulur (platinum, deheb u gunmetal), ġbid doppju ta' dazju bħala monitor UV u bracelet chunky. Biż-żewġ sensors UVA u UVB, JUNE jittraċċa l-espożizzjoni għax-xemx tiegħek, b'metru li juri kif tkun qrib tiegħek "doża tax-xemx" kuljum (ikkalkulata skont it-tip tal-ġilda tiegħek u l-livell UV attwali. 

Hemm ukoll applajler, li turi l-indiċi kurrenti tal-UV u infakkarkom li tapplika aktar ħarsien mix-xemx. 

SunSprite 

Il-clip-on, activity-tracker- style SunSprite jieħu approċċ kemmxejn differenti biex jissorvelja l-esponiment għax-xemx tiegħek, u staqsi, "Ridt Illum Illum Illinka?" L-idea wara dan il-prodott hija li d-dawl wera li jtejjeb l-insomnja u d-dipressjoni, u l-apparat li jintlibes jimmonitorja l-luminożità ta 'kwalunkwe atmosfera partikolari, u ħallik jekk int f'żona li tista' tkun ta 'benefiċċju għas-saħħa tiegħek. SunSprite juri wkoll il-progress tiegħek lejn għan ta 'espożizzjoni ta' kuljum. 

Filwaqt li dan il-kunċett kollu jista 'jidher kontro-intuwittiv f'post dwar wearables li jipproteġu kontra l-ħsara mix-xemx, innota li SunSprite tiddiskrimina bejn diversi tipi ta' dawl, u l-apparat jindika li inti laħqet l-espożizzjoni ta 'kuljum tiegħek pjuttost malajr jekk kellek tibqa' fix-xemx fin-nofs tal-ġurnata. 

Vjola 

Clip-on ieħor li jista 'jintlibes, Violet (mill-kumpanija Ultra) jimmonitorja l-espożizzjoni UV tiegħek u jgħinek tilħaq "bilanċ aħjar tax-xemx" biex tikseb vitamina D essenzjali mingħajr ma tagħmel ħsara lill-ġilda tiegħek. L-app companion ihallik aktar tippersonalizza r-rakkomandazzjonijiet tal-mezz billi tispeċifika t-tip tal-ġilda tiegħek u l-livell ta 'SPF fil-ħarsien mix-xemx li tuża. Bħala touch sabiħ, Violet ma jgħaddix ilma minnu, għalhekk huwa ħbieb ideali għal jum twil tas-sajf li jintefaq fuq il-bajja. 

Bħalissa, Violet hija disponibbli għal ordni minn qabel għal $ 99, li hija konsiderevolment aktar baxxa mill-prezz tal-bejgħ futur tagħha, $ 129. Il li jintlibes huwa skedat li jibda tbaħħir f'Awwissu 2015. 

CliMate 

B'differenza oġġetti oħra li jistgħu jintlibsu f'din il-lista, il-CliMate jagħmel iktar minn sempliċement ikejlu l-espożizzjoni għad-dawl; vera għall-isem tagħha, huwa ċentru tat-temp veru. Il-ħelu, forma ta 'sħab clip-on tiġbor informazzjoni dwar l-umdità u t-temperatura minbarra l-indiċi UV. L-app is-sieħba CliMate (għal Android u iOS) tikkumbatti dawn l-istati b'informazzjoni dwar it-tip tal-ġilda u l-livell SPF biex iwassluk "allert aħmar" meta jkollok bżonn tapplika aktar ħarsien mix-xemx. Oriġinarjament imnedija bħala proġett fuq Kickstarter, il-CliMate bħalissa huwa disponibbli għal $ 59 fuq Amazon f'varjetà ta 'kuluri.
translation:
The summer sun is beautiful and all, but as your mom has probably told you a number of times, you must be protecting yourself with a generous layer of sunscreen!Thankfully, we live in a world where there are gadgets to let you know when you need to apply a new SPF layer.Read on to learn more about some worn items that can make your skin a favor (and save from painful sunburn).

Some of these devices even help you get enough light to ensure that your vitamin D levels are best.While these gadgets may appear as a recipe for sunburn, they differentiate between different types of light.

June

Called after a summer month and charged as "your new beauty coach", this product is the most stylish of the bunch.It costs $ 129 and comes in three color options (platinum, gold and gunmetal), double duty pulling as a UV monitor and a chunky bracelet.With both UVA and UVB sensors, June traces exposure to your sun, with a meter that shows how close to your "sun dose" daily (calculated according to your skin type and current UV level.

There is also an appliance, which shows the current UV index and reminds you of applying more sunscreen.

Sunsprite

The clip-on, activity-tracker- style sunsprite takes a slightly different approach to monitoring exposure to your sun, and ask, "Did you today ill inka?"The idea behind this product is that the light has shown that it improves insomnia and depression, and the wearable device monitors the brightness of any particular atmosphere, leaving you if you are in an area you canwould be beneficial to your health.Sunsprite also demonstrates your progress towards a purpose of daily exposure.

While this whole concept may seem counter-intuitive in a place about wearables that protect against sun damage, noted that Sunsprite discriminates between various types of light, and the device indicates that you have reached exposure.your daily pretty quickly if you had to stay in the sun in the middle of the day.

Purple

Another wearable clip-on, Violet (from the Ultra company) monitors your UV exposure and helps you reach "better balance of the sun" to achieve essential vitamin D without harming your skin.The companion app lets you further customize the device's recommendations by specifying your skin type and SPF level in the sunscreen you use.As a nice touch, waterproof Violet, so it is an ideal friends for a long summer day spent on the beach.

Currently, Violet is available for pre-order for $ 99, which is considerably lower than its future sales price, $ 129. The worn is scheduled to start shipping in August 2015.

Climate

Unlike other items that can be worn on this list, Climate makes more than just measure exposure to light;True to its name, it is a true weather center.The sweets, cloud-on form collects humidity and temperature information in addition to the UV index.The Climate Partner (for Android and iOS) app combines these states with skin type information and SPF level to bring you a "red alert" when you need to apply more sunscreen.Originally launched as a project on Kickstarter, Climate is currently available for $ 59 on Amazon in a variety of colors.

text:
Countertops għall-kċina magħmula minn ġebla artifiċjali 

Il-kċina huwa l-post fid-dar fejn tiġbor il-familja kollha. Djar tad-dar jqattgħu ħafna ħin hawn, jagħmlu tisjir. L-interjuri tal-kċina f'xi dar għandu jkun ideali għall-membri kollha tal-familja. X'jista 'jkun aktar pjaċevoli milli jonfqu lejla wara ġurnata tax-xogħol mal-familja, waqt il-pranzu fil-kċina. Tabelli għall-kċina magħmula mill-ġebla artifiċjali fl-intern huma partikolarment popolari llum. Huwa dan l-element li jista 'jagħti ħarsa moderna stylish lill-kċina. 

Karatteristiċi tat-tabella magħmula minn ġebla artifiċjali 

Għata tal-mejda magħmula minn ġebla artifiċjali tista 'tkun għażla eċċellenti għal dawk li qed ifittxu l-kombinazzjoni perfetta ta' appell estetiku u l-faċilità ta 'użu. Il-kċejjen b'għata tal-mejda magħmula mill-ġebla artifiċjali jagħtu ħarsa kbira, u l-kura ta 'dawn il-worktops hija sempliċi ħafna. Il-worktops magħmula minn ġebel artifiċjali m'għandhomx ħjatat, għalhekk id-dehra tagħhom hija ideali, u l-batterji jew xi tip ta 'kontaminazzjoni ma jistgħux jidħlu ġewwa. Inti tista 'sempliċement imsaħ il-mejda tal-mejda bi sponża niedja. Il-vantaġġi tal-countertops huma pjuttost ħafna. L-ewwelnett, huwa ekoloġiku, ġebla artifiċjali ma tassorbix sustanzi kimiċi ta 'ħsara jew xaħam, iżda wkoll ma fihx sustanzi ta' ħsara. It-tieni nett, huwa prattiku, grazzi għall-wiċċ mingħajr saldatura, il-kura għall-countertops tkun sempliċi ħafna. It-tielet, durabilità, kif ukoll faċilità ta 'tiswija. U, ovvjament, għandu jkun innutat il-vantaġġ prinċipali - dehra aqwa tal-prodotti. Bis-saħħa ta 'għażla wiesgħa ta' offerti, kulħadd jista 'jsib tabella adattata għall-kċina. 

Kċejjen stili bil-countertops magħmula minn ġebla artifiċjali - din hija l-aħjar għażla għal appartament, dar jew villa. Tista 'tordna top tal-mejda jew tixtri f'maħżen. Varjetà ta 'kuluri, daqsijiet u nisġa tippermetti li ssib eżattament dak li hu meħtieġ.
translation:
Countertops for the kitchen made of artificial stone

The kitchen is the place in the house where the whole family collects.Home houses spend a lot of time here, making cooking.The interior of the kitchen in a home should be ideal for all family members.What could be more enjoyable than spending an evening after a working day with the family, at dinner in the kitchen.Kitchen tables made from artificial stone inland are particularly popular today.It is this element that can give a modern stylish look to the kitchen.

Features of the table made of artificial stone

A table cover made of artificial stone can be an excellent choice for those looking for the perfect combination of aesthetic appeal and ease of use.Kitchens with artificial stone table covers give a great look, and the care of these worktops is very simple.Worktops made of artificial stones have no seams, so their appearance is ideal, and bacteria or some kind of contamination cannot come inside.You can simply wipe the table with a damp sponge.The advantages of countertops are quite a lot.First of all, it is ecological, artificial stone does not absorb harmful chemicals or fat, but also does not contain harmful substances.Secondly, it is practical, thanks to the seamless surface, the care for countertops will be very simple.Third, durability, as well as ease of repair.And, of course, it should be noted the main advantage-an amazing appearance of the products.Thanks to a wide selection of offers, anyone can find a table suitable for the kitchen.

Kitchens styles with countertops made of artificial stone-this is the best choice for an apartment, home or villa.You can order a table top or buy at a warehouse.A variety of colors, sizes and textures allows you to find exactly what is needed.

dehra

MALTEMP 

Naturalment, dan huwa l-vantaġġ prinċipali ta 'dan il-mudell. Barra minn hekk, meta mqabbel mal-mudell tal-marka preċedenti waterproof, dan smartphone sar saħansitra aktar perfetta. 

Allura, m'hemmx bżonn aktar għal limitu għall-jack headphone u microUSB, li laqqa inkonvenjent għall-utenti. Iżda biex jipprevjenu umdità milli jkollna ġewwa l-ġisem wara l-għawm li wieħed jistenna sakemm portijiet huma niexfa qabel inti tqabbad xi ħaġa. 

Dongle kien biss fuq l-istiva għal nanoSIM karta u microSD karta għandu l-ewwel ikun b'attenzjoni qrib qabel ma jippermetti f'kuntatt mal-likwidu. 

Grad ta 'qoxra protezzjoni Sony Xperia M4 akkwa proporzjon għoli IP65 / IP68, li jfisser li tkun protetta b'mod sħiħ mit-trab u l-umdità, jistgħu jiġu mgħaddsa fl-ilma ta' mhux aktar minn 30 minuti u mhux aktar minn 1.5 m fil-fond. 

Kif dejjem il-każ bi skrins abilità, dawn isiru maniġjabbli meta f'kuntatt mal-likwidu. Allura tara paġna tiegħek fin-netwerks soċjali taħt l-ilma ma jaħdimx, iżda tista 'tieħu ritratti, grazzi għall-buttuna fiżika shutter kamera. 

Għall-protezzjoni aħjar tal-ġisem mill-umdità, ma tistax tneħħi l-batterija mingħajr għodda u l-ħiliet speċjali. 

wiri 

Ħafna drabi, din l-għażla, li l-produtturi tixtieq li tiffranka fil-mudelli tal-klassi tan-nofs. Smartphone Sony Xperia M4 Aqua mhijiex eċċezzjoni għal din ir-regola, iżda xorta inġiniera Sony għamlet l-almu tagħhom u għamilha pjuttost qawwi, mmerraq u iqarmeċ. 

Uri djagonali - 5 pulzieri, ir-riżoluzzjoni ma jkunx il-massimu possibbli, iżda pjuttost kbir - 1280 X 720 pixels, id-densità ta 'pixels kull pulzier - 294. 

Għalkemm mhuwiex l-aħjar indikaturi, stampi u fonts fuq l-iskrin tiegħek ħarsa ċara u sbieħ. 

Hija malajr u b'mod preċiż twieġeb għall touch u ġesti, kif ukoll il-kisi hu protett mill-grif. 

karatteristiċi ta' 

Minkejja d-disinn attraenti, ġewwa Xperia M4 - huwa biss intermedju qawwija. Tmien qalba Snapdragon 615, clocked fi 1.76 GHz u 2 GB RAM - karatteristiċi bħal ebda sorpriża llum. 

Iżda huma ħafna inaqqsu l-ispiża sa livell kompetittiv. 

Kwistjoni oħra, li huwa partikolarment qawwa xerrejja inkwetat aħħar: Does Sony jappoġġja l

Il-psikoloġija ta 'mara hija xjenza kontradittorja u stramba ħafna. Wieħed mill-passatempi tagħna huwa li nħarsu lejn il-katalgi u nippermettu kosmetiċi fuqhom. Ħafna nisa sempliċement ma jistgħux jgħixu mingħajr dan u aktar, għal ħafna - huwa mod ta 'ħajja u anke tista' tgħid ċertu rit. Ħafna mis-sess ġust huma tant morda b'dawn li jibdew joħolqu xi forums, jikkomunikaw fuq l-Internet, ifittxu nies li jaħsbuha l-istess, jiddiskutu skontijiet ta 'kosmetiċi ta' katalgi differenti, novitajiet ... 

Sabiex tkun aktar ċar, ser nagħti ftit dikjarazzjonijiet: 

"U nixtieq li jixtru kosmetiċi mill-katalgu! Jiena seduta fid-dar, nagħmlu sniffing ta 'kampjuni, f'ambjent kwiet imbagħad nikkalkula l-ammont u kollox huwa tajjeb! " 

"I really love dan il-għamla! Speċjalment peress li nkun tordnaha, u hi tiġi dritta d-dar. I adore ilma tat-twaletta, linka Mascara, u l-banju kollu fid-dar ġeneralment isir b'ħafna kremi għall-idejn, is-saqajn, il-ġisem u l-wiċċ. " 

"Nixtieq li tordna kosmetiċi minn katalgi u nirrevedu stampi. Jiena stess sar distributur f'żewġ kumpaniji f'daqqa. Imma l-istess nista 'ngħaddi mill-maħżen u nixtri kosmetiċi fihom. Iva, għandi ħafna kożmetiċi minn kumpaniji differenti, iżda b'dan il-mod nagħmel sew mingħajr beauty salons. Jien nagħmel dak kollu fid-dar. Imne sbieħ, u mhux ħafna laqtu l-borża. Hawnhekk reċentement, ġeneralment ippruvajt tqaxxir wara banju - ħaġa kbira! Anadavno waqqaf il-ġilda fuq is-saqajn tas-saqajn, iżda wara s-sessjoni tad-dar tal-għarqub bħal fi tarbija. " 

X'inhu l-sigriet, għaliex in-nisa huma attratti għal kosmetiċi bħal dawn? 

Il-katalogu huwa qasam tal-kożmetiċi, dehbijiet, fwejjaħ u aċċessorji magħmula mill-karta. Il-katalgi huma mpinġija sewwa, sabiex l-għajn tleħħen. Il-katalgu ta 'kwalità eċċellenti jattira numru kbir ta' klijenti. 

Offerti speċjali, skonti, promozzjonijiet, bejgħ. Bħala regola, dan huwa speċjalment karatteristiku fil-ħin ta 'qabel il-vaganzi, meta huwa meħtieġ li tagħmel lilek innifsek rigal, u ħafna nies mill-qrib, u kulħadd jaf li kull mara iħobb skontijiet u bejgħ. Tali "zamanuhi" jistgħu jkunu ta 'tipi differenti. Krimeru, jixtru żewġ kremi tal-wiċċ, it-tielet jirċievu rigal jew jixtru f'direzzjoni waħda, it-tieni inti tikseb b'xejn, jew jixtru kosmetiċi għal ċertu ammont u tista 'tixtri din il-ħendbeg bi skont ta' ħamsin fil-mija. Naturalment, offerti u azzjonijiet bħal dawn mhumiex iffokati fuq l-attenzjoni tal-klijenti. Spiss, in-nisa jistennew biss meta jkun hemm dawn il-proposti, u mbagħad jibdew jixtru nofs-direttorju. 

Kulur. Bħala regola, il-manifattur jipproduċi serje kosmetika b'kulur wieħed gamma, sabiex il-għamla ssir aktar solida u oriġinali. Bis-saħħa tad-disinn maġiku tal-prodott, id-distribuzzjoni sseħħ b'veloċità ogħla għaliex f'dan il-każ jaħdem il-fattur ta 'tfakkir. 

Polls, studji kliniċi, ittri ta 'qarrejja, kompetizzjonijiet. Tkun xi tkun it-tfakkira ta 'informazzjoni dwar id-ditta - toħloq reputazzjoni pożittiva. U kulħadd jaf li reputazzjoni tajba toħloq fiduċja. 

Novitajiet ta 'kożmetiċi dekorattivi, ġojjelli ta' kostumi, fwejjaħ, eċċ. Għal kull mara li tkun interessata f'din il-kumpanija, dan huwa burdata tajba u btala. Huwa minħabba dan l-entużjażmu li ħafna nisa lanqas biss jinnutaw u ma jikkunsidrawx in-nuqqas ta 'opportunitajiet u tricks ta' reklamar, li l-biċċa l-kbira tal-klijenti jiltaqgħu magħhom. 

Għaliex għandi nħares aktar mill-qrib? 

Il-katalgu spiss juri d-daqs tal-prodott akbar milli hu fil-fatt. Per eżempju, flixkun ta 'fwieħa, ġelatina tad-doċċa jew krema tal-idejn fir-realtà jinstabx li jkun tant żgħir li l-prezz "sottovalutat" indikat huwa biss adegwat. Kumpaniji solidi fil-katalgi tagħhom għandhom jispeċifikaw il-volum u

text:
Ħwejjeġ tax-xemx 

Ħwejjeġ tax-xemx hija ħwejjeġ tan-nisa għall-okkazzjonijiet kollha, magħmulin fi stil eleganti u qawwi, u li juru kwalità ta 'prestazzjoni mingħajr kompromessi. Il-prodotti prinċipali ta 'Sunwear huma blużi, ilbiesi, T-shirts. B'mod ġenerali, din il-marka toffri firxa sħiħa ta 'xogħol maħdum għan-nisa. 

Dwarna 

Sunwear hija kumpanija Pollakka, iżda l-prodotti tagħha huma magħrufa ferm lil hinn mill-pajjiż tagħhom - fil-kontinent Ewropew kollu. Kull staġun l-assortiment huwa rifornit b'ġabriet ġodda maħluqa bl-aħħar xejriet tal-moda. L-oġġetti kollha tal-kollezzjonijiet huma prodotti f'firxa ta 'daqs pjuttost wiesgħa (42-56 skont l-istandard Ewropew). Barra minn hekk, il-klijenti jistgħu dejjem jagħżlu l-kulur u l-kulur l-aktar xieraq - ħafna mudelli Sunwear huma ddisinjati u manifatturati f'diversi kuluri. Fil-katalgu tal-prodotti tista 'ssib kemm ħwejjeġ diskreti ta' kuljum kif ukoll ta 'negozju, u mudelli sbieħ għal avvenimenti ta' filgħaxija jew solenni. 

Iżda l-vantaġġ ewlieni ta 'Sunwear Jersey huwa ta' kwalità. Huwa wkoll importanti li d-disinjaturi tal-kumpanija jgħaqqdu l-istil u l-kumdità - blużi eleganti u eleganti, bagolli, boleros u ilbiesi joqogħdu perfettament fuq il-figura, ma jfixklux il-movimenti u jħalluh iħossok verament liberu u attraenti. 

Ħwejjeġ tax-xemx rebbiegħa-sajf 2013 

Id-disinjaturi ta 'Sunwear joffru lin-nisa kollha biex jiltaqgħu s-sajf f'barraksijiet ħfief ta' sfumaturi nodfa, kif ukoll ilbiesi monofoniċi mgħammra b'tagħmir oriġinali. B'mod separat, agħti attenzjoni għall-qomos u t-shirts bl-istampi - fjuri, ġeometriċi u astratti. Dawn huma l-aktar popolari fl-istaġun kurrenti. Fl-aħħar moda turi, l-ebda marka tal-moda famużi fid-dinja ma kinitx mingħajr stampi sempliċi, imma fl-istess ħin stylish u colorful.
translation:
Clothing

Sun clothing is women's clothing for all occasions, made in elegant and bright style, and showing quality of uncompromising performance.Sunwear's main products are blouses, dresses, t-shirts.Overall, this brand offers a full range of work for women.

About us

Sunwear is a Polish company, but its products are well known beyond their country-throughout the European continent.Each season the assortment is replenished with new collections created by the latest fashion trends.All collection items are produced in a fairly wide range (42-56 in accordance with the European standard).In addition, customers can always choose the most appropriate color and color-many sunwear models are designed and manufactured in various colors.In the product catalog you can find both discrete daily and business clothing, and beautiful models for evening or solemn events.

But the main advantage of Sunwear Jersey is quality.It is also important for company designers to combine style and comfort-elegant and elegant blouses, trunks, boleros and dresses fit perfectly on the figure, do not interfere with movements and allow it to feel really free and attractive.

Spring-Summer 2013 Sun Clothes

Sunwear's designers offer all women to meet summer in light quarrels of clean shades, as well as monophonic dresses equipped with original equipment.Separately, pay attention to the shirts and t-shirts with the pictures-flowers, geometrics and abstracts.They are the most popular in the current season.In the last fashion shows, no world famous fashion brand was without simple pictures, but at the same time stylish and colorful.

text:
Document 62008CJ0480 

Judgment of the Court (Grand Chamber) of 23 February 2010.#Maria Teixeira v London Borough of Lambeth and Secretary of State for the Home Department.#Reference for a preliminary ruling: Court of Appeal (England & Wales) (Civil Division) - United Kingdom.#Freedom of movement for persons - Right of residence - National of a Member State who worked in another Member State and remained there after ceasing to work - Child in vocational training in the host Member State - No means of subsistence - Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 - Article 12 - Directive 2004/38/EC.#Case C-480/08. 

Sentenza tal-Qorti tal-Ġustizzja (Awla Manja) tat-23 ta' Frar 2010. Maria Teixeira vs London Borough of Lambeth u Secretary of State for the Home Department. Talba għal deċiżjoni preliminari: Court of Appeal (England & Wales) (Civil Division) - ir-Renju Unit. Moviment liberu tal-persuni - Dritt ta' residenza - Ċittadina ta' Stat Membru li ħadmet fi Stat Membru ieħor u li mietet hemm wara t-tmiem tal-attività professjonali tagħha - Minuri li jsegwi taħriġ professjonali fl-Istat Membru ospitanti - Nuqqas ta' mezzi ta' għixien - Regolament (KEE) Nru 1612/68 - Artikolu 12 - Direttiva 2004/38/KE. Kawża C-480/08. 

“Moviment liberu tal-persuni – Dritt ta' residenza – Ċittadina ta' Stat Membru li ħadmet fi Stat Membru ieħor u li baqgħet hemm wara t-tmiem tal-attività professjonali tagħha – Tifel li jsegwi taħriġ professjonali fl-Istat Membru ospitanti – Nuqqas ta' mezzi ta' għajxien – Regolament (KEE) Nru 1612/68 – Artikolu 12 – Direttiva 2004/38/KE” 

Fil-Kawża C-480/08, 

għall-Awtorità tas-Sorveljanza tal-EFTA, minn N. Fenger kif ukoll minn L. Armati u I. Hauger, bħala aġenti, 

2 

Din it-talba ġiet ippreżentata fil-kuntest ta' kawża bejn M. Teixeira u l-London Borough of Lambeth (muniċipalità ta' Lambeth f'Londra) u s-Secretary of State for the Home Department, dwar iċ-ċaħda tal-imsemmija muniċipalità tat-talba ta' M. Teixeira intiża sabiex tikseb il-benefiċċju ta' akkomodazzjoni soċjali. 

Il-kuntest ġuridiku 

Il-leġiżlazzjoni tal-Unjoni Ewropea 

3 

Il-ħames premessa tar-Regolament Nru 1612/68 jipprovdi: 

“1. Dawn li ġejjin għandhom, irrispettivament miċ-ċittadinanza tagħhom, ikollhom id-dritt li jinstallaw ruħhom ma' ħaddiem li hu ċittadin ta' Stat Membru wieħed u li hu mpjegat fit-territorju ta' Stat Membru ieħor: 

a) 

“Fejn ċittadin ta' xi Stat Membru jkun qed iwettaq attività bħala mpjegat jew persuna li taħdem għal rasha fit-territorju ta' Stat Membru ieħor, il-konjuġi tagħha u t-tfal li huma taħt l-età ta' 21 sena jew dipendenti fuqu għandu jkollhom id-dritt li jidħlu għal kwalunkwe attività bħala persuna mpjegata fit-territorju kollu ta' dak l-istess Stat, anki jekk ma jkunux persuni ċittadini ta' xi Stat Membru.” 

L-Artikolu 12 tar-Regolament Nru 1612/68, li mhuwiex fost id-dispożizzjonijiet imħassra mid-Direttiva 2004/38 jipprovdi: 

Stati Membri għandhom jinkoraġġixu l-isforzi kollha biex dawn it-tfal ikunu jistgħu jattendu għal dawn il-korsijiet taħt l-aħjar kondizzjonijiet possibbli.” 

[...] 

Sakemm il-benefiċjarji tad-dritt ta' residenza ma jsirux piż mhux raġonevoli fuq is-sistema ta' l-għajnuna soċjali ta' l-Istat Membru ospitanti, dawn m'għandhomx jitkeċċew. Għalhekk, miżura ta' tkeċċija m'għandhiex tkun il-konsegwenza awtomatika jekk iduru għas-sistema ta' l-għajnuna soċjali. L-Istat Membru ospitanti għandu jeżamina jekk hux każ ta' diffikultajiet temporanji u jqis id-dewma tar-residenza, iċ-ċirkostanzi personali u l-ammont ta' għajnuna awtorizzat qabel jikkunsidra lill-benefiċjarju piż mhux raġonevoli fuq is-sistema tiegħu ta'
translation:
Document 62008CJ0480

Judgment of the Court (Grand Chamber) of 23 February 2010.#Maria Teixeira v London Borough of Lambeth and Secretary of State for the Home Department.#Reference for a preliminary ruling: Court of Appeal (England & Amp; Wales)- United Kingdom.#Freedom of Movement for Persons - Right of Residence - National of a Member State Worked in Another Member State and Remained there after ceasing to work - Child in vocational training in the host member state - no means of subsistence - regulation(EEC) No 1612/68 - Article 12 - Directive 2004/38/EC.#Case C -480/08.

Judgment of the Court (Grand Chamber) of 23 February 2010. Maria Teixeira v London Borough of Lambeth and Secretary of State for the Home Department.Reference for a preliminary ruling: Court of Appeal (England & Amp; Wales) (Civil Division) - United Kingdom.Free Movement of Persons - Right of Residence - Citizen of a Member State who worked in another Member State and who died there after the end of her professional activity - a minor who follows professional training in the host Member State - lack ofMeans of living - Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 - Article 12 - Directive 2004/38/EC.Case C-480/08.

“Free movement of persons-a right of residence-a national of a Member State who worked in another Member State and remained there after the end of his professional activity-a child pursuing professional training in the host Member State-lack of'Means of living - Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 - Article 12 - Directive 2004/38/EC' '

In Case C-480/08,

For the EFTA Surveillance Authority, by N. Fenger as well as from L. Armed and I. Hauger, as agents,

2

This reference was made in the course of proceedings between Mr Teixeira and the London Borough of Lambeth (Lambeth Municipality in London) and the Secretary of State for the Home Department, concerning the denial of the saidM. Teixeira's claim municipality intended to obtain the benefit of social housing.

The legal context

European Union legislation

3

The fifth recital in the preamble to Regulation No 1612/68 provides:

“1.The following shall, regardless of their citizenship, have the right to install themselves with a worker who is a national of one Member State and who is employed in the territory of another Member State:

a)

“Where a national of a Member State is carrying out an activity as an employee or self-employed person in the territory of another Member State, his spouse and children under the age of 21 or dependent on himThey shall have the right to enter into any activity as a person employed throughout the territory of that same State, even if they are not nationals of a Member State. "

Article 12 of Regulation No 1612/68, which is not among the provisions repealed by Directive 2004/38 provides:

Member States should encourage all efforts to enable these children to attend these courses under the best possible conditions. "

[...]

Unless the beneficiaries of the right of residence become an unreasonable burden on the social assistance system of the host Member State, they should not be expelled.Therefore, a dismissal measure should not be the automatic consequence if they turn to the social assistance system.The host Member State shall examine whether it is a case of temporary difficulties and take into account the delay of residence, personal circumstances and the amount of aid authorized before considering the beneficiary an unreasonable burden on his system of

text:
L-Iskandli ta 'Fuq tal-Ġurnaliżmu tal-2000s 

Dawn ivarjaw minn allegazzjonijiet ta 'bias għal stejjer li kienu biss magħmula 

Kulħadd huwa mdorri li jisma 'dwar politikanti żgħar u kaptani mgħawġa ta' l-industrija, imma hemm xi ħaġa speċjalment ħeġġa meta l-ġurnalisti jiġu akkużati li jaġixxu ħażin. Il-ġurnalisti, wara kollox, suppost ikunu dawk li jżommu għajnejn kritiċi fuq in-nies fil-poter (think Bob Woodward ta 'Watergate u Carl Bernstein). Allura meta r-Raba 'Estate ma tibqax ħażina, fejn tħalli l-professjoni - u l-pajjiż? L-ewwel deċennju tas-seklu 21 ma kellux nuqqas ta' skandli relatati mal-ġurnaliżmu. Hawn huma l-akbar 10. 

Jayson Blair u Fabrication u Plagiarism fil-New York Times 

Jayson Blair kien stilla żagħżugħa li qed tiżdied f'The New York Times sakemm, fl-2003, id-dokument skopra li huwa kien plajjot b'mod sistematiku jew iffabbrikat informazzjoni għal għexieren ta 'artikli. F'artikolu li jagħti dettalji dwar l-aġir ħażin ta 'Blair, it-Times imsejjaħ l-iskandlu "tradizzjoni profonda ta' fiduċja u punt baxx fl-istorja ta'152 sena tal-gazzetta." Blair kiseb il-but, iżda hu ma jmurx waħdu: l-editur eżekuttiv Howell Raines u l-editur tal-ġestjoni Gerald M. Boyd, li kienu promossi lil Blair fil-gradi tal-karta minkejja t-twissijiet minn edituri oħra, kienu sfurzati wkoll. 

Ftit ġimgħat qabel l-elezzjoni presidenzjali tal-2004, CBS News ħarġet rapport li jallega li l-President George W. Bush kien marru fil-Gwardja Nazzjonali tal-Ajru Texas - b'hekk evita l-abbozz tal- Gwerra tal- Vjetnam - bħala riżultat ta 'trattament preferenzjali mill-militar. Ir-rapport kien ibbażat fuq memoranda qal li kienu minn dik l-era. Iżda l-bloggers irrimarkaw li l-memoranda dehru li ġew ittajpjati fuq kompjuter, mhux tipwriter, u CBS eventwalment irrikonoxxa li ma setax jipprova li l-memoranda kienu reali. Investigazzjoni interna wasslet għall-isparar ta 'tliet CBS execs u l-produttur tar-rapport, Mary Mapes. CBS News anchor Dan Minflok, li kienu ddefendew il-memoranda, żdiedu kmieni fl-2005, apparentement bħala riżultat ta 'l-iskandlu. Pjuttost ifittex lill-CBS, u qal li n-netwerk kien qabad il-qalb tiegħu fuq l-istorja. 

CNN u Kopertura Zokkor ta 'Saddam Hussein 

Il-kap ta 'l-aħbarijiet CNN Eason Jordan irrikonoxxa fl-2003 li għas-snin in-netwerk kellu kopertura mikrija minn zokkor ta' l-atroċitajiet tad-drittijiet tal-bniedem ta' Saddam Hussein biex iżomm aċċess għad-dittatur Iraqi. Il-Ġordan qal li r-reati ta 'Saddam kienu jipperikolaw lill-ġurnalisti tas-CNN fl-Iraq u fissru l-għeluq tal-uffiċċju tan-netwerk f'Bagdad. Iżda l-kritiċi qalu li t-tlaqqigħ ta 'CNN fuq l-imġiba ħażina ta' Saddam kienet qed isseħħ fi żmien meta l-Istati Uniti kien qed jiddibatti jekk għandux imur il-gwerra biex ineħħih mill-poter. Kif Franklin Foer kiteb fil-Wall Street Journal: "CNN setgħet abbandunat f'Bagdad. Mhux biss kienu waqqfu r-riċiklaġġ, dawn setgħu jiffokaw aktar bil-qalb fuq il-kisba tal-verità dwar Saddam." 

Jack Kelley u Stejjer Fabbrikati fil-USA Today 

Fl-2004, star USA Today, ir-reporter Jack Kelley nieqaf wara li l-edituri skoprew li kien qed jimmanifattura l-informazzjoni fl-istejjer għal aktar minn għaxar snin. Filwaqt li aġixxa fuq ponta anonima, id-dokument kien nieda investigazzjoni li kixfet l-azzjonijiet ta 'Kelley. L-investigazzjoni sabet li l-USA Today kienet irċeviet bosta twissijiet dwar ir-rappurtar ta 'Kelley, iżda li l-istatus ta' l-istilla tiegħu fil-kamra ta 'l-aħbarijiet skoraġġiet mistoqsijiet diffiċli milli ġew mitluba. Anki wara li kien ikkonfrontat bl-evidenza kontrih, Kelley ċaħad kwalunkwe mġiba ħażina. U bħal Blair u The New York Times, l-iskandlu ta 'Kelley qal l-impjiegi ta' l-aqwa żewġ
translation:
The top 2000s journalism scandals

They range from allegations of bias to stories that were just made

Everyone is accustomed to hearing about small politicians and curved masters of the industry, but there is something especially zealous when journalists are accused of acting badly.Journalists, after all, are supposed to be the ones who keep critical eyes on people in power (Think Bob Woodward of Watergate and Carl Bernstein).So when the fourth estate is not wrong, where do you leave the profession-and the country?The first decade of the 21st century did not lack scandals related to journalism.Here are the largest 10.

Jayson Blair and Fabrication and Plagiarism in New York Times

Jayson Blair was a young star rising in The New York Times until, in 2003, the document discovered that he had systematically plagued or fabricated information for dozens of articles.In an article detailing Blair's mismanagement, the Times called the scandal "A deep tradition of trust and a low point in the history of 152 years of the newspaper."Blair got the pocket, but he would not go alone: Executive Editor Howell Raines and Managing Editor Gerald M. Boyd, who were promoted to Blair in the ranks of paper despite warnings from other editors, wereAlso forced.
