text:
Cherchesov fost il-kowċis finalisti biex jirbaħ l-aqwa kowċ tas-sena tal-FIFA 

Il-kowċ tat-tim nazzjonali Ingliż Gareth Southgate jinsab fost il-finalist għall-unur tal-aqwa kowċ tal-FIFA għas-sena 2018. Southgate hu wieħed mill-kowċis sorpriża li jinsab fil-lista finali wara mexxa lit-tim nazzjonali Ingliż għall-ewwel semifinali fit-Tazza tad-Dinja wara 28 sena. 

Bħalu hemm il-kowċ nazzjonali tal-Belġju Roberto Martinez li rnexxielu jmexxi lit-tim Belġjan għat-tielet post fit-Tazza tad-Dinja għall-ewwel darba fl-istorja tagħhom. L-aktar kowċ sorpriża li jinsab fil-lista finali hu l-kowċ nazzjonali tar-Russja Stanislav Cherchesov wara li mexxa lir-Russja sal-kwarti tal-finali tat-Tazza tad-Dinja b'rebħa fuq Spanja fir-rawnd ta' qabel. 

Ma jistax jonqos li parti mil-lista jkun hemm il-kowċ Kroat Zlatko Dalic u l-kowċ Franċiż Didier Deschamps. Dalic mexxa lit-tim Kroat għall-ewwel finali fl-istorja tat-Tazza tad-Dinja fl-istorja tagħhom, wara li kienu waslu darba sas-semifinali fl-1998. 

Didier Deschamps spikka wara gwida lit-tim Franċiż għar-rebħ tat-Tieni Tazza tad-Dinja fl-istorja tagħhom, b'rebħa fil-finali proprju kontra l-Kroazja. 

Minbarra ħames kowċis nazzjonali, hemm sitt kowċis ta' klabbs finalisti. Zinedine Zidane mexxa lil Real Madrid għar-rebħ tat-tielet Champions League konsekuttiva qabel ma ħalla Santiago Bernabeu. Il-kowċ ta' Atletico Madrid Diego Simeone qiegħed finalist wara li għen lit-tim biex jirbaħ l-Europa League filwaqt li spiċċaw it-tielet fil-kampjonat. 

Il-kowċ ta' Barcelona Ernesto Valverde kien nominat wara li fl-ewwel staġun tiegħu mal-klabb rebaħ La Liga u t-Tazza tar-Re u għal ftit falla li jirbaħ il-kampjonat bla telfa. 

Pep Guardiola kien strumentali biex Manchester City rebħu l-Premier League Ingliż u saru l-ewwel tim li laħaq il-100 punt. Hu rebaħ ukoll il-League Cup fi Frar li għadda b'rebħa ta' 3-0 kontra Arsenal. Kowċ ieħor li jmexxi tim fil-Premier League Ingliż u jinsab finalist hu Jurgen Klopp. Minkejja li ma rebaħ l-ebda unur, Klopp wassal lil Liverpool sal-finali taċ-Champions League u spiċċa fir-raba' post fil-kampjonat Ingliż. 

L-Italja għandha kowċ biss fil-lista finali, b'Massimiliano Allegri għal sena oħra fost il-finalisti wara li mexxa lil Juventus għar-rebħ tas-seba' kampjonat konsektutiv u r-rebħ tar-raba' Coppa Italia konsekuttiva.
translation:
Cherchesov among the finalists coaches to win the best coach of the FIFA year

British national team coach Gareth Southgate is among the finalist for the honor of the best FIFA coach for 2018. Southgate is one of the surprise coaches on the final list after led the English national teamFor the first semifinals in the World Cup after 28 years.

Like Belgium's national coach Roberto Martinez who managed to lead the Belgian team for third place in the World Cup for the first time in their history.The most surprise coach on the final list is Russian national coach Stanislav Cherchesov after leading Russia to the quarterfinals of the World Cup with a win over Spain in the previous round.

It cannot be denied that part of the list will be Croatian coach Zlatko Dalic and French coach Didier Deschamps.Dalic led the Croatian team for the first final in the history of the World Cup in their history, having once arrived at the semifinals in 1998.

Didier Deschamps stood out after a guide to the French team for winning the second World Cup in their history, with a win in the final against Croatia.

In addition to five national coaches, there are six coaches of finalist clubs.Zinedine Zidane led Real Madrid to win the third consecutive Champions League before leaving Santiago Bernabeu.Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone is a finalist after helping the team win the Europa League while finishing third in the league.

Barcelona coach Ernesto Valverde was nominated after in his first season with the club he won La Liga and the King's Cup and for a while he failed to win the Championship without a loss.

Pep Guardiola was instrumental for Manchester City won the English Premier League and became the first team to reach 100 points.He also won the League Cup last February with a 3-0 win against Arsenal.Another coach running a team in the English Premier League and is a finalist is Jurgen Klopp.Despite winning any honor, Klopp led Liverpool to the Champions League final and finished in fourth place in the English league.

Italy has only a coach on the final list, with Massimiliano Allegri for another year among the finalists after leading Juventus for winning the seventh consecutive championship and winning the fourth Coppa Italia consecutive.

text:
Għaliex għandna bżonn rutina ta 'kuljum fil-kampijiet? 

Spiss biex kemm jista 'jkun il-wild jintefqu fuq il-baħar, aħna tibgħat lill- kamp tas-sajf tat-tfal. Tenumera l-vantaġġi ta 'tali vacation jista' jkun hemm żmien twil: hawn u chat ma 'sħabhom, u l-arja nadifa u ikel bnin, iżda aktar importanti - modalità. Huwa hu li tgħallem f'età bikrija lill-persuna li għandek bżonn li żebgħa ħin tiegħek fuq l-arloġġ u l-ebda ħin x'nitilfu. Madankollu, il- ordni tal-ġurnata fil-kampijiet hija differenti ħafna mill-mod li bih l-tarbija fid-dar. Għalhekk, sabiex ma jkollhom xi problemi, jippruvaw jifhmu l-sfumaturi u jikkunsidraw liema miżuri għandhom jittieħdu. 

Ordni tal -kamp tat-tfal jum taċ, bħala regola, jibda bi 8 jew 9 ta 'filgħodu. Il-ħin jiddependi fuq il- "età" ta 'istituzzjoni sajf tat-tfal, kif ukoll bil-lokalità ġeografika. F'dawk kampijiet, li ħadmu fil-ħin Sovjetika u xorta jilbsu t-titolu ta' "pijunieri" spiss jrabbu t-tfal fi 8 sigħat. L-istituzzjonijiet li kienu mwaqqfa fil-90 ta-aħħar seklu u fis-swieq ġodda, stand up ftit aktar tard. Wara dan ta 'rutina jinvolvi eżerċizzji fil-kampijiet. Għal darb'oħra, f'xi huwa traskurata fil-oħra jqisu meħtieġ. Għalhekk nirrakkomandaw biex issir taf minn qabel dan l-aspett u li tiddeċidi liema huwa aktar importanti għat-tarbija tiegħek. 

Wara trattamenti it-tfal imorru għall-kmamar tagħhom, mimlija fis-sodda u jagħtu ruħu. Siegħa wara, wara tixbit unitajiet kollha mur kolazzjon u mbagħad biex pranzu fil-tfal ħin liberu. Kif tistgħu taraw, il-rutina ta 'kuljum fil-kamp jipprovdi li t-tfal gets up kmieni, u fl 11:00 fil-għodu huwa kellu żmien sabiex jagħmlu ħafna affarijiet, u mbagħad setgħu jimxu. Skond psikologi, huwa jippromwovi l-iżvilupp ta 'awto-dixxiplina, anki jekk ikun hemm l-ebda dazji. 

Waħda mir-raġunijiet ewlenin li għalihom it-tfal huma mibgħuta għall-mistrieħ fuq tagħhom stess, huma l-baħar u x-xemx tan-Nofsinhar sħun. Ġenituri spiss tinsa dwar dak li jista 'jkun ta' rutina fil-kampijiet, li twassal għal xi konfużjoni. Per eżempju, it-tarbija użata għal dik fis-sajf jiġrilha dejjem aktar tard mis-soltu, jilagħbu fuq il-kompjuter jew mibgħuta fi kwalunkwe ħin konvenjenti għal walk mal-ħbieb. U biex l-ebda sorpriża, u skeda ċara għall-proċedura, għandu qabel lill tipprepara din għalih. Xi kliem u twissijiet fuq dan is-suġġett mhux se jkun biżżejjed. Ipprova "Unhide" rutina ta 'kuljum fil-kamp fid-dar. Għolli tarbija tiegħek fis-sodda fid-9 am, mġiegħla jagħmlu dan jew dak ħaġa eżatt fi żmien speċifikat fl-iskeda. 

Spiss jiġri u sabiex il-wild jintbagħat lejn il-baħar ma taħdimx. F'każijiet bħal dawn, il-wild imur l-iskola, fejn varjetà ta 'avvenimenti matul il-ġurnata. Il-rutina ta 'kuljum fil-kamp iskola mhi xejn differenti minn reġim dik adottata kumplessi tas-saħħa tat-tfal. Dejjem hemm tfal jistgħu jilagħbu mal-klassi tagħhom, jieħdu pjaċir, u aktar importanti - għal darb'oħra jissieħbu fl-dixxiplina. Wara kollox, għall-edukazzjoni ulterjuri tal-kwalitajiet kollha aħjar personali meħtieġa biex tkun tista 'tiġbor, iġibu lilu nnifsu li jaġixxi u li ma nitkellem fuq affarijiet żejda.

One of the main reasons for which children are sent to rest on their own, are the sea and the warm southern sun.Parents often forget about what may be routine in camps, leading to some confusion.For example, the baby used for that in the summer gets ever later than usual, playing on the computer or shipped at any time convenient for a walk with friends.And for no surprise, and a clear schedule for the procedure, he has previously prepared it for him.Some words and warnings on this subject will not be enough.Try a "unhide" daily routine in the camp at home.Raise your baby in bed at 9 am, forced to do so or that exactly at a specified time in the schedule.

Fuq il-post is-servizzi u l-faċilitajiet jinkludu swimming pool fil-beraħ u l-terrazzin xemx adjaċenti u pool ġewwa fejn inti tista 'jgħum fi kwalunkwe temp. Ukoll, min iħobb divertiment ilma se japprezzaw il-lukanda hija disponibbli fil-park-ilma bil-karozzini ftit u slides. Hija mfassla kemm għall-adulti u għall-mistednin iżgħar. Għall-gidjien hemm ukoll mini-pool.

text:
Il-GWU titlob laqgħa urġenti mad-diriġenti tal-ONE 

Il-General Workers' Union talbet laqgħa urgenti mat-tmexxija ta' ONE Group wara l-aħbar li ħarġet fil-mezzi tax-xandir dwar il-kawża kostituzzjonali li tista' twassal għall-għeluq tal-istazzjonijiet politiċi Maltin. 

Il-ġurnal elettroniku Lovin Malta ħabbar li beħsiebu jibda kawża kostituzzjonali kontra l-istazzjonijiet taż-żewġ partiti ewlenin f'Malta, il-ONE u n-NET, bl-argument li sezzjoni tal-Att tax-Xandir fuq l-istazzjonijiet tal-partiti politiċi tikser l-ispirtu tal-kostituzzjoni, u għandha tiġi ddikjarata nulla. 

B'reazzjoni għal dan, il-GWU ħarġet stqarrija li tgħid li l-ħaddiema ta' ONE Group ilhom membri fi ħdanha sa mit-twaqqif tal-kumpanija. Il-Ħadd li għadda diversi membri avviċinaw lit-Taqsima Professjonisti, Finanzi u Servizzi biex jaraw jekk din il-kawża taffettwax l-impjieg tagħhom. 

Fid-dawl ta' dan, il-GWU talbet laqgħa urġenti mat-tmexxija ta' ONE Group b'rabta mal-futur inċert tal-ħaddiema. 

Il-każ mistenni jibda jinstema' aktar tard dan ix-xahar.
translation:
The GWU requests an urgent meeting with the one leaders

The General Workers' Union called for an urgent meeting with the leadership of One Group following the news of the media on the constitutional cause that could lead to the closure of Maltese political stations.

Electronic journal Lovin Malta has announced that it intends to initiate a constitutional lawsuit against the stations of the two main parties in Malta, the ONE and Net, arguing that a section of the broadcasting act on the stations of thePolitical parties violate the spirit of the Constitution, and should be declared void.

In response to this, the GWU issued a statement saying that One Group's workers have been within it since the establishment of the company.Last Sunday several members approached the Professionals, Finance and Services Section to see if this cause affects their jobs.

In light of this, the GWU requested an urgent meeting with the leadership of One Group in connection with the uncertain future of workers.

The case is expected to be heard later this month.

text:
Pranzu fil-30 minuta: l-għażliet u l-ideat 

Żgur kull familja għandha sigrieti tagħha, kif issajjar dixx partikolari. Ħafna koki simili li joqgħod għal siegħa f'temperatura-stufi u jgawdi l-proċess kulinari. Imma kultant hemm bżonn li jsiru pranzu, kolazzjon jew ikla fil-30 minuta. Meta l-għaġla jibda, l-riċetti u sigrieti simili fading barra tar-ras tiegħi minħabba l-eċċitament. Dan l-artikolu jiġi lilek għall-għajnuna u jitkellmu dwar kif tipprepara ikla homemade fil-30 minuta. 

ikliet likwidu 

Jekk inti tixtieq li tagħmel xi ħaġa likwidu, l-għażla ideali tkun soppa tat-tiġieġ. Ta 'min jinnota li l-tiġieġ imsajjar pjuttost malajr. Biex iħaffu l-proċess jagħtu preferenza lill-sider. Aqta 'l-laħam f'biċċiet żgħar u mqiegħda fl-ilma. Poġġi l-pan ma 'għasfur fuq sħana għolja u żid melħ. Aħna koki jkollhom sigriet ftit: l-ilma mielaħ jibda jagħli malajr, u l-prodotti fih huma ppreparati immedjatament. 

Meta l-ilma tagħli, neħħi l-fowm u sajjar il-laħam għal ħames minuti. Fl-istess waqt ipprepara zazharku. Biex tagħmel dan, Togħrokx fuq karrotti maħkuka u basal imqatta kubi żgħar. Fry l-ħxejjex fil-livell pan sakemm kannella dehbi. Imbagħad żid il-zazharku brodu. 

Sussegwentement, għandek bżonn biex tnaddaf xi patata ftit u maqtugħin minnhom bsaten. Poġġi l-ħxejjex fil-soppa jagħli u sajjar ieħor 10 minuti. Fl-aħħar ta 'żmien, itfi l-nar u tqegħid ħodor. Soppa għall-ikel hija lesta fl-30 minuti! Iservu ma murtaletti jew ħobż. 

ikla ta 'malajr tad-dieta: scrambled bajd 

Jekk inti watch figura tiegħek, jew jeħel mal dieta, allura inti perfett din l-għażla. Din id-dixx huwa ferm jissodisfa, fih ammonti kbar ta 'proteini u kważi l-ebda karboidrati. 

Sabiex tipprepara pranzu malajr ta 'omelets, ser ikollok bżonn żewġ bajd, nofs il-basal, ħodor, ħalib baxx ta' xaħam jew krema qarsa. 

Taħbit tal-bajd u l-istaġun bil-melħ. Żid nofs tazza tal-ħalib u tliet imgħaref ta 'krema qarsa. Ħawwad l-ingredjenti u ferra l-taħlita fil-pan ma 'non-stick kisi. Għatti l-kontenitur bl-għatu u mqiegħda fuq nar. Filwaqt li l-froġa qed languishing fuq sħana baxxa, CHOP n-nofs ċrieki basla u fry fil-butir fil-livell pan separata. Meta l-ħxejjex jiksbu lewn tad-deheb, u l-omelet se jibbies, tibda disinn platti. Irranġa ħodor fuq il-bajd. Fuq indaqs post il-pruwa. Itwi l-omelet fil nofs u tħalli l-għatu magħluq għal ieħor ħames minuti. Pranzu hija lesta fl-30 minuti! Tista 'tibda ikla tiegħek. 

Kif biex issajjar patata bil-laħam għall-ikel fil-30 minuta? 

Żgur kulħadd jaf li l-platti tal-laħam huma imsajjar għal żmien twil. Madankollu, inti tista 'kok l-laħam għall-pranzu fil-30 minuta, jekk ikun meħtieġ. Huwa aħjar li tingħata preferenza lil majjal. Minbarra l-laħam ser ikollok bżonn basal, karrotti u bżar qampiena. 

Aqta 'l-laħam f'biċċiet żgħar, żid melħ u ħwawar favoriti. Ħalli l-prodott f'dan l-istat u tibda l-ipproċessar ta 'ħxejjex. Aqta 'l-basla fi nofs ċrieki, karrotti gradilja. Tadam u bżar jagħmlu bars żgħar. Poġġi l-ingredjenti fis-sistema pan u sajjar għal ħames minuti. Imbagħad żid il-laħam u sajjar l-dixx għal 15 minuta taħt l-għatu. Tinsiex li ħawwad kontinwament. 

Waqt il-preparazzjoni l-dixx prinċipali, inti għandek bżonn biex tnaddaf il-patata u għalli fl-ilma immellaħ. Meta tuberi huma rotob, il-platt jistgħu jiġu notifikati lill-tabella, li jżid mal-laħam imsajjar tagħha. 

poriġ 

malajr ħafna inti tista 'kok poriġ. Jista 'jkun buckwheat, millieġ, xgħir jew xgħir. Din id-dixx se jmorru perfettament ma 'kwalunkwe prodott tal-laħam. Inti tista 'kok l-laħam fi żmien, sakemm
translation:
Dinner in 30 minutes: Options and ideas

Surely each family has its own secrets, how to cook a particular dish.Many chefs like one hour at a temperature-stove and enjoy the culinary process.But sometimes a dinner, breakfast or lunch need to be made in 30 minutes.When the rush begins, the recipes and secrets like fading out of my head because of the excitement.This article comes to you for help and talk about preparing a homemade meal in the 30th minute.

liquid meals

If you want to do something liquid, the ideal choice would be chicken soup.It should be noted that the chicken cooked quite quickly.To speed up the process give preference to the breast.Cut the meat into small pieces and placed in water.Place the pan with a bird over high heat and add salt.We cooks have a little secret: salt water starts to boil quickly, and the products in it are prepared immediately.

When the water boils, remove the foam and cook the meat for five minutes.At the same time prepare Zazharku.To do this, do not rub on grated carrots and sliced onions small cubes.Fry the vegetables at the pan until golden brown.Then add the Zazharku broth.

Next, you need to clean a few potatoes and cut them with sticks.Put the vegetables in the boiling soup and cook another 10 minutes.At the end of time, turn off the fire and putting green.Food soup is ready in 30 minutes!Serve with crackers or bread.

Dietary quick meal: scrambled eggs

If you watch your figure, or stick to a diet, then you perfect this option.This dish is very satisfying, contains large amounts of proteins and almost no carbohydrates.

In order to prepare a quick dinner of omelets, you will need two eggs, half onions, greens, low fat milk or sour cream.

Beat eggs and season with salt.Add half a cup of milk and three tablespoons of sour cream.Stir in the ingredients and pour the mixture into the pan with a non-stick coating.Cover the container with the lid and place on fire.While the frozen is languishing over low heat, chop the middle onion rings and fry in the butter at the separate pan.When the vegetables get a golden hue, and the omelet will harden, start design dishes.Arrange greens on the eggs.On the equal place of the bow.Fold the omelet in the middle and leave the lid closed for another five minutes.Dinner is ready in 30 minutes!You can start your meal.

How to cook potatoes with meat for food in 30 minutes?

Surely everyone knows that meat dishes are cooked for a long time.However, you can cook the meat for dinner in 30 minutes, if necessary.It is better to give preference to pork.In addition to the meat you will need onions, carrots and bell peppers.

Cut the meat into small pieces, add your favorite salt and spices.Leave the product in this state and begin the processing of vegetables.Cut the onion into half circles, grid carrots.Tomatoes and peppers make small bars.Place the ingredients in the pan and cook for five minutes.Then add the meat and cook the dish for 15 minutes under the lid.Don't forget to stir constantly.

While preparing the main dish, you need to clean the potatoes and boil in salted water.When tubers are soft, the dish can be served to the table, adding to its cooked meat.

porridge

Very quickly you can cook porridge.It can be buckwheat, millet, barley or barley.This dish will go perfectly with any meat product.You can cook the meat at a time, provided

text:
Versi Bibliċi dwar il-Fidwa 

Qari permezz ta 'versi tal-Bibbja dwar is-suġġett tal-fidwa jgħinna nifhmu s-sagrifiċċju veru Ġesù magħmul fuq is-salib . Il-fidwa tagħtina l-libertà minn kull tip ta 'marda, u Alla joffrilna lilna liberament. Huwa ħallas prezz kbir għall-fidwa tagħna, u l-Iskrittura li ġejja tagħtina xi ħarsa lejn kif huwa importanti dak il-prezz. 

Għaliex Neħtieġu l-Fidwa 

Aħna lkoll reċipjenti ta 'fidwa u għal raġuni tajba: Aħna lkoll midinbin li jeħtieġu fidwa mid-dnubiet tagħna. 

Titus 2:14 Huwa ta ħajtu biex jillibbi lilna minn kull tip ta 'dnub, biex jitnaddafna, u biex nagħmilna n-nies tiegħu stess, impenjati bis-sħiħ li nagħmlu atti tajbin. (NLT) 

Atti 3:19 Issa niddependu mid-dnubiet tiegħek u ngħaddu għal Alla, sabiex id-dnubiet tiegħek jistgħu jintmesaħ. (NLT) 

Rumani 3: 22-24 M'hemm l-ebda differenza bejn il-Lhud u Gentile, għal kulħadd sinned u ma jaqax mill-glorja ta 'Alla, u kollha huma ġġustifikati liberament mill-grazzja tiegħu permezz tal-fidi li daħal minn Ġesù Kristu. (NIV) 

Rumani 5:18 Konsegwentement, bl-istess mod li wieħed minnhom infetaħ irriżulta f'kundanna għan-nies kollha, hekk ukoll att righteous wassal għal ġustifikazzjoni u ħajja għan-nies kollha. (NIV) 

Fidwa Permezz Kristu 

Alla kien jaf li l-mod wieħed għalina li nkunu nistgħu nħallsu kellu jħallas prezz kbir. Minflok timsaħ lilna kollha mill-wiċċ tad-dinja, Huwa għażel minflok li jissagrifika Ibnu fuq qsim . 

Ġesù ħallas il-prezz aħħari għad-dnubiet tagħna, u aħna r-riċevituri tal-libertà permezz tiegħu. 

Efesin 1: 7 Kristu ssagrifika d-demm tal-ħajja tiegħu biex joħloq liberu, li jfisser li d-dnubiet tagħna issa huma skużati. Kristu għamel dan għax Alla kien tant kind lilna. Alla għandu għerf u fehim kbir (CEV) 

Efesin 5: 2 Ħalli l-imħabba tkun il-gwida tiegħek. 

Kristu iħobbna u offra ħajtu għalina bħala sagrifiċċju li jixtieq Alla. (CEV) 

Salm 111: 9 Huwa bagħat fidwa lill-poplu tiegħu; hu jkun ikkmanda l-patt tiegħu għal dejjem. S-Santu u l-biża 'hu ismu! (ESV) 

Galizjani 2:20 I ġew imsallab ma 'Kristu. M'għadux I li jgħix, imma Kristu li jgħix fih. U l-ħajja li issa ngħix fl-għadam ngħix bil-fidi fil-Iben ta 'Alla, li ħabbuni u ta lilu nnifsu għalija. (ESV) 

1 Ġwann 3:16 Permezz ta 'dan, nafu l-imħabba, li hu stabbilixxa l-ħajja tiegħu għalina, u għandna nistabbilixxu ħajjitna għall-aħwa. (ESV) 

1 Korintin 1:30 Alla għaqqadek ma 'Kristu Ġesù. Għall-benefiċċju tagħna Alla għamilha biex tkun għerf innifsu. Kristu għamelna dritt ma 'Alla; hu għamelna puri u qaddisa, u hu ħelsinna mid-dnub. (NLT) 

1 Korintin 6:20 Għal Alla xtarak bi prezz għoli. Allura għandek tonora lil Alla bil-ġisem tiegħek. (NLT) 

Ġwanni 3:16 Għal Alla hekk iħobb id-dinja, li Huwa taw lil Iben tiegħu biss, li kull min jemmen fih ma jinħassx, iżda jkollu ħajja eterna. (NASB) 

2 Peter 3: 9 Il-Mulej ma jmurx bil-mod dwar il-wegħda tiegħu, minħabba li xi ftit joqgħod bilwieqd, iżda huwa pazjent għalik, li ma jixtieqx li xi ħadd ma jmut imma għal dawk kollha li jaslu għall-indiema. (NASB) 

Marka 10:45 L-Iben ta 'Man ma sarx kaptan ta' l-iskjavi, iżda slave li se jagħti ħajtu biex isalva ħafna nies. 

(CEV) 

Galizjani 1: 4 Kristu għarraf lil Alla Missierna u ta lilu nnifsu bħala sagrifiċċju għad-dnubietna biex isalva lilna minn din id-dinja ħażina. (CEV)

translation:
Biblical verses about redemption

Reading through Bible verses on the subject of redemption helps us understand the true sacrifice Jesus made on the cross.Redemption gives us freedom from all kinds of disease, and God offers us freely.He paid a great price for our redemption, and the following scripture gives us some look at how important that price is.

Why do we need redemption

We are all redemption vessels and for good reason: we are all sinners who need redemption from our sins.

Titus 2:14 He gave his life to dress us from all kinds of sin, to cleanse us, and to make our own people, fully committed to doing good acts.(Nlt)

Acts 3:19 Now we depend on your sins and move on to God, so that your sins can be wiped.(Nlt)

Romans 3: 22-24 There is no difference between the Jews and Gentile, for all sinned and does not fall from the glory of God, and all are freely justified by his grace through the faith that came from JesusChrist.(Niv)

Romans 5:18 Consequently, in the same way that one of them was opened resulted in a condemnation for all people, so also a righteous act led to justification and life for all people.(Niv)

Redemption through Christ

God knew that the one way for us to be able to pay had to pay a great price.Instead of wiping us all from the face of the world, he chose instead of sacrificing his son on cracking.

Jesus paid the ultimate price for our sins, and we are the recipients of freedom through Him.

Ephesians 1: 7 Christ sacrifices the blood of his life to create free, which means that our sins are now excused.Christ did this because God was so kind to us.God has great wisdom and understanding (CEV)

Ephesians 5: 2 Let love be your guide.

Christ loves us and has offered His life for us as a sacrifice that God wants.(CEV)

Psalm 111: 9 He sent redemption to his people;He has commanded his covenant forever.Holy and fear is his name!(Esv)

Galizzi 2:20 I have been crucified with Christ.It is no longer living, but Christ living in him.And the life I now live in bones I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.(Esv)

1 John 3:16 Through this, we know love, that He has established His life for us, and we must establish our lives for the brothers.(Esv)

1 Corinthians 1:30 God unites you with Christ Jesus.For our benefit God has made it to be wisdom Himself.Christ made us right with God;He made us pure and holy, and he freed us from sin.(Nlt)

1 Corinthians 6:20 for God bought you at a high price.So you should honor God with your body.(Nlt)

John 3:16 For God so he loved the world, that he only gave his Son, that everyone who believes in him is not felt, but has eternal life.(Nasb)

2 Peter 3: 9 The Lord does not go slowly about His promise, because it is a little standing, but it is patient for you, who does not want anyone to die but for all who come to repentance.(Nasb)

Mark 10:45 Man's son has not become a master of the slaves, but a slave who will give his life to save many people.

(CEV)

Galizzi 1: 4 Christ informed God our Father and gave Himself as a sacrifice for our sins to save us from this evil world.(CEV)

How to ask for redemption

God does not

text:
"Ideali Vichy" għall-għajnejn: klijent reviżjonijiet. "ideali Vichy" Kif effettiva krema għall-ġilda madwar l-għajnejn? 

wiċċ frisk, il-perċezzjoni estetika tiegħu hija dipendenti fuq l-istat taż-żona madwar l-għajnejn. Illum, aħna żviluppa varjetà ta 'prodotti kosmetiċi, li jippermetti li jorganizzaw il-kura sħiħa ta' dan il-qasam. L-aktar popolari huwa l-droga innovattivi mill-marka "Vichy", parti mill- "ideali" tas-serje. Il-firxa ta 'fondi hija mfassla għal dawk in-nisa li jintuża biex jieħdu ħsieb tagħhom infushom, iżda mhux lesti li jqattgħu ħafna ħin. 

deskrizzjoni 

Dawn li ġejjin huma karatteristiċi ewlenin ta 'krema maħsuba għall-kura taż-żona madwar l-għajnejn. 

tip tal-ġilda, l-età 

Skond il-manifattur, il-fluwidu-krema "Vichy ideali" adattati għall-etajiet kollha u kull tipi tal-ġilda. Il-funzjonijiet ewlenin ta 'flus huma fil-pitch allinjament u mikro-eżenzjoni, il-ġlieda kontra manifestazzjonijiet ta' stress u għejja, smoothing tikmix u t-tnaqqis pigmentazzjoni. Bħala riżultat, il-ġilda ssir radjanti, fade ċrieki skur u irritazzjoni. 

Eye Krema tellgħu l hypoallergenic, li huwa importanti għan-nisa mal-ġilda sensittiva suxxettibbli għall-irritazzjoni. Il-prodott fih ilma termali, li huwa ġentili fuq l-epidermide, moisturizes u tneħħi sinjali ta 'għeja. Krema mingħajr parabens. 

Fin-nisa, mezz ta 'serje ta' reazzjonijiet għajn "ideali Vichy" kienu kif ġej: 

krema mhuwiex adattat għall-ġilda xotta, minħabba li għandha idratazzjoni insuffiċjenti. Huwa konvenjenti għall-użu matul il-ġurnata, meta dawn jibdew sinjali ta 'għejja manifest, iżda mhux aktar. 

Fir-rigward ġilda sensittiva tfisser "ideali Vichy" wera li sorprendentement tajba. Hija ma tikkawżax xi irritazzjoni, ħmura, u problemi oħra. Għamla wara l-applikazzjoni taqa mingħajr xkiel mingħajr żliq. 

komponenti innovattivi 

Fil-kompożizzjoni rappreżentata permezz ta 'komponenti attivi. Dan polifenoli, vitamini, Ah, jittrasforma l-ġilda, jum wara jum, li ppruvat dermatologically ttestjati. Radjanza jipprovdi DRM kumplessi, u l-kaffeina tgħin biex ton-epidermis. 

mezzi Effiċjenza hija pprovduta kif ġej: 

Kaffeina - jelimina basktijiet, inaqqas nefħa, għandu effett sedattiv. kontorn għajn isir aktar espressiva. 

DRM bright-kumpless jipprovdi radjanza jagħmel il-ġilda eħfef. 

Wara l-applikazzjoni tal-fluwidu ma jkunx immedjatament assorbita. Jekk inti żżomm idejn taħt għajnejn tiegħu, huwa kien se ċapep. Għamla huwa aħjar li jitqiegħdu fil-15 minuta wara l-użu, inkella jista 'jirriżulta suċċess.

text:
Parteċipazzjoni f'Doorslammers għal Rosello Cassar u Paul Fenech 

Intemmet l-avventura għas-sewwieqa Maltin Rosello Cassar u Paul Fenech f'Santa Pod fl-Ingilterra fl-avveniment Doorslammers. L-esperjenza għaż-żewġ sewwieqa kienet aktar ta' suċċess għal Rosello Cassar. 

Hu spiċċa mal-ewwel 16-il karozza mis-57 li kkompetew. Cassar ġie eliminat biss qabel il-kwarti tal-finali u wara li għadda mill-eliminazzjonijiet kollha u l-ewwel żewġ rawnds, tilef kontra Nic Williams b'differenza ta' 0.08 ta' sekonda. Nic Williams spiċċa rebbieħ tal-klassi. 

Paul Fenech saq l-Escort ta' Andy Harris u deher li kollox beda tajjeb għaliex irnexxielhom inaqsu l-ħin minn 10.7 sekondi għal 10.4 ta' sekonda. Meta deher li kien kollox lest għall-ewwel eliminazzjoni, żviluppat ħsara teknika fis-sistema elettrika tal-karozza. Dan wassal biex Fenech kien eliminat minħabba li ma laħaqx ħareġ għat-tellieqa. 

Il-karozza tal-Ingliż Andy Harris mistennija terġa' tiġi lura Malta għat-tielet rawnd tal-kampjonat tal-kwart ta' mil f'Ħal Far.
translation:
Participation in doorslammers for Rosello Cassar and Paul Fenech

The adventure for Maltese drivers Rosello Cassar and Paul Fenech at Santa Pod in England at the Doorslammers event ended.Experience for both drivers was more successful for Rosello Cassar.

He finished with the first 16 cars of the 57 competing.Cassar was eliminated only before the quarterfinals and after passing all the eliminations and the first two rounds, losing against Nic Williams with a difference of 0.08 seconds.Nic Williams ended up winning a class.

Paul Fenech drove Andy Harris's Escort and it seemed all started well because they managed to drop the time from 10.7 seconds to 10.4 of a second.When it appeared to be everything ready for first elimination, developed technical damage to the car's electrical system.This led to Fenech being eliminated because he did not reach the race.

English car Andy Harris is expected to return to Malta for the third round of the quarter-mile championship in Hal Far.

text:
Kultura komuni ħafna, li ħafna drabi tidher fuq it-tabelli tagħna, hija insalata tal-weraq. Fis-sajf, huwa mkabbar fuq plottijiet, f'ġonna tal-ħxejjex, fi rziezet speċjalizzati, iżda fix-xitwa huwa frekwenter ta 'ħwienet tal-ħxejjex. Naturalment, il-ħass huwa aktar popolari minħabba l-valuri nutrittivi tiegħu u r-rikkezza tal-kompożizzjoni kimika. 

Fil-meraq tal-ħass fih numru kbir ta 'dawk l-aktar meħtieġa u utli għas-sustanzi tal-bniedem. Iżda wkoll għandha ħafna kwalitajiet ta 'fejqan, per eżempju, il-ġbir ta' ħut b'suċċess jimxi mal-manteniment tas-saħħa u saħansitra jgħin biex jeħles mill-mard diġà eżistenti, jippreserva sbuħija u jtawwal iż-żgħażagħ. 

Jekk mbuttat frisk, allura hemm ammont kbir ta 'vitamini, sustanzi organiċi ta' melħ minerali. Iżda dawn il-kwalitajiet kollha jiddependu fuq il-kondizzjonijiet li taħthom tiżdied l-insalata. Iz-zokkor naturali u l-aċidi organiċi, bħalma huma l-lumi, it-tuffieħ, l-ossaliku u l-ambra, f'dan l-impjant mhumiex ħafna, fi kwalunkwe każ inqas minn f'rappreżentanti oħra ta 'din l-ispeċi. Minerali rappreżentati fiha: potassju (aktar, chemostalnyh), kalċju, fosfru, silikon, manjeżju, kubrit, ħadid u sodju. Vitamini huma wkoll abbundanti fil-vitamini, huma vitamini tal-grupp sħiħ B, C, PP, E, H, K u karotên. 

Jekk anke l-persentaġġ ta 'ħadid fil-ħass u insinifikanti, iżda bl-użu tal-meraq tiegħu, huwa possibbli li tappoġġja perfettament il-funzjoni ematopojetika normali. Il-ħadid fl-organiżmu tagħna, bħala element attiv ħafna li jakkumula fil-milsa tal-fwied, qiegħed dejjem jiġi aġġornat. Jekk persuna tbiddel id-dieta tiegħu jew ikollha telf ta 'demm, allura meta l-ħadid fil-ġisem jonqos, huwa, meta jkun orga akkumulat, jintuża biex jifforma stokk ġdid ta' demm (ċelloli tad-demm). 

Vlatate-letucha ħafna kalċju u manjeżju, li mingħajrhom il-fibra tal-muskoli ma tistax taħdem b'mod normali, hemm ksur fis-sistema nervuża ċentrali, l-istruttura ċellulari u tat-tessut tiddeterjora. 

Il-korp enormi u r-rwol tal-kalċju, li huwa l-komponent ewlieni tat-tessut tal-għadam, l-enamel tas-snien, jappoġġja l-funzjonijiet vitali normali taċ-ċelloli, il-kompożizzjoni u l-fluwidu fit-tessuti. L-attività tal-biċċa l-kbira tal-enzimi mingħajr kalċju hija sempliċement impossibbli, kif ukoll it-trażmissjoni tal-impulsi tas-sistema nervuża. L-aħjar kombinazzjoni, li fiha l-kalċju u l-manjeżju huma l-ġirien, tgħinek minn ħafna problemi ta 'saħħa. 

Il-komponenti taċ-ċelluli tal-moħħ huma fosfru, u l-kubrit huwa preżenti fl-emoglobina. Żewġ minn dawn l-elementi, li huma parti mill-sod, li jinkludi wkoll silikon, se jappoġġjaw il-ġilda fi stat normali, jaffettwaw it-tkabbir tax-xagħar. L-għenieqed u l-għeruq se jkunu ħafna aktar elastiċi. 

Jekk tgħaqqad il-meraq tal-ħass ma 'meraq tal-karrotta, allura dan il-cocktail ikun utli biex tixrob anki lit-tarbija, se tipprovdi għajnuna effettiva fit-tkabbir normali u l-iżvilupp tat-tarbija. 

Attrazzjoni ta 'ċistite, diskinesija, ulċeri fl-istonku u ulċeri duwodenali se jkollha effett benefiku tal-komposti alkalojdi ta' hyoscyamine, li huma parti mill-coccatalate-letuka. Effett analġesiku u serħan il-moħħ, dan il-meraq huwa obbligat għall-hyoscyamine. 

Il-meraq mbuttat minn dan l-impjant, li huwa sors ta 'sustanzi bħal karotên, vitamina C, bijotina hija vitamina ta' sbuħija, huwa indispensabbli għall-proċess ta 'sustanzi metaboliċi, għal ematopoiesi - dan kollu jiżgura l-kapaċità normali u sana tas-sistema nervuża. Dan huwa ta 'importanza kbira għat-tfal u għall-ommijiet futuri. 

Persuni morda bit-tuberkolożi u l-qtar, ibatu minn mard tal-passaġġ gastro-intestinali, huwa sempliċiment meħtieġ li tieħu meraq tal-ħass. Jekk ikun hemm problemi fis-sistema kardjovaskulari (anġina pectoris, mard tal-qalb iskemiku), il-meraq għandu effett paċifiku - għandu jittieħed dakinhar tal-vjaġġ għal ħmistax-il qatra, iżda bil-kondizzjoni li l-meraq ikun mbuttat mill-ġdid. 

Rihytrazvivaetsya minħabba nuqqas ta 'kalċju fil-ġisem u xi minerali. Is-sistema tal-għadam hija mrattab u deformat - f'dan

text:
Ħamsterż fl-adulti 

Il-ħosba tal-ħosba hija assoċjata ma 'mard tat-tfulija, iżda din il-marda hija komuni fost l-adulti. Il-ħati tiegħu huwa infezzjoni virali akuta, jiġifieri, tista 'tinqered wara li tkellem lil xi ħadd li diġà huwa morda bil-ħosba. Is-salvataġġ minn problemi bħal dawn, madankollu, jista 'jiġi mlaqqam. 

Sintomi ta 'ħosba fl-adulti 

Ladarba jintemm il-perjodu ta 'inkubazzjoni, u jista' jdum minn 1 sa 4 ġimgħat skont l-immunità, il-marda tidher sewwa. L-ewwel, hemm telqa, nodi linfatiċi jiżdiedu, żieda għolja fid-deni , ir-ras tibda tinqala ', u l-pazjent għandu biss ħolm ta' rqad kwiet. Barra minn hekk, ta 'spiss għall-bqija kollha jiżdiedu korija qawwija, sogħla niexfa, konġuntivite purulenta tista' tidher. Xi sinjali ta 'infezzjoni fl-adulti mhumiex meqjusa biċ-ċar bħala s-sintomi ta' ħosba fit-tfal , per eżempju, m'hemm l-ebda puplesija tat-trabi u granularità tal-kanal. Iżda anki mingħajr dan, il-pazjent għandu żmien diffiċli. 

F'din il-kundizzjoni, persuna morda tibqa 'għal 4-5 ijiem, u warajh il-kondizzjoni ttejjeb, iżda mhux għal żmien twil. Wara 1-2 ijiem, tidher darb'oħra temperatura għolja u tikek fuq in-naħa ta 'ġewwa tal-ħaddejn, simili għall-porridge tas-semolina li twaħħal. Dawn l-ewwel u l-aktar sinjali importanti ta 'ħosba fl-adulti jistgħu jippersistu sa l-irkupru. 

Bħala manifestazzjonijiet oħra ta 'ħosba fl-adulti, probabbilment kulħadd jaf - hemm eruzzjonijiet wara l-widnejn, fuq ir-ras, l-għonq, li kull jum aktar u aktar jirbħu t-territorju tal-ġisem tal-pazjent. Matul dan il-perjodu, is-sintomi kollha tal-ħosba jsiru agħar. 

Wara dak kollu li ġie ttrasferit, il-pazjent jilqa 'b'sodisfazzjon perjodu ta' pigmentazzjoni, meta l-kundizzjoni hija normalizzata, u ħafna sinjali tal-marda jisparixxu. Eruptions jisparixxu fi żmien ġimgħa. 

Profilassi tal-ħosba fl-adulti 

B'mod inekwivoku, l-aktar mod importanti ta 'prevenzjoni huwa t-tilqim. It-tilqim ta 'adulti kontra l-ħosba huwa meħtieġ, iżda huwa aħjar jekk il-vaċċin isir fit-tfulija - f'sena waħda, u għal 6 snin. Imma jekk din il-proċedura ma titwettaqx fil-ħin, m'hemm l-ebda raġuni għad-diżordni. It-tilqim tal-ħosba fl-adulti jitwettaq ukoll f'żewġ stadji b'waqfa ta 'tliet xhur. Il-vaċċin għal din il-marda jiġi amministrat flimkien mal-vaċċin kontra l-gattone, ir-rubella u l-ġidri tat-tiġieġ. Ipproteġi ruħek mill-marda fi kwalunkwe età u kull persuna sensibbli għandha tifhem l-importanza ta 'dan l-avveniment. Sabiex tkun infermiera, għandek tikkuntattja lit-tabib lokali tiegħek li se jagħti direzzjonijiet u rakkomandazzjonijiet. 

Trattament ta 'ħosba fl-adulti 

Jekk il-marda ma tiżviluppax f'forma kumplessa, allura hija ttrattata d-dar. Mistrieħ tas-sodda indikat, konsum ta 'ammonti kbar ta' likwidu, teħid ta 'vitamina A, kura bir-reqqa ta' l-għajnejn u l-imnieħer. L-antibijotiċi huma preskritti biss f'każijiet severi, il-bqija huma sintomatiċi u anti-istaminiċi. Il-ħosba tal-ħosba jista 'jikkawża kumplikazzjonijiet, għalhekk it-trattament m'għandux jittardja. 

Iżda huwa aħjar li tiġi evitata l-marda, tk. huwa kapaċi jagħti kumplikazzjonijiet. Speċjalment huwa karatteristiku għall-ħosba fl-adulti. Il-marda f'xi każijiet twassal għal telf tas-smigħ, il-vista, il-kliewi u l-ħsara fil-fwied, pnewmonja, enċefalite. Ħjut tal-ħosba in-nisa tqal iwasslu għat-telf tal-fetu. Kull sena, ħafna mwiet huma rreġistrati, iżda dawn huma l-aktar mard injorat jew iseħħu f'forma kkumplikata ħafna fl-isfond ta 'immunità mdgħajfa. 

Wara t-trasferiment tal-marda, il-memorja tibqa 'għall-ħajja u l-aktar ħaġa importanti hija li l-immunità tul il-ħajja hija prodotta. 

It-tobba huma avżati li ma jieħdux riskji, jissorveljaw is-saħħa tagħhom, jiżviluppaw l-immunità, jagħmlu t-tilqim fil-ħin, u jekk jimirdu, imsejħa immedjatament lit-tabib għall-għajnuna u fl-ebda każ ma jagħmlu l-awto-medikazzjoni.
translation:
Hamstered in adults

Magdish Mezba is associated with childhood diseases, but this disease is common among adults.His culprit is an acute viral infection, that is, it can be destroyed after talking to someone who is already sick with the mastery.Rescue from such problems, however, can be vaccinated.

Symptoms of measles in adults

Once the incubation period ends, and can last from 1 to 4 weeks depending on immunity, the disease appears well.First, there is a ridge, lymphatic nodes increase, a high fever increase, the head starts to break, and the patient has only quiet sleep.In addition, often for all the rest are added strong cores, dry cough, purulent conjunctivitis can be seen.Some signs of adult infection are not clearly regarded as the symptoms of measles in children, for example, there is no baby stroke and groove granularity.But even without that, the patient has a difficult time.

In this condition, a sick person stays for 4-5 days, after which the condition improves, but not for a long time.After 1-2 days, high temperature and spots appear on the inside of the cheeks, similar to the sticky semolina porridge.These first and most important signs of adult measles may persist until recovery.

As other adult measles manifestations, everyone probably knows-there are eruptions behind the ears, on the head, the neck, which each day more and more win the territory of the patient's body.During this period, all measles symptoms become worse.

After all that was transferred, the patient welcomes a period of pigmentation, when the condition is normalized, and many signs of the disease disappear.Eruptions disappear within a week.

A measles prophylaxis in adults

Inequivocally, the most important way of prevention is vaccination.Matching adults against measles is needed, but it is best if the vaccine is done in childhood-in one year, and for 6 years.But if this procedure is not performed on time, there is no reason for the disorder.Magging in adults is also performed in two stages with a three-month break.The vaccine for this disease is administered in conjunction with the anti-gattone vaccine, rubella and chicken smallpox.Protect yourself from the disease at any age and any sensible person should understand the importance of this event.In order to be a nurse, you should contact your local doctor who will give directions and recommendations.

Treatment of mooks in adults

If the disease does not develop in a complex form, then it is treated at home.Indicated bed rest, consumption of large amounts of liquid, vitamin A intake, careful care of the eyes and nose.Antibiotics are prescribed only in severe cases, the rest are symptomatic and antihistamines.Magdis measles can cause complications, so treatment should not be delayed.

But it is better to prevent the disease, tk.It is capable of giving complications.Especially it is characteristic for the measles in adults.The disease in some cases leads to loss of hearing, vision, kidney and liver damage, pneumonia, encephalitis.Mear yarn pregnant women lead to fetal loss.Every year, many deaths are recorded, but these are the most ignored diseases or occur in a very complicated form against the background of weakened immunity.

After the transfer of the disease, memory remains for life and the most important thing is that lifelong immunity is produced.

Doctors are advised not to take risks, monitor their health, develop immunity, make vaccination on time, and if they get sick, immediately called the doctor for help and in no case do theself-medication.

Halkidiki huwa l-qasam resort prinċipali tal-Greċja kontinentali. B'kuntrast mal-gżejjer li jinsabu fin-nofsinhar, il-peniżola mgħaddsa fil-aħdar jgħajjat, inkluż l-għoli tas-sħana tas-sajf. Halkidiki hija peniżola li qisu Trident - bi tlett frottiet. Huwa protett sew mir-riħ mill-muntanji tal-madwar, għalhekk il-baħar huwa kważi dejjem kalm, sew imsaħħna. 

pajsaġġi pittoreski uniku, bajjiet tad-deheb, ilma nadif ċara, monumenti antiki, irħula tas-sajd u resorts lussu - dan kollu ġenna qed tistenna dawk li huma għaddejjin għall-mistrieħ fuq Cassandra - "tas-swaba" ta 'Halkidiki.

informazzjoni ġenerali

infrastruttura

Huwa possibbli li l-kera ta 'sikur-ċelluli, kif ukoll ħażna bagalji. Akkoljenza huwa miftuħ madwar l-arloġġ. Għalkemm il-lukanda u qal fissi ħin tal-wasla, madankollu, bla ħsara għad-approvazzjoni disponibbiltà jistgħu jiġu prattikati fi żmien inadatt. Tluq Ħin - nofsinhar. 

Fir-reġistru, inti tista 'wkoll tuża l-magna tal-faks, kif ukoll jirranġa tax-shuttle jew taxi. Il-lukanda kienet kmamar għall-mistednin b'diżabilità, kif ukoll il-kundizzjonijiet kollha, inkluż rampi għall-moviment ta 'siġġu tar-roti. Nimxu fl bl-annimali domestiċi ma jkunx provdut fil-lukanda. It-territorju għandu parkeġġ privat b'xejn, li mhix meħtieġa minn qabel lill riserva. 

Fond djar 

Il Iris Hotel Siviri 3 * kollha sebgħin sitta kmamar. Xi wħud minnhom kienu kompletament rinnovat fl-2014. Kategoriji kamra - Doubles u quadruples, bi spazju ta'25 u 30 metru kwadru. 

L-lukanda hija bl-arja kondizzjonata ispazju. Il-kmamar huma mgħammra ma 'sistema maqsuma, satellite TV, refriġeraturi, u xi wħud sikur, li tista' tuża għal miżata. Il kmamar Double kmamar stabbiliti żewġ sodod waħda, hemm il-possibbiltà ta 'extra bed. okkupanza massimu possibbli: 3 + 1 jew 2 + 2. Hemm ukoll terrazzin bl-għamara tal-plastik. kmamar jikkwadrupla huma żewġ sodod waħda u double sufan-sodda wieħed. 

Fil-banju flimkien ma doċċa, b'herdrijer. oġġetti iġjene aġġornata kuljum. -Istess frekwenza ta 'kmamar tat-tindif. Folji huma mibdula żewġ jew tliet darbiet fil-ġimgħa. 

Hotel Iris Hotel 3 * toffri żewġ kunċetti qawwa "full board" u "half board" tat-tip "buffet" fir-ristorant fit-tieni sular tal-bini prinċipali. Dawk interessati jistgħu jżuru l-à la carte ristorant u jitqiegħed fuq it-terrazzin. Joperaw fit-territorju ta 'żewġ bars --pool u fil-lobby. 

Pranzu serva għar-residenti Griega inbid - aħmar u abjad - fejn jagħżlu. 

Iris Hotel Siviri 3 * reviżjonijiet tal-alternattiva ikla gets bażikament l-uniku pożittiv. Il-lukanda tappartjeni għall-klassi ekonomika, iżda l-ikliet offruti huma sodisfatti ma 'kważi kollox. Il-menu hija dejjem ħafna ta 'laħam - minn fenek biex kustilji tal-majjal, varjetà ta' platti sekondarji, li jvarjaw mill-tradizzjonali

text:
(1) The price stipulated in a contract is not to be considered an unfair term. 

(2) A contract may include standard expressions, created to protected the needs of the trade, however these must also take into account the interests and rights of the consumer. 

Facts 

The parties had entered into an agreement whereby the plaintiff was to provide advertising services to the defendants. Payment was to be effected to the plaintiff only on condition that the property being advertised was sold within two years of the agreement being made, which indeed happened. The defendants never paid for such services, leading to the plaintiff instituting court procedures against them. The defendants pleaded that the plaintiff's claim was inadmissible due to various terms and conditions in the agreement being allegedly unjust or prohibited and therefore do not bind the defendants according to the Consumer Affairs Act (which implements Directive 93/13). The defendants also claimed that the sale of the property came about not by means of the services of the plaintiff. 

Legal issue 

The court held that the evaluation of whether a clause is unfair or not cannot be tied to the adequacy of the price or remuneration as compared to the object or services being provided. In addition, the plaintiff knew that two other estate agents were currently actively attempting to sell the property in question, and yet those agents were excluded from a list of agents whereby should any of them be successful, the price would be reduced. The court held that such behaviour on the part of the plaintiff was not compatible with good faith. 

Decision 

(1) Can a high price in a contract be considered an unfair term? 

(2) What constitutes in/compatibility with the requirement of good faith?

Illi ghalkemm interpellati diversi drabi sabiex ihallsu dan id-debitu, inkluz permezz ta ittra ufficcjali ai termini tal-artikolu 166A Kap 12 tal-Ligijiet ta Malta li ggib in-numru 107/11, il-konvenuti mhux talli baqghu inadempjenti izda addirittura qed jallegaw in-nullita' tal-istess, liema allegazzjoni qed tigi kkontestata.

Cupcake Cupcakes 

Cupcakes bi qara Pumpkin huwa ġeneralment majjal imsajjar, dixxijiet sekondarji, ġamm, qargħa oħra hija użata għall-insalati, casseroles u deżerti, jien ukoll insajru dan kollu u għadhom nużawha fil-ħami. Speċjalment inħobb żagħfran fragranti u cupcakes tal-qara 'ċikkulata, li r-riċetta tagħhom se naqsam. Dawn huma tajbin fil-forma ta 'muffins żgħar b'biċċiet żgħar, u cupcakes kbar, u anki fil-forma ta' kejk strixxa magħmula minn żewġ tipi ta 'għaġina. Ipprova kollha jew waħda mill-għażliet għas-saħħa tiegħek u parti sabiħa tat-te. 

Pass 1 Biex tagħmel 12 cupcakes żgħar għandek bżonn qargħa ħamra, trab tal-ħami, zokkor, bajd, butir (jew marġerina għall-ħami), żagħfran u kawkaw. 

Pass 5 L-għaġina għall-kejkijiet taż-żagħfran tal-qara ħamra hija lesta, nofsha hija mifruxa fuq moffa jew moffa ta 'silikon. 

Pass 6 Fit-tieni nofs tat-test, żid il-kawkaw u ħallat sakemm tkun bla xkiel. 

Stadju 7 L-għaġina taċ-ċikkulata tinfirex ukoll fuq forom igglejżjati jew silikon. Agħmel cupcakes żgħar bħal dawn f'temperatura ta'200 ° C għal madwar 20 minuta. 

Pass 8 Muffins mitmuma joħorġu mill-imwarrbin, u wara t-tkessiħ, sprinkle bit-trab taz-zokkor jew iżżejnu l-Predisposizzjoni tiegħek!

Step 1 To make 12 small cupcakes you need pumpkins, baking powder, sugar, eggs, butter (or margarine for baking), saffron and cocoa.

Step 5 The dough for pumpkin saffron cakes is ready, half is spread over mold or silicone mold.

Step 6 In the second half of the test, add the cocoa and mix until it is smooth.

Step 7 The chocolate dough also spreads on glazed or silicone molds.Make such small cupcakes at 200 ° C for about 20 minutes.

Step 8 completed muffins emerge from the molds, and after cooling, sprinkle with sugar powder or decorate your predisposition!

text:
Kif tneħħi VKSaver mill-kompjuter tiegħek? 

Spazji tal-Internet huma mimlija bil-varjetà ta 'applikazzjonijiet biex tniżżel awdjo u vidjo mill-netwerk soċjali VKontakte. Fost dawn hemm kemm ħielsa u mħallsa, kemm jaħdmu u moshennicheskie- xi għażla. Wieħed mill-programmi l-aktar popolari ta 'din il-kategorija hija VKSaver. Madankollu, ħafna utenti li installati l-programm, innota l-fenomeni mhux tas-soltu jseħħu mal-kompjuter. Spiss kien hemm ebda buttuna biex tniżżel mużika jew video, u jekk kien, huwa spiss meta paġna tniżżil "tellgħu". Barra minn hekk, iż-żieda notevoli fil-viruses katastrofiċi. Dan huwa għaliex ħafna nies wara l-użu qasir ta 'l-applikazzjoni għamlet id-deċiżjoni biex jitneħħew VKSaver. Spiss, madankollu, rriżulta li mhuwiex faċli. 

F'dan l-artikolu, aħna se tiddeskrivi diversi modi ta 'kif tneħħi VKSaver. 

Metodu 1: Kif uninstall VKSaver jużaw standard OS Windows 

Biex tagħmel dan, mur l-Control Panel (taqsima Software u Applikazzjonijiet / Installa jew Neħħi Programs). Fil -waqgħa-lista, insibu l-isem tal-programm tagħna u ikklikkja "Uninstall." Jekk dan il-metodu jaħdem tajjeb ħafna. Spiss, madankollu, li ħafna jgħidu li l-programm isem VKSaver ma tkunx fil-lista ta 'programmi installati, jew meta tħassar il-messaġġ li l-applikazzjoni ma tistax titħassar minħabba li huwa użat minn proċess ieħor. F'dan il-każ, aħna tipproċedi għall-pass li jmiss. 

Metodu 2: Biex tħassar VKSaver bl-użu tar-reġistru 

Fi kwalunkwe każ, il-programm huwa preżenti fil-menu istartjar. Dan huwa evidenzjat mill-fatt li meta tibda kompjuter tiegħek, icon tagħha jidher fil-bar fil-qiegħ dritt kantuniera. Sabiex uninstall sew il-programm, trid tneħħiha mill-menu istartjar. Biex tagħmel dan, mur fil-menu Bidu, imbagħad ikklikkja Run / msconfig / Istartjar. Hawnhekk aħna tneħħi l-VKSaver qurdien. Għall-bidliet jidħlu fis-seħħ, għandek bżonn li reboot. Barra minn hekk, wara twettiq ta 'dawn l-azzjonijiet, kombinazzjoni jirreklutaw Win + R (linja ta' kmand sejħa) u t-tip fil-regedit linja kelma. Aħna kiseb aċċess għall-reġistrazzjonijiet. It-tfittxija (Ctrl + F) ittajpjat l-isem tal-programm tagħna, ir-riżultati tat-tiftix tneħħi fallen. Għandu jiġi mfakkar li, qabel VKSaver neħħi mir-reġistru, inti għandek tagħmel kopja backup (-Fajls / Esportazzjoni / Save fuq id-diska jitneħħa (jew kwalunkwe nuqqas ta 'sistema ta' sewqan oħra)). Wara dan, aħna tneħħi l-shortcuts tal-programm u scan sistema tiegħek għall-virusijiet. Istartjar mill-ġdid il-kompjuter. 

Metodu 3: Kif tneħħi awtomatikament VKSaver Sal-lum, hemm varjetà kbira ta 'utilitajiet, it-tneħħija applikazzjonijiet mhux użati fuq il-kompjuter tiegħek. Dawn jissejħu l-programm 'deistallyatory. Jekk ma tkunx taf liema tip ta 'minnhom biex tagħżel, inti tista google u aqra reviżjonijiet utent. Tista 'wkoll tixtri l-verżjoni demo tal-miżata programm, normalment id-data ta' skadenza huwa 30 jum. L-għodda l-aktar popolari li uninstall - dan Revo Uninstaller Pro u ħielsa Uninstall Hu. Minbarra l tindif sħiħa tal-hard drive li minnha sar softwer bla bżonn, dawn l-applikazzjonijiet għandhom ħafna karatteristiċi utli oħra. Wara l-iskadenza ta 'perjodu ħieles użu kondizzjonali, inti tista' tixtri ewlieni.

How to remove vksaver from your computer?

Internet spaces are filled with a variety of applications to download audio and video from the VKontakte social network.Among them are both free and paid, both work and moshennicheskie- some choice.One of the most popular programs of this category is VKSaver.However, many users who installed the program, noted the unusual phenomena occur with the computer.Often there was no button to download music or video, and if it was, it is often when a download page "Follow".In addition, the noticeable increase in catastrophic viruses.This is why many people after the short use of the application made the decision to remove VKSaver.Often, however, it turned out to be easy.

In this article, we will describe various ways of removing VKSaver.

Method 1: How to Uninstall VKSaver using Standard OS Windows

To do this, go to the Control Panel (Software Section and Applications / Install or Remove Programs).In the drop-list, we find our program name and click "Uninstall."If this method works very well.Often, however, that many say that the VKSaver name program is not on the list of installed programs, or when deleting the message that the application cannot be deleted because it is used by another process.In this case, we proceed to the next step.

Method 2: To delete VKSaver using the registry

In any case, the program is present in the startup menu.This is evidenced by the fact that when you start your computer, its icon appears at the bar at the bottom right corner.In order to uninstall the program, you must remove it from the startup menu.To do this, go to the start menu, then click Run / Msconfig / startup.Here we remove the VKSaver ticks.For changes to come into play, you need to reboot.In addition, after carrying out these actions, a combination recruit Win + R (a command line call) and the type in the word line regedit.We have gained access to registrations.The search (Ctrl + F) typed the name of our program, the search results remove fallen.It should be remembered that, before VKSaver Remove from the registry, you have to make a backup copy (files / export / save on the disk removed (or any other driving system failure)).After that, we remove the program shortcuts and scan your system for viruses.Restart the computer.

Method 3: How to automatically remove VKSaver to date, there is a large variety of utilities, removing unused applications on your computer.These are called the program 'Deistallyatory.If you do not know what kind of of them to select, you can Google and read user reviews.You can also purchase the demo version of the program fee, usually the expiration date is 30 days.The most popular tool to uninstall-this Revo uninstaller pro and free uninstall is.In addition to the full cleaning of the hard drive from which unnecessary software has been made, these applications have many other useful features.After the expiry of a free conditional use period, you can buy a key.

Il-gazzetta MaltaToday żvelat li Bogdanovic, li hi ddeskriviet bħala ħabib tal-qalb tal-Ministru Justyne Caruana, irċieva kuntratt ta' tliet xhur ta' €15,000 biex jaħdem fuq il-kurrikulu nazzjonali tal-isport, minkejja li m'għandux kwalifiki pedagoġiċi. 

It-talba lil Hyzler saret mill-kandidat indipendenti Prof. Arnold Cassola, “billi jingħad li Bogdanovic hu l-boyfriend tal-Ministru.” 

Intant, l-NGO Repubblika kkundannat bil-qawwa d-deċiżjoni tal-Ministru li tagħti kuntratt bħal dak lil Bogdanovic meta dan mhux kwalifikat. 

L-għaqda staqsiet jekk il-Prim Ministru Robert Abela hux se jieħu azzjoni kontra l-Ministru.
translation:
The Maltatoday newspaper revealed that Bogdanovic, which she described as Minister of Heart of Minister Justyne Caruana, received a three-month € 15,000 contract to work on the national sports curriculum, despite not having pedagogical qualifications.

The request to Hyzler was made by the independent candidate Prof.Arnold Cassola, "by saying that Bogdanovic is the minister's boyfriend."

Meanwhile, the NGO Republic strongly condemned the Minister's decision to award such a contract to Bogdanovic when he is unqualified.

The union asked whether Prime Minister Robert Abela would take action against the Minister.

text:
Qabel u wara t-Tieni Gwerra Dinjija, l-Istati Uniti sar ċentru ta 'attività mużikali. Bosta kompożituri mill-Ewropa mċaqalqa lejn l-Istati Uniti u xi wħud minnhom saħansitra saru membri tal-fakultà. Skopri l-forom u l-istili tal-mużika, flimkien mal-kompożituri u l-mużiċisti, li ddefinixxew il-mużika tas-seklu għoxrin. 

Formoli ta 'Mużika u Stili tas-Seklu 20 

Sistema tat-12-tone: Terminu prinċipalment attribwit lil Arnold Schoenberg, li ried jelimina ċ-ċentru tat-ton. Huwa żviluppa teknika msejħa sistema 12-ton fejn it-12-il noti kollha ta 'l-ottava huma ta' l-istess importanza. In-noti ta'12 jitqiegħdu f'ordni speċifiku msejjaħ "tone-row" jew "tone-series," u l-ebda nota mhija ripetuta f'ringiela. Din il-mużika evokata li ħassitha ansjuża u mhux solvuta. 

Mużika tal-Kunċert: Ħafna kompożituri flimkien flimkien ma 'mużika ta' mużika jazz mużikali bħal mużika klassika u blu. Il-mużika matul dan iż-żmien tkellmet ukoll dwar il-fervur nazzjonalista. Xi wħud mill-kompożituri li x-xogħlijiet tagħhom kienu apprezzati ħafna kienu George Gershwin (Rhapsody in Blue), Aaron Copland (Rodeo) u Dmitry Shostakovich (The Golden Age). 

Mużika Elettronika: Kompożituri ta 'mużika elettronika esperimentati bit-teknoloġija u kif taffettwa ċerti aspetti tal-mużika bħall- melodija u r-ritmu . 

Impressionist: Dan it-terminu ġej mill-pittur Monet, fix-xogħol, Impressjoni, Sunrise . Fil-mużika, huwa applikat għal xogħlijiet ta 'kompożituri ta' seklu għoxrin bikrija bħal Debussy. Debussy ċaħad ir-regoli tat-tonalità u l-mużika maħluqa li hija pjaċevoli għall-widnejn peress li l-pitturi impressjonanti huma attraenti għall-għajnejn. Dan irriżulta fi mużika li kienet rilassata u kważi ħolm. 

Minimalism: Din it-tip ta 'mużika kienet mudelli sempliċi u li dehru li ġew ripetuti u appoġġjati minn taħdit sod. Il-mużika ta 'Steve Reich u Philip Glass ġew immarkati bħala tali. 

Neoklassiku: Terminu applikat għall-mużika ta 'kompożituri bikrija tas-seklu għoxrin bħal Stravinsky li tirrifletti l-mużika tas-seklu tmintax. Ix-xogħlijiet ta 'Stravinsky, b'mod partikolari wara r- Rite tar-Rebbiegħa milqugħ tajjeb ħafna, ma enfasizzawx it-tonalità iżda ħassewhom imrażżna. Stravinsky ġie skopert minn Sergei Diaghilev, il-produttur tal-Ballet Rouse. Ix-xogħlijiet preċedenti tiegħu kienu jirriflettu l-influwenzi minn dissussjoni ta 'Debussy u mudelli ritmiki irregolari. 

Serialism: Din kienet ibbażata fuq is-sistema ta'12-ton ta' Schoenberg, li tkompliet mill-istudent Anton von Webern. Is-serialism kien evidenti fil-mużika tas-snin 50 u 60 iżda l-apprezzament kien limitat għall-professuri tal-università u għall-istudenti tagħhom. Is-serialism użat formula mużikali stretta li kienet diffiċli biex tilgħab. Il-kompożituri li użaw din it-teknika kienu Milton Babbitt u Pierre Boulez, biex insemmu ftit. 

John Cage: Kompożitur Amerikan tas-Seklu 20 magħruf għall-ideat innovattivi u avant-garde tiegħu li joħloq u japprezza l-mużika. Huwa fassal il- "pjaneta ppreparata." 

Henry Cowell: Il-kompożitur Amerikan, u wieħed mill-inventuri ta 'strument elettriku msejjaħ "ritmiku", li kiteb biċċiet fejn il-mużiċisti kellhom il-keys ta' piano billi jolqtuh bl-dirgħajn jew il-polz tagħhom u qtugħ jew iġbed il-kordi. 

Edgard Varese: Wieħed mill-kompożituri li esperimentaw bil-mużika u t-teknoloġija. Huwa kiteb biċċa għal orkestra komposta minn strumenti biss ta 'perkussjoni. Huwa għamel ukoll esperiment ma 'mużika msewwija u strumenti elettroniċi.
translation:
Before and after World War II, the United States became a center of musical activity.Many composers from Europe moved to the United States and some have even become members of the faculty.Discover the shapes and styles of music, along with composers and musicians, who defined the music of the twentieth century.

20th-century music and styles forms

12-tone system: a term mainly attributed to Arnold Schoenberg, who wanted to eliminate the center of the tone.He developed a 12-tone system where all 12 octave notes are of the same importance.The 12 notes are placed in a specific order called "Tone-Row" or "Tone-Series," and no note is repeated in a row.This evoked music felt anxious and unresolved.

Concert music: Many composers together with music jazz music such as classical and blue music.Music during this time also spoke about Nationalist fervor.Some of the highly appreciated composers were George Gershwin (Rhapsody in Blue), Aaron Copland (Rodeo) and Dmitry Shostakovich (The Golden Age).

Electronic music: technology-experimented electronic music composers and how to affect certain aspects of music such as melody and rhythm.

Impressionist: This term comes from the painter Monet, at work, impression, sunrise.In music, it is applied to works of composers of the early twentieth century such as Debussy.Debussy has rejected the rules of tone and created music that is enjoyable for the ears as impressive paintings are attractive to the eyes.This resulted in music that was relaxed and almost dreams.

Minimalism: This type of music was simple models and seemed to have been repeated and supported by firm speaking.The music of Steve Reich and Philip Glass have been marked as such.

Neoclassic: a term applied to the music of early twentieth century composers like Stravinsky that reflects the music of the eighteenth century.Stravinsky's works, particularly after the spring rite very well welcomed, did not emphasize the tonality but felt suppressed.Stravinsky was discovered by Sergei Diaghilev, the Rouse Ballet producer.His previous works reflected the influences from Debussy's dissecting and irregular rhythmic models.

Serialism: This was based on Schoenberg's 12-tone system, which was continued by student Anton von Webern.Serialism was evident in the music of the 1950s and 60 but the appreciation was limited to the university professors and their students.Serialism used a strict musical formula that was difficult to play.The composers who used this technique were Milton Babbitt and Pierre Boulez, to name a few.

JOHN CAGE: A 20th-century American composer known for his innovative and avant-garde ideas to create and appreciate music.He designed the "prepared planet."

Henry Cowell: the American composer, and one of the inventors of an electric instrument called "rhythmic", who wrote pieces where the musicians had the Keys of Piano by hitting it with their arms or wrists and cutting or pullingThe strings.

Edgard Varese: One of the composers who have experimented with music and technology.He wrote a piece for an orchestra composed of only percussion instruments.He also conducted an experiment with repaired music and electronic instruments.

text:
X'għandek tkun taf Qabel Tixtri Eżerċizzju Pilates Mat 

Il-biċċa l-kbira ta 'studenti ddedikati tal-Pilates għandhom twapet Pilates li huma mfassla minn bażijiet ta' l-injam u miksija b'mod artifiċjali. B'differenza yoga, f'tali studios, studenti tal-Pilates ma jaslux għal workout bit-twapet tagħhom stess. Mela x'jagħmlu l-prattikanti tal-Pilates meta jkunu jridu jaħdmu barra mill-istudju? A tapit yoga? Mhux eżatt. Huma jużaw mats ta 'eżerċizzju tad-dar huma speċifikament adattati għal Pilates . 

Qabel ma tagħbija l-shopping cart tiegħek, aqra biex issir taf liema stili, speċifikazzjonijiet u materjali huma xierqa għal workout Pilates. Jekk possibbli, ittestja drive-tapit qabel ma tagħmel impenn. 

Ħoxna jew irqaq 

Mats Pilates u yoga huma simili fid-daqs, iżda d-differenza ewlenija hija l-ħxuna. A tapit yoga standard huwa wieħed minn tmienja ta 'pulzier oħxon. Għal Pilates, huwa imperattiv li t-tapit huwa eħxen u / jew dens aktar minn tapit tal-yoga. Il-yoga timpjega ħafna aktar eżerċizzji permanenti li jeħtieġu tapit li jappoġġja proprioception u bilanċ aħjar. Pilates, min-naħa l-oħra, juża t-tapit għal volum akbar ta 'eżerċizzji fuq id-dahar u l-istonku tiegħek. Pilates jirrikjedi wkoll li l-istudenti jwettqu ammont sinifikanti ta 'eżerċizzji ta' rrolljar ta 'l-ispina. Ipprova dawk fuq tapita rqiqa tal-yoga u int tgħid kelma waħda. Ouch! It-twapet tal-yoga jagħmlu użu minn finitura li teħel li tgħin biex tevita li tiżloq. L-eżerċizzji tal-Pilates ma jiddependux fuq din il-karatteristika u bosta eżerċizzji jibbenefikaw minn erja tas-superfiċje li tinxtorob. 

Agħżel tapit li huwa ta 'nofs pulzier ħoxnin. Twapet ġodda li għandhom fowm dens ħafna jistgħu jipprovdu ttaffi adattati fi tliet eights biss ta 'pulzier. Kwalunkwe inqas minn dak u inti tista 'tħoss l-effetti ta' sinsla li tkun imbenġla wara li tagħmel it-tapit tiegħek. 

It-twapet tas-saħħa standard huma madwar żewġ saqajn wiesa 'b'sitt piedi twal. 

A rutina sħiħa tal-bsaten tal-Pilates ċertament tista 'tinkiseb fuq tapit standard tal-yoga. Madankollu, jista 'jkollok aktar għażliet hekk kif il-prattika tiegħek timxi fuq paletta kemmxejn usa'. Jekk l-ispazju ma jkunx fattur li jillimita, fittex tabib tal-gymnasium fl-iskola l-qadima fejn tista 'tistira u tuża l-wiċċ sħiħ disponibbli. 

Agħżel tapp li jixraq l-ispazju personali tiegħek. Jekk possibbli, varjetà ta 'twapet ta' fitness industrijali għandhom disponibbli f'ħafna daqsijiet. Marda ta 'erba' mili bi tmien saqajn tas-saqajn hija perfettament vijabbli għal tapit ta 'Pilates tad-dar. 

Għażliet ta 'Densità 

Xi materjali ġodda jgħaqqdu b'suċċess id-densità u t-ttaffi fi profil iktar baxx, tapit irqaq. X'hemm l-iktar importanti hu li inti teżamina fiżikament it-tapit. Għandek żewġ għażliet fir-rigward tad-densità. Struttura ta 'densità ħoxna li tipprovdi biżżejjed ttaffi għas-sinsla tad-dahar f'petri sod ħafna. Imma tista 'wkoll tagħżel b'tapit tal-ġinnast li hija ħafna eħxen ħafna inqas sod. L-irtubija ta 'tapit tal-ġinnastika tfisser li jkollok inqas appoġġ u li fil-fatt tista' tipprovdi sfida akbar għall-ġisem. 

Agħżel tapit li huwa dens biżżejjed biex iżomm il-kuxxinett tas-sinsla iżda jagħżel itaffu skond il-preferenza. It-twapet tad-ditta għandhom il-post tagħhom u twapet irqaq huma wkoll utli ħafna għal Pilates fid-dar. 

Mur Pro? 

Jekk l-ispazju u l-baġit mhumiex kwistjoni u qed tfittex esperjenzi awtentiċi fid-dar Pilates, tikkunsidra li tmur fuq livell pro. Il-manifatturi tal-Pilates ibiegħu lil studjows kif ukoll lill-individwi. Twapet stil Studio għandhom għażliet bħal kavilji injam għal idejk, aċċessorji bħal kaxxi żgħar u ċineg li ganċ fuq
translation:
What to know before buying a Pilates Mat exercise

Most dedicated Pilates students have Pilates mats that are designed from wooden bases and artificially coated.Unlike yoga, in such studios, Pilates students do not come to a workout with their own rugs.So what do Pilates practitioners do when they want to work out of the study?A yoga carpet?Inaccurate.They use home exercise mats are specifically suitable for Pilates.

Before loading your shopping cart, read to find out what styles, specifications and materials are suitable for workout Pilates.If possible, test a drive-carpet before making a commitment.

Thick or thin

Pilates and yoga mats are similar in size, but the main difference is the thickness.A standard yoga mat is one of eight inches thick.For Pilates, it is imperative that the carpet is thicker and / or dense more than a yoga mat.Yoga employs many more permanent exercises that require a carpet that supports better proprioception and balance.Pilates, on the other hand, use the carpet for a larger volume of exercises on your back and stomach.Pilates also requires students to perform a significant amount of spinal rolling exercises.Try those on a thin yoga mat and you say one word.Ouch!Yoga rugs make use of a adhesive finish that helps avoid slippery.Pilates exercises do not depend on this feature and many exercises benefit from a shrinking surface area.

Choose a carpet that is half inch thick.New rugs with very dense foam can provide suitable cushioning in only three inch eights.Any less than that and you may feel the effects of a spine that is bruised after making your carpet.

Standard health rugs are about two feet wide with six feet long.

A full routine of pillates sticks can certainly be obtained on a standard yoga mat.However, you may have more options as your practice moves on a slightly wider palette.If the space is not a limiting factor, look for a gymnasium doctor in the old school where you can stretch and use the full face available.

Choose a cap that suits your personal space.If possible, a variety of industrial fitness mats have available in many sizes.A four-mile foot with eight feet is perfectly viable for a carpet of home Pilates.

Density options

Some new materials successfully combine density and cushioning in a lower profile, thinner carpet.What's most important is that you physically examine the carpet.You have two options regarding density.A thick density structure that provides sufficient spinal cushion in very firm petries.But you can also choose with a gymnast mat that is much thicker much less firm.The softness of a gymnastics carpet means having less support and that you can actually provide a greater challenge for the body.

Select a carpet that is dense enough to hold the spine pad but choose to smooth according to preference.The brand rugs have their place and thin rugs are also very useful for Pilates at home.

Go pro?

If space and budget are not an issue and are looking for authentic experiences in the Pilates home, consider going to a pro level.Pilates manufacturers sell to studios as well as individuals.Studio style rugs have options such as wooden dowels for your hands, accessories such as small boxes and straps to hook on

X'inhu fil-fażi kurrent elettriku 

Dwar fażi inti tista 'spiss tisma konverżazzjoni dwar l-elettriku. Imma, naturalment, il-kelma għandha tifsira ferm usa '. X'inhu l-fażi ta 'ċiklu tagħha, huwa konness ma art. Fuq dan u ħafna affarijiet oħra nitgħallmu fl-artikolu li jmiss. 

X'inhu l-fażi 

Fil-fiżika jifhmu taħt fażi stat wieħed ta 'materja (eż, l-ilma huwa l-likwidu, kristall likwidu, kristallin, jew stat ta' gass tal-aggregazzjoni). Barra minn hekk, hu mifhum mill-istadju fiċ-ċiklu tal-oxxillazzjoni (per eżempju, mewġa mozzjoni). 

Fl-astronomija, il-kelma għandha tifsira differenti. X'inhu l-fażi f'dan xjenza, nistgħu nifhmu mill-osservazzjonijiet tal-ġisem ċelesti Dinja (eż l-Qamar). Dan huwa, jista 'jiġi definit bħala l-porzjon viżibbli tal-oġġett ċelesti emisfera mdawla mill-Dinja. 

Fit-teorija ekonomika huwa magħruf sew li f'din il-fażi taċ-ċiklu. Dan huwa meta huwa osservat ċertu perjodu ta 'żmien (ċiklu) attività naturali. 

Ikkunsidra dak tfisser terminu għall-elettriku. 

elettriku fażi 

Taf l-oriġini tal-elettriku fl-impjanti? Kullimkien il-prinċipju ta 'okkorrenza tagħha ta' wieħed u l-istess: il-rotazzjoni tal-kalamita ġewwa l-coil twassal biex fatt li jidher fil- kurrent alternanti. Dan l-effett tissejjaħ forza elettromotiva jew induzzjoni forza elettromotiva. Il kalamita ddawwar imsejjaħ il-rotor u mehmuża madwar il-kojl - il stator. 

Il-vultaġġ li jalterna huwa miksub minn kostanti meta din bent mill-sine, b'hekk jintlaħaq il-pożittiv, il-valur negattiv ta 'dan. 

Għalhekk, il-kalamita tkun miexja, per eżempju, mill-fluss ta 'ilma. Peress li l-rotor fluss manjetiċi bidliet il-ħin kollu. Għalhekk, vultaġġ li jalterna. Meta t-tliet kojls, kull sett wieħed minnhom għandu ċirkwit elettriku separata, u ġewwa fih hemm l-istess valur varjabbli, fejn il-fażi vultaġġ jixxaqleb circumferentially fil mija u għoxrin gradi, jiġifieri terz fir-rigward tal-wieħed li jinsab fil-qrib. 

Jew, jipprovdu l-dar bħal qabel? 

Din l-iskema huwa msejjaħ il-tliet fażijiet. Iżda int tista sikur qawwa l-dar u bl-għajnuna ta 'wieħed mill-kojl. L-ewwel tmiem tal-kojl biss konness ma l-art, u t-tieni - li jwassal għall-dar, fejn il-wajer hu mqabbad, per eżempju, biex timla l-kitla. It-tieni plug Pronolagus waqt ertjat. Niżżel l-istess elettriku. 

Il-firxa ta tliet fażijiet attwali 

Tliet fażi attwali hija fornita lill-dar permezz ta 'linji ta' enerġija (fejn il-vultaġġ jilħaq ħamsa u tletin kilovolts). Huwa maħsub li huwa l-aktar mod ekonomiku u min-naħat kollha mill-iktar vantaġġjuża meta mqabbla mal-xokk konvenzjonali. 

L-industrija tal-ikel huwa eżattament tliet fażijiet attwali, peress li l-istruttura ddur huwa faċli biex jibnu, u b'mod ġenerali huwa aktar mobbli u għandha kapaċità kbira. 

wajer 

Aħna ser jifhmu li tali fażi, art u konduttur newtrali, f'aktar dettall. 

Huwa faċli li wieħed jimmaġina bi tliet fażijiet ġeneratur mal-compound skond il- "stilla." punt ta 'konnessjoni Fażi tissejjaħ newtrali. 

Huwa normalment msejsa biex tiżdied is-sigurtà, kif jekk il-mezz jonqos, fin-nuqqas ta 'art, joħolqu periklu għall-bnedmin. Meta inti touch-istrument sempliċiment billi xokk elettriku. Iżda jekk ikun hemm wisq art hemm tnixxija attwali u l-ebda riskju ma jkunx iffurmat. 

Allura, kollha flimkien - newtrali, earth u fażi wajers huma meħtieġa biex jiżguraw is-sigurtà tal-persuni. Fil-bini ġdid taħt kostruzzjoni huwa pprovdut sistema bħal din, filwaqt li huwa nieqes fil-qodma. 

fażi ta 'definizzjoni 

Xi kultant huwa neċessarju li jiġi ddeterminat fejn il-wire fażi. Għall-ħwienet tas-soltu, huwa forsi mhux neċessarju. Iżda meta konnessi, per eżempju, il-linef, il-fażi għandha tiġi sottomessa direttament lill-swiċċ, żero - direttament mal-lampi. Imbagħad, jekk id-dawl huwa off, meta persuna jissostitwixxi l-bozza ma
