text:
Il-Ġermanja tikseb rebħa importanti u l-Olanda tkompli l-perjodu pożittiv 

L-Olanda kompliet il-perjodu pożittiv hekk kif kien mistenni għelbet lill-Estonja 4-0 fi Grupp Ċ. RYAN BABEL fetaħ l-iskor fis-17-il minuta meta daħal tajjeb għall-kross fil-baxx mix-xellug u skorja mill-ewwel b'xutt bil-kaxxa ż-żgħira. L-istess RYAN BABEL irdoppja mal-ftuħ tat-tieni taqsima meta din id-darba rċieva kross mil-lemin u skorja b'daqqa ta' ras. L-iskor sar 3-0 fis-76 minuta b'xutt fil-baxx ta' MEMPHIS DEPAY minn tarf il-kaxxa li spiċċa fir-rokna. Kien għad fadal ħin għar-raba' gowl li wasal fis-87 minuta bi free-kick mil-lemin ta' Depay isib lil GEORGINIO WIJNALDUM li skorja b'daqqa ta' ras ċentrali, f'azzjoni li l-gowlkiper seta' jagħmel aħjar. 

Il-Ġermanja rkuprat mit-telfa fl-aħħar logħba kontra l-Olanda meta tat l-ewwel telfa lill-Irlanda ta' Fuq b'rebħa ta' 2-0. Huma fetħu l-iskor fit-48 minuta meta kross mil-lemin għadda tul il-lasta u spiċċa għand MARCEL HALSTENBERG li b'xutt mill-isbaħ għeleb lil Bailey Peacock-Farrell, bix-xutt jispiċċa fir-rokna ta' fuq tax-xibka. Huma għalqu l-logħba fit-93 minuta meta s-sostitut Kai Havertz għadda vertikalment lejn SERGE GNABRY li skorja b'xutt minn pożizzjoni angolata. 

Minn Grupp I l-Belġju kisbet is-sitt rebħa konsekuttiva u baqgħet b'punti massimi wara rebħa kbira ta' 4-0 barra pajjiżhom kontra l-Iskozja. ROMELU LUKAKU fetaħ l-iskor wara disa' minuti meta f'kontrattakk, Dries Mertens tefa' ballun vertikali lejn Kevin de Bruyne li avvanza u fetaħ fuq il-lemin lejn l-attakkant li skorja minn qagħda ideali. THOMAS VERMAELEN irdoppja fit-23 minuta meta skorja mill-viċin wara kross mil-lemin. It-tim ta' Roberto Martinez għamel l-iskor 3-0 b'daqqa ta' ras għar-rokna ta' TOBY ALDERWEIRELD minn korner mil-lemin. KEVIN DE BRUYNE ssiġilla r-rebħa fit-82 minuta meta rċieva mingħand Lukaku u skorja b'xutt preċiż għar-rokna. 

Mill-istess grupp, rebħa importanti għar-Russja li għelbu lill-Każakistan 1-0 b'daqqa ta' ras ta' MARIO FERNANDES fid-89 minuta minn free-kick ta' Aleksandr Golovin. 

Minn Grupp E, il-Kroazja kienet miżmuma 1-1, bl-Ażerbajġan tikseb l-ewwel punt fil-grupp. LUKA MODRIC fetaħ l-iskor minn penalty fil-11-il minuta iżda l-Ażerbajġan ġabet id-draw fit-72 minuta b'azzjoni personali mill-aqwa ta' TAMKIN KHALILZADE.
translation:
Germany get an important victory and the Netherlands continues the positive period

The Netherlands continued the positive period as expected to beat Estonia 4-0 in Group C.Ryan Babel opened the scoring in the 17th minute when he came well for the low left and scored immediately with a small box shot.Ryan Babel himself doubled with the opening of the second half when this time he received a cross from the right and scored with a header.The score was made 3-0 in the 76th minute with a low shot from Memphis Depay from the edge of the box that ended in the corner.There was still time for the fourth goal coming in the 87th minute with a free-kick from the right of Depay finding Georginio Wijnaldum who scored with a central header, in an action that the goalkeeper could do better.

Germany recovered from the defeat in the last game against the Netherlands when he first defeated Northern Ireland with a 2-0 win.They opened the scoring in the 48th minute when a cross from the right passed along the post and finished with Marcel Halstenberg who with a wonderful shot beat Bailey Peacock-Farrell, with the shot ending in the upper corner of thenet.They closed the game in the 93rd minute when substitute Kai Havertz passed vertically to Serge Gnabry who scored with a shot from an angled position.

From Group I Belgium won the sixth consecutive victory and remained with maximum points after a big 4-0 victory abroad against Scotland.Romelu Lukaku opened the scoring after nine minutes when in a counterattack, Dries Mertens threw a vertical ball to Kevin de Bruyne who advanced and opened to the right towards the striker who scored from an ideal situation.Thomas Vermaelen doubled in the 23rd minute when he scored from close range after a cross from the right.Roberto Martinez's team made the score 3-0 with a header for Toby Alderweireld's corner from a right-wing corner.Kevin de Bruyne sealed the victory in the 82nd minute when he received from Lukaku and scored with a precise shot to the corner.

From the same group, an important victory for Russia beat Kazakhstan 1-0 with a header from Mario Fernandes in the 89th minute from Aleksandr Golovin's free-kick.

From Group E, Croatia was held 1-1, with Azerbaijan gaining the first point in the group.Luka Modric opened the scoring from a penalty in the 11th minute but the Azerbaijan equalized in the 72nd minute with Tamkin Khalilzade's top personal action.

text:
Attard's AD councillor condemns vandalism of trees at Wied ta' Rmiedi 

AD's Attard councillor Ralph Cassar has condemned the vandalism of around 15 trees in Wied ta' Rmiedi this week. He said it was clear that the vandals knew what they were doing because they ringed the main trunk of the trees, an operation that would lead to their destruction. 

“A 20-year effort to plan indigenous trees and improve the natural environment has been destroyed in a matter of hours,” he said. 

He appealed to anyone who might have information to speak up and requested the council to file an official police report. 

– 

Kundanna għal vandaliżmu fuq għad ta' siġar f'Wied ta' Rmiedi F'Ħ'Attard 

Ralph Cassar, Kunsillier ta' AD f'Ħ'Attard qal li f'din l-aħħar ġimgħa sar att vandalu fuq madwar 15-il ta' siġra tal-luq maturi f'Wied ta' Rmiedi F'Ħ'Attard. “Huwa ċar li min ivvandalizza s-siġar, li diġa qegħdin imutu, jaf x'qed jagħmel għax saret ħsara apposta fiz-zokk prinċipali ta' kull siġra, liema hsara magħrufa bħala ‘ringing' twassal għall-qerda ta' dawn is-siġar.” 

“Xogħol ta' 20 sena biex jitħawwlu siġar indiġeni u jittejjeb l-ambjent naturali spiċċa meqrud fi ftit siegħat.” 

“Il-protezzjoni tas-siġar mhux ta' prijorita' għall-awtoritajiet u hawn kultura ta' omerta, fejn min jagħmel vendikazzjoni u ħsara rasu mistrieħa li mhux se jinqabad. Nappella lil kull min għandu informazzjoni, speċjalment residenti li joqgħodu faċċata tal-parti tal-wied fi Triq Wied ta' Rmiedi, f'Ħ'Attard dwar min għamel dan l-att tal-mistħija biex jitkellem. Tlabt lill-Kunsill Lokali ta' Ħ'Attard jagħmel rapport uffiċċjali lill-Pulizija.”
translation:
Attard's AD CONCILLOR CONDEMNS VANDALISM OF TREES AT WANT OF WANTS

AD's Attard Councilor Ralph Cassar has condemned the vandalism of around 15 trees in a valley of ashes this week.He said it was clear that the vandals were what they were doing so they ringed the main trunk of the Trees, an operation that would lead to their destruction.

"A 20-year effort to plan indigenous trees and improved the natural environment has been destroyed in a matter of hours," he said.

He appealed to anyone who might have information to speak up and requested the counsel to file an official police report.

-

Condemnation for vandalism on a number of trees in a valley of ashes in Attard

Ralph Cassar, an AD councilor in Attard, said that this last week a vandal act was held on about 15 of a mature poplar tree in a valley of ashes in Attard.“It is clear that the vandalizes of trees, who are already dying, knows what they are doing because a dedicated damage has been done in the main stem of each tree, which damage known as 'ringing' leads to the destruction of these trees. ”

"20-year work to plant native trees and improve the natural environment has been destroyed in a few hours."

“The protection of trees is not a priority for the authorities and here is a culture of Omerta, where the vindication and damaging head will not be caught.I appeal to anyone with information, especially residents who live in front of the valley part in Wied Street, in Attard about who did this shame act.I asked Attard Local Council to make an official report to the Police. ”

text:
Kif tapplika l-verniċ ġell: tips u tricks 

Ġel lustrar - prodott rivoluzzjonarju. Huwa kombinazzjoni ta 'verniċ u ġell. lustrar ġel se toħloq manikjur ta 'ġimgħatejn. Wara kollox, huwa kapaċi li jibqgħu fuq l-imsiemer mingħajr l-ċpar u laqx għal żewġ ġimgħat jew aktar. Kif tapplika l-verniċ ġell? X'inhuma l-sfumaturi u sigrieti għall-ħolqien tal-manikjur perfetta magħha? 

Applika ġel saff irqiq ta verniċ. Jekk meħtieġ, jista 'jiġi faċilment jitneħħa bil f'likwidu speċjali (remuvera), filwaqt li l-ġellijiet biss jibnu buff jitneħħew u serrar. Wara l-applikazzjoni mhijiex meħtieġa simulazzjoni u pjanċa tad-dwiefer zapilivanija. 

lustrar ġell. applikazzjoni tat-teknoloġija 

Tibda proċedura manikjur (tindif cuticles permezz nakozhnits). 

Wara dan, l-imsiemer ttrattati iddeidra, jekk meħtieġ, neħħi l-xaħam mill-pjanċa tad-dwiefer. 

Applika primer. 

Issa għandna bżonn biex tapplika l-bażi ġell. Dan jista 'jinbiegħ separatament jew flimkien ma' l-topcoat. Kif tapplika l-verniċ ġell? Applika rqiq ħafna. Poġġi l-imsiemer fil-lampa UV għal 2 minuti. Pre jinqara istruzzjonijiet lill-ġell-verniċ, peress li l-ħin azjenda fil-lampa UV jistgħu jvarjaw. 

xkupilja xotta jew drapp speċjali biex tneħħi umdità żejda mill-dwiefer. 

Kif tapplika ġel dwiefer kulur aktar saturati? Biex tibda, titħejja: roll-flixkun tal-verniċ ġel bejn idejk għal 20 sekonda. Għal tbajja aħjar għandhom japplikaw żewġ kowtijiet. Tinsiex li nixxef il-dwiefer fil-bozza wara kull applikazzjoni. L-ewwel saff ta 'Laker ikkulurit huwa aħjar li tagħmel irqaq ħafna, kważi trasluċidi. Iżda t-tieni tista 'ssir eħxen - għal kulur isbaħ u saturati. 

L-aħħar stadju - Fixer. Applika u nixxfu fil-fanal. A dettall importanti ħafna huwa l-applikazzjoni ta 'ġel verniċ mhux biss fuq il-wiċċ, iżda wkoll fuq l-aħħar tad-dwiefer. Jekk inti skip din il-parti, il-manikjur se aħħar twil ħafna. 

Kif tistgħu taraw, l-applikazzjoni ta 'ġel-lustrar - huwa pjuttost sempliċi. Stick xi struzzjonijiet, u jiksbu manikjur sbieħ u durabbli. 

It-tneħħija lustrar ġel 

Fil-fatt, bħala l-kawża ta 'verniċ ġel, mifhuma, u li kif biex tneħħiha? Din il-proċedura hija saħansitra aktar faċli. Huwa meħtieġ li imprenjazzjoni tajjara b'likwidu speċjali, iwaħħalha man-pjanċa tad-dwiefer u l-labra quċċata wrap fojl. Ħalli għal 10 minuti u imbagħad bil-galbu neħħi l-għatu b'mezzi vireg. 

Ħażna sewwa Ġell verniċ 

Mhux l-inqas fl-importanza hija l-kwistjoni ta 'Laker ħażna ġel. X'għandi nagħmel sabiex tinżamm sakemm dan ikun possibbli? Fil-kompożizzjoni tal-verniċ ġell huwa solvent simili għal dawk li jinsabu fil laker konvenzjonali. Għalhekk, il-kundizzjonijiet ta 'ħażna għal dan se jkun l-istess: jinħażnu f'temperatura tal-kamra u minnufih wara li jintuża għatu magħluq sewwa. Fuq evaporazzjoni tas-solvent mir-verniċ ġell kunjett isir wisq ħoxna li jinterferixxi japplikaw saff irqiq. 

Ġel lustrar - xi ħaġa ġdida, li hija min jipprova kull wieħed mill-sess ġust. Ladarba inti tagħmel manicures tuża din l-għodda, inti żgur li jgawdu l-benefiċċji kollha tagħha.
translation:
How to apply the Varnish Gel: Tips and Tricks

Gel polish - a revolutionary product.It is a combination of varnishes and gels.Gel polish will create a two -week manicure.After all, he is able to stay on the nails without the fog and chips for two weeks or more.How to apply the gel varnish?What are the nuances and secrets for creating the perfect manicure with it?

Apply a thin layer of varnish layer.If necessary, it can be easily removed with a special liquid (remuvera), while the gels only build a buff removed and saw.After application simulation and a zapilival nail plate is not required.

Gel polish.application of technology

Start a manicure procedure (cleaning cuticles through nakozhnits).

After that, the nails treated dehydra, if necessary, remove the fat from the nail plate.

Apply primer.

Now we need to apply the gel base.This can be sold separately or in combination with the topcoat.How to apply the gel varnish?Apply very thin.Place the nails in the UV lamp for 2 minutes.Pre read instructions to the varnish, as the time holding into the UV lamp may vary.

Dry brush or special cloth to remove excess moisture from the nails.

How to apply a more saturated color nail gel?For starters, prepare: roll the varnish bottle gel between your hands for 20 seconds.For better blemishes two coats should apply.Don't forget to dry the nails in the bulb after each application.The first layer of colored lacquer is better to make very thin, almost translucent.But the second may become thicker - for a brighter and saturated color.

Last stage - Fixer.Apply and dry in the lamp.A very important detail is the application of a varnish gel not only on the surface, but also on the end of the nail.If you skip this part, the manicure will last very long.

As you can see, applying gel-polish-it's quite simple.Stick some instructions, and get a nice and durable manicure.

Removing gel polish

In fact, as the cause of a gel varnish, understood, and how to remove it?This procedure is even easier.It is necessary to impregnation with a special liquid, attach it to the nail plate and the needle top wrap foil.Leave for 10 minutes and then carefully remove the lid with bars.

Storage thoroughly gel varnish

Not least in importance is the issue of gel storage lacquer.What should I do to keep it as long as possible?In the composition of the gel varnish it is a solvent similar to those located in conventional lacquer.Therefore, the storage conditions for this will be the same: they will be stored at room temperature and immediately after a tightly closed lid is used.On evaporation of the solvent from the vial gel a vial becomes too thick to interfere to apply a thin layer.

Gel polish - something new, which is worth trying each of the fair sex.Once you make manicures use this tool, you are sure to enjoy all its benefits.

text: Preheat il-forn għal 200 grad. Il-brunġiel sħaħ huma minjieri u naqqsu d-dnub. Aħna nagħżlu kull veġetali separatament fil-fojl u nibagħtuh fil-forn għal 45 minuta. Waqt li qed tħejji l-brunġiel, aħna nvoluti fil-laħam tal-mogħoż. Flett tat-tiġieġ maqtugħ f'biċċiet żgħar. Fry dawn il-biċċiet f'żejt veġetali sakemm kannella dehbi. Agħmel regolarment il-basal u l-bżar u fryhom sakemm itaffihom. Hekk kif il-laħam jiġi kannella għal kulur tad-deheb, żid 100 ml ta 'ilma, melħ, bżar u stew taħt għatu magħluq. Issa lura għall-ħxejjex - żid il-pejst tat-tadam u l-paprika fihom, ħallat, ferra '100 ml ilma u ħalliha tgħalli. Ħaxix ippreparat huwa miżjud mal-laħam. Jekk il-ħxejjex ma jkollhomx biżżejjed ilma - skuraw ferra 'ftit u ħallihom jistiednu fuq nar żgħir għal madwar 20 minuta. Nieħdu l-brunġiel mill-forn u kessaħha. Imbagħad ineħħu l-ġilda mill-brunġiel. Nagħmlu patata mbaffija bil-blender. Meta l-laħam ikun lest, ferra krema qarsa fih, żid il-qronfol imqattgħin tat-tewm, ħallat. Jekk il-massa hija pjuttost likwida, tista 'żżid 1 tablespoon ta' dqiq u ħallat. Wara 5 minuti, itfi t-tiġieġ u ħallih imur. Issa qed nippreparaw il-zalza tal-ħalib - l-aħħar element tad-dixx. Biex tagħmel dan, f'tazza, dewweb il-butir, żid id-dqiq u ħallat sakemm tkun bla xkiel. Bi ftit pour fil-taħlita ta 'ħalib sħun, tħawwad kontinwament. Fuq nar żgħir b'tressjar kostanti ġġib il-zalza sakemm tkun ħoxna. Meta l-zalza tkun lesta, żid melħ, anana, u ħallat kollox għal darb'oħra. Ħallat il-puree tal-brunġiel biż-zalza. Imxerred fuq pjanċa ta 'brunġiel biż-zalza, u mbagħad fuq il-laħam. Bon appetit!
translation: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees.Whole eggplant are mines and reduced sin.We select each vegetable separately in the foil and send it to the oven for 45 minutes.While preparing the eggplant, we are involved in goat meat.Chicken fillet cut into small pieces.Fry these pieces in vegetable oil until golden brown.Regularly do the onions and peppers and fry them until softened.As the meat comes brown to a golden color, add 100 ml of water, salt, pepper and stew under a closed lid.Now back to vegetables-add the tomato and paprika paste in them, mix, pour 100 ml of water and boil.Prepared vegetables are added to the meat.If the vegetables do not have enough water - score pour a little and let them invite over a small fire for about 20 minutes.We take the eggplant from the oven and cool it.Then remove the skin from the eggplant.Making blender potatoes.When the meat is finished, pour a sour cream in it, add the chopped garlic carnations, mix.If the mass is quite liquid, you can add 1 tablespoon of flour and mix.After 5 minutes, turn off the chicken and let it go.We are now preparing the milk sauce-the last element of the dish.To do this, in a cup, melt the butter, add the flour and mix until it is smooth.With a little pour in the mixture of hot milk, stirring constantly.On a small fire with constant stressing brings the sauce until thick.When the sauce is ready, add salt, pineapple, and mix everything again.Mix the eggplant puree with the sauce.Spread on a plate of eggplant with sauce, and then on the meat.Bon appetit!

text:
Mel Gibson u Rosalind Ross wrew it-tifel ritratt fuq it-tapit aħmar tal-Oscar 

Missier kbatur Mel Gibson, wara li wasal għall-Oscar bl-imħabba tiegħu Rosalind Ross, li tah it-disa 'tifel tiegħu xahar ilu, qasmu l-ewwel ritratt ta' ibnu mal-pubbliku. 

Little baby 

Fl-20 ta 'Jannar, il-qaddis ta' 61 sena, Mel Gibson ħa lil ibnu Lars Gerard f'armi. Kif sar magħruf għall-midja, fit-twelid it-tifel żamm biss 2.4 kilogrammi. Għalkemm ir-rappreżentanti tal-attur assiguraw li t-tifel u l-ommu, Rosalind Ross ta'26 sena, iħossuhom kbar, il-partitarji għadhom jibżgħu għas-saħħa tat-tarbija. Barra minn hekk, la Mel u lanqas Rosalind, minkejja t-talbiet kollha tal-fannijiet, ma għaħqux biex ittella 'l-ewwel ritratti ta' ibnu fin-netwerk soċjali. 

Tweġiba għall-mistoqsija 

Fost l-istilel ta 'Hollywood li għadda tul il-tapit aħmar "Oscar-2017", kien impossibbli li ma tiġix avżata Mel Gibson u l-ħabiba tiegħu Rosalind Ross, li tbissem, li tpoġġi għal flashes tal-kamera. 

Il-kittieb, li welldet binha biss ħames ġimgħat ilu, deher eleganti fi libsa blu artab b'ferrovija strapless minn Paolo Sebastian. It-tulle attire enfasizza l-figura graceful ta 'l-omm żgħażagħ, li kien kapaċi malajr jiksbu forma kbira wara t-tqala. 

Il-ġurnalisti, li talbu mistoqsijiet ta 'Gibson fil-gallerija tar-ritratti tal-avveniment, talbu dwar ibnu. L-attur ma rtirax mir-risposta, qal li hu jrid juri sparatura ta 'sturdament, u jħares lejn liema, ma jistax jgħin biex jitbissem. Mel ħa t-telefon u wera r-ritratt ta 'Lars Gerard.
translation:
Mel Gibson and Rosalind Ross showed the boy a photo on the Oscar red carpet

Father Mel Gibson, after coming to Oscar with his love Rosalind Ross, who gave him his ninth child a month ago, shared his son's first photo with the public.

Little Baby

On January 20, the 61-year-old Mel Gibson took his son Lars Gerard in arms.As it became known for the media, at birth the child only maintained 2.4 kilograms.Although the actor's representatives have ensured that the child and his mother, 26-year-old Rosalind Ross, feel great, fans are still afraid of the baby's health.In addition, neither Mel nor Rosalind, despite all the requests of the fans, did not reach to upload the first photos of his son to the social network.

Answering the question

Among the stars of Hollywood that passed along the red carpet "Oscar-2017", it was impossible not to be notified by Mel Gibson and his girlfriend Rosalind Ross, who smiled, who puts for camera flashes.

The writer, who gave birth only five weeks ago, appeared elegant in a soft blue dress with a strapless train by Paolo Sebastian.The Tulle Attire emphasized the graceful figure of the young mother, who was able to quickly get a great shape after pregnancy.

Journalists, who asked Gibson's questions at the event photo gallery, asked about his son.The player did not withdraw from the answer, he said he wants to show a stunning shot, and look at which, he cannot help smiling.Mel took the phone and showed Lars Gerard's photo.
